demons.name: Agathion

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Zio (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A large bolt of electrical power fires from your fingertips to strike a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 bonus, 60 ft range). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 2 electric damage. If all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, the target is also Shocked (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Rakukaja (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A stalwart foresight aids an ally’s defense. Choose a creature within range (90 feet range). For 1 minute, whenever a damage roll is made against the creature, it is rolled again, using whichever result is lower. You may target yourself with this Skill. If the creature is under the effects of Rakunda, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

demons.background: A general term for familiars used by Judeo-Christian magicians, they are usually sealed away in bottles, rings, or talismans. They torment the target selected by the conjurer.

demons.name: Arsene

traits.name: Third Eye
traits.description:
Focus. Concentrate. You can see it. You gain the following benefits:
 • You make Proficiency checks made to search for hidden levers, hints, and secret passages with advantage.
 • Attacks made against you that deal Physical damage have disadvantage.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Cleave (2 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: With scythe or claw, you swipe and slash at a foe. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 5 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 1d10 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Eiha (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Small tendrils of darkness slither from the earth and sting your target. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 2 curse damage.

demons.background: Arsène Lupin, sometimes known as Raoul, is a fictional gentleman thief created by Maurice Leblanc. He was known for targeting criminals or those who were much worse than himself, making him an anti-hero of sorts within his own stories. He might have been partly inspired by the French anarchist Marius Jacob.

demons.name: Mandrake

traits.name: Life Aid
traits.description:
Your tactical prowess grants you immense support abilities:
 • The range of Healing and Support Skills used by you is increased by 15 feet. This does not affect Skills with a range of “Self”.
 • Whenever Initiative ends, all allies that acted within that Initiative regain lost Hit Points and Spell Points equal to your Magic. This does not affect yourself.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Energy Drop (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A stimulating remedy opens one’s eyes against emotional malady. Choose a creature within range (75 feet). That creature recovers from Confuse, Fear, Despair, Rage, and Brainwash (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Pulinpa (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Tendrils of bewildering magic pierce a foe’s mind to unsettle them. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 To hit, 60 feet range). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 4 or higher, the target is inflicted with Confuse (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: A Mandrake, also known as a Mandragora, is a poisonous plant that grows from the graves of guilty dead men. In legend, if pulled from the ground, it makes a sound like the scream of a dying child which is so horrible it either deafens or kills the person pulling it. It was generally used in all kinds of potions that promised amazing properties such as invulnerability, invisibility or immunity to the undead.

demons.name: Pixie

traits.name: Static Electricity
traits.description:
An overabundance of electrical power primes a foe for paralysis. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you attempt to inflict a Downed creature with Shock (see “Conditions”), flip a coin. If heads, the Condition is inflicted.
 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 1 physical damage.

skills.name: Zio (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A large bolt of electrical power fires from your fingertips to strike a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 bonus, 60 ft). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 3 electric damage. If all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, the target is also Shocked (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Dia (3 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Warm, soft green glow stitches minor wounds on an ally. Choose a creature within range (90 ft). That creature regains 1d8 + 7 hit points.

demons.background: Fairies of English legend. They are also called Piskies and Puggsies. Pixies are sometimes said to be the elements of unbaptized children, or souls that have left their bodies. They are small enough to fit into the palm of your hand, but can grow bigger or smaller. Pixies live in groups. They love to dance and can be found dancing in a circle nearly every night. So-called "fairy rings" are said to mark the group where they hold their dances.

demons.name: Pyro Jack

traits.name: Thermal Conduct
traits.description:
Conductive energies overheat a vulnerable foe. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you attempt to inflict a Downed creature with Burn (see “Conditions”), flip a coin. If heads, the Condition is inflicted.
 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 1 physical damage.

skills.name: Agi (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You fling a mote of flames at a target within range. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 2 fire damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Burned (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Dazzler (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A sparkling, disorienting light flashes before a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Dizzy (see “Conditions”).

demons.background:
Pyro Jack is named after the fabled figure Jack-O'-Lantern. According to the earliest accounts of the tale, "Stingy Jack" was an Irish farmer who persuaded the devil not to take him to hell. When he was refused entry into heaven, he wandered the earth as a turnip-headed (or pumpkin-headed) soul who would come to be called "Jack of the Lantern," or so says the legend. Jack-o'-lanterns are carved by children and enthusiasts alike on Halloween. The tradition can also be thought to help guide the lost soul himself.
 The legend, however, goes back further than the term itself. Jack-o'-lantern or some variation thereof was at the height of usage in 17th century Europe. Simply put, it meant "the guy with the lantern." Later the term would almost exclusively be used as slang in reference to the will-o'-the-wisp phenomenon, or ignis fatuus, due to the appearance of a far off person carrying a lantern.

demons.name: Bicorn

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -7 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Lunge (2 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: You surge forward, striking clumsily with immense power and weight. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 10 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 1d8 + 3 physical damage. You move to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the target after attacking. This attack may not connect if movement to this space is prevented.

skills.name: Tarunda (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You place a minor hex upon a foe, lessening their impact. Choose a creature within range (90 feet range). For 1 minute, whenever that creature rolls dice for a damage roll, they roll again, using whichever result is lower.  If the creature is under the effects of Tarukaja, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

demons.background: Bicorn is a unholy unicorn with two sharp, spiraling horns on its forehead. If unicorns are considered holy, then bicorns are considered unholy, reviled as filthy beasts. The number 1 supposedly represents the purity of man, and 2 represents the seductions brought with the arrival of women. Bicorn supposedly represents the sin of adultery. Males are called bicorns, while females are called chichevaches ("thin cows"). It is said that the unicorn was born from a bicorn and once had two horns itself.

demons.name: Cait Sith

traits.name: Scoundrel Eyes
traits.description: Your eyes fixate on a coming attack, allowing you to parry and evade with ease. Attacks made against you that deal Physical damage have disadvantage.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Agi (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You fling a mote of flames at a target within range. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 2 fire damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Burned (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Cleave (2 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: With scythe or claw, you swipe and slash at a foe. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 5 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 1d10 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Tarukaja (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Invigorating force emboldens an ally. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, whenever that creature rolls dice for a damage roll, they roll again, using whichever result is higher. You may target yourself with this Skill. If the creature is under the effects of Tarunda, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

demons.background: Cait Sith is a Fairy that takes the form of a cat. Its name means "fairy cat." The Cait Sith can converse in human tongues and walk on two legs, making no sound as it moves. It normally lives as a cat that travels back and forth between the cat kingdom and the human world. It has a white star-shaped mark on its chest. The Cait Sith appears in Irish and Scottish legends and served as the model for Puss-in-Boots.

demons.name: Genbu

traits.name: Shell Guard
traits.description: After receiving Physical damage, Genbu gains the benefits of Rakukaja .

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Bufu (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A mote of crippling frost envelops a target. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range(-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 3 ice damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Frozen (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Garu (3 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A gust whips and strikes a foe, twisting them about. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 3 wind damage.

skills.name: Sukukaja (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A second wind blows past your ally, allowing for them to make a swift response. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, all attacks made by the creature are made with advantage, and all attacks made against the creature are made with disadvantage. You may target yourself with this Skill. If the creature is under the effects of Sukunda, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

demons.background:
The Xuan Wu, also known as Black Tortoise of the North, Black Warrior or simply the Black Tortoise is one of the Four Symbols of the Chinese Constellation (Si Xiang) along with Qing Long, Zhu Que and Bai Hu. It represents the north, the color black, winter and the water element. It is usually depicted as both a tortoise and a snake, specifically with the snake coiling around the tortoise. It is sometimes called the Black Tortoise of the North and is also known as Genbu in Japanese, Huyền Vũ in Vietnamese and Hyeonmu or Hyunmoo in Korean.
 Genbu is also a Persona only acquired through the mystic, hidden art of fusion.

demons.name: Incubus

traits.name: Draining Mouth
traits.description: Whenever you damage an enemy creature with a Physical or Gun Skill, you regain 1d4 hit points. Whenever you damage an enemy creature with a Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty Skill, you regain 1d4 spell points.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Dream Needle (5 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: Envenomed darts induce lethargy into the foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 1d10 + 3 gun damage. If the result of each d6 is 4 or higher, the creature is afflicted with Sleep (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Life Drain (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You reach out, savoring life force from a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 6 almighty damage, and you 6 regain hit points.

demons.background:
An incubus is a demon in male form supposed to lie upon sleeping women in order to have sexual intercourse with them, according to a number of mythological and legendary traditions. Its female counterpart is the succubus. They were either spawned by the legions of Hell or appeared as creatures of the night, just like vampires. An incubus may pursue sexual relations with a woman in order to father a child, as in the legend of Merlin.
 Religious tradition holds that repeated intercourse with an incubus or succubus may result in the deterioration of health or even death. In medieval times, the church would use incubi and succubi to explain sexual functions, which were taboo subjects.

demons.name: Kelpie

traits.name: Unshaken Will
traits.description: A stiff upper lip aids you to overcome even the most destitute of your thoughts. You are immune to the Confuse, Fear, Despair, Rage, and Brainwash Conditions (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -7 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Lunge (2 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: You surge forward, striking clumsily with immense power and weight. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 10 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 1d8 + 2 physical damage. You move to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the target after attacking. This attack may not connect if movement to this space is prevented.

skills.name: Garu (3 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A gust whips and strikes a foe, twisting them about. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 2 wind damage.

skills.name: Sukukaja (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A second wind blows past your ally, allowing for them to make a swift response. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, all attacks made by the creature are made with advantage, and all attacks made against the creature are made with disadvantage. You may target yourself with this Skill. If the creature is under the effects of Sukunda, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

demons.background: In Celtic mythology, a kelpie is said to be a supernatural water horse that haunts rivers and lakes in Scotland and Ireland. Its mane is black, but its skin is said to be cold as death. It is said to lure mortals into water, specifically young children, into drowning so it can eat them. The kelpie tempts children to ride on its back, and once the victims fall for the trap, the kelpie's skin is said to become adhesive.

demons.name: Saki Mitama

traits.name: Relief Bloodline
traits.description: A most resplendent and glorious blessing comes from your hands. The Spell Point cost of Support type Skills are halved, rounded down (min 1).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 1 physical damage.

skills.name: Bufu (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A mote of crippling frost envelops a target. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 3 ice damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Frozen (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Element Wall (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You form a draining barrier that protects an ally. When you use this Skill, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, or Nuke. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For the next three rounds, starting to count down at the end of this one, the creature is no longer Weak to the chosen damage type, and receives half as much damage from that type (this effect is independent from and stacks with Resist).

skills.name: Rakukaja (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A stalwart foresight aids an ally’s defense. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, whenever a damage roll is made against the creature, it is rolled again, using whichever result is lower. You may target yourself with this Skill. If the creature is under the effects of Rakunda, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

demons.background:
In Japanese belief, Saki Mitama is a part of the soul that brings good fortune and blessings. It is said to bring prosperity in hunting, fishing and harvests, however some believe this is actually the purpose of Nigi Mitama.
 Saki Mitama is a very rare entity indeed, only able to be acquired through fusion of shadows/demons, a rare and hidden art only usable by trained professionals within the Cognitive World and other words in between.

demons.name: Silky

traits.name: Soul Chain
traits.description: Cooperation is the best policy. Tandem tactics allow you to prepare a second wave of destruction. Whenever you perform a Baton Pass to grant an extra action to an ally, you regain 2d8 + your level spent Spell Points..

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 1 physical damage.

skills.name: Bufu (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A mote of crippling frost envelops a target. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 2 ice damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Frozen (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Dormina (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Soft ripples froth below foe, attempting to sap their strength into exhaustion. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Sleep (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Dia (3 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Warm, soft green glow stitches minor wounds on an ally. Choose a creature within range (90 ft). That creature regains 1d8 + 4 hit points.

demons.background: A Silky, also known as Silkie (Silkies for plural), is a female fae or spirit clothed in silk from the borders of Scotland, known to "wear rustling silk as she does household chores" and "terrorizes lazy servants." Although usually helpful and valued, performing chores and guarding houses against harmful intruders, they can also be mischievous, leaving houses they inhabit in disarray. They were sometimes believed as the female version of Brownies.

demons.name: Succubus

traits.name: Hollow Jester
traits.description:
You seek out the weak-willed and the ailing pack. You gain the following benefits:
 • You may add half your character level (min 1) to the damage roll of any attack against which the target is Weak to.
 • You may add half your character level (min 1) to the damage roll of any attack against a target afflicted with a Condition. You may add this bonus multiple times, once for each Condition the target is inflicted with.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 1 physical damage.

skills.name: Dormina (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Soft ripples froth below foe, attempting to sap their strength into exhaustion. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Sleep (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Dekaja (12 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You erase all motes of strength for foes. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). All effects of Tarukaja, Rakukaja, Sukukaja are removed from them.

demons.background:
A Succubus is a demon or spirit from European folklore during the medieval ages, which takes the form of an attractive female to seduce men. Their male counterpart is the Incubus. They were either spawned by the legions of Hell or appeared as creatures of the night, just like vampires. They are believed to have sexual intercourse with sleeping men.
 They draw energy from men to sustain themselves, often until the point of exhaustion, the deterioration of health or the death of the victim. Lilith and her daughters, the Lilim, are considered succubi. Succubi encounters have also been theorized as an attempt to explain birth defects or sometimes adultery.

demons.name: Angel

traits.name: Skillful Technique
traits.description: You understand the art of striking vitals with all of your strength the moment willing. You may add your character level to the damage roll of any attack against which the target is Weak to.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Kouha (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A wisp of light illuminates and strikes a target. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 2 bless damage.

skills.name: Makajama (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A mote of void magic applied to the mind has disastrous results. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Forget.

skills.name: Dekunda (12 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You cleanse impurities of the heart. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). All effects of Tarunda, Rakunda, Sukunda are removed from them.

demons.background: Angels are divine celestial beings that have been recorded in various religious lore, mainly Abrahamic, who faithfully serve God. The term "angel" comes from the greek word "angelos" meaning "messenger," as a translation of their name in hebrew "Malach," this term is used both to refer to the lowest rank of angels and the heavenly host as a whole. Angel, however, is not their name as a species, but rather a description of their task, as angels are best described as "spirits." The origin of angels is up to debate, but some suggest that they were created on the second day of creation by God from either fire or light as a manifestation of his boundless love.

demons.name: Berith

traits.name: Crisis Control
traits.description:
You not only exploit weakness effectively, but know how to guard your own. You gain the following benefits:
 • You may add half your character level (min 1) to the damage roll of any attack against which the target is Weak to.
 • You receive half as much damage from attacks against which you are Weak.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Agi (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You fling a mote of flames at a target within range. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 2 fire damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Burned (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Power Slash (5 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: A powerful stroke with a trained arm causes immense injury. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 5 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 2d10 + 3 physical damage.

demons.background:
According to the writings in The Lesser Key of Solomon, Berith is the twenty-eighth demonic spirit listed in Ars Goetia. He is a great duke of Hell with twenty-six legions of demons under his command. He is depicted as a knight or soldier wearing red armor and a golden crown; according to other grimoires, his skin is also red. He rides a gigantic red horse and burns those without manners.
 In order to speak with him, the conjurer must wear a silver ring and hold it before their face. He gives true answers to all things past, present and future as long as he is asked, but when not answering questions he is a liar. He can turn any metal into gold, give dignities and confirm them. As an angel, Berith was prince of the order of cherubim.

demons.name: Hua-Po

traits.name: Thermal Conduct
traits.description:
Conductive energies overheat a vulnerable foe. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you attempt to inflict a Downed creature with Burn (see “Conditions”), flip a coin. If heads, the Condition is inflicted.
 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage.

skills.description: Melee attack: -3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 1 physical damage.

skills.description: You fling a mote of flames at a target within range. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 3 fire damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Burned (see “Conditions”).

skills.description: Soft ripples froth below foe, attempting to sap their strength into exhaustion. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Sleep (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Tarunda (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You place a minor hex upon a foe, lessening their impact. Choose a creature within range (90 feet range). For 1 minute, whenever that creature rolls dice for a damage roll, they roll again, using whichever result is lower.  If the creature is under the effects of Tarukaja, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

demons.background: According to scripture Zi-bu-yu in Qing dynasty, Hua Po is a kind of tree spirit said to be formed from the disembodied souls of dead humans when three or more people hang themselves from the same tree. They appear as beautiful young girls that are dressed in white clothes but are much smaller than the average human. Although they cannot speak, it is said that they make sounds that are as beautiful as those of songbirds.

demons.name: Koropokkuru

traits.name: Cold-Blooded
traits.description:
With reptilian cruelty, you freeze a foe. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you attempt to inflict a Downed creature with Freeze (see “Conditions”), flip a coin. If heads, the Condition is inflicted.
 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 1 physical damage.

skills.name: Bufu (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A mote of crippling frost envelops a target. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 3 ice damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Frozen (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Makajama (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A mote of void magic applied to the mind has disastrous results. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Forget.

skills.name: Sukunda (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You decelerate a foe, slowing their ability to react or act. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, all attacks made by the creature have disadvantage, and all attacks against the creature have advantage.  If the creature is under the effects of Sukukaja, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

demons.background: Koropokkuru are a race of small people in Ainu folklore. The name is traditionally analyzed as a tripartite compound of kor or koro ("butterbur plant"), pok ("under, below"), and kur or kuru ("person") and interpreted to mean "people below the leaves of the butterbur plant" in the Ainu language.

demons.name: Mokoi

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Skull Cracker (6 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: A splitting, lunging strike, made with a powerful force to the head sends the foe into a spin. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 10 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 2d8 + 3 physical damage. If the result of each d6 in the attack roll is 4 or higher, the target is afflicted with Confuse (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Tarukaja (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Invigorating force emboldens an ally. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, whenever that creature rolls dice for a damage roll, they roll again, using whichever result is higher. You may target yourself with this Skill. If the creature is under the effects of Tarunda, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

skills.name: Dazzler (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A sparkling, disorienting light flashes before a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Dizzy (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: Mokoi are spirits of evil in Australian Murngin folklore that live in the jungle and move at night. They are the reincarnation of the "shadow soul" of humans and kill those who use dark magic. They would also kidnap and eat children at night, sometimes causing war with humans.

demons.name: Obariyon

traits.name: Striking Weight
traits.description: A fell-handed delivery makes your blows land harder. Add a 1d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills that deal physical or gun damage. At 15th level this bonus is increased by 1d8 (2d8).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Snap (3 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: A pinpoint, puncturing strike penetrates the opponent’s defenses. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 15 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 1d10 + 3 gun damage.

skills.name: Lucky Punch (2 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: You take a random swing, letting destiny do the work. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 10 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 1d10 + 1d8 + 3 physical damage. This Skill scores a Critical hit if the result of each d6 in its attack roll is 5 or higher.

skills.name: Sukunda (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You decelerate a foe, slowing their ability to react or act. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, all attacks made by the creature have disadvantage, and all attacks against the creature have advantage.  If the creature is under the effects of Sukukaja, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

demons.background: The Obariyon is a Japanese "piggyback demon" from local folklore. While a person is walking along a woodland or grassy path, the Obariyon may jump out and attach itself to their back. While it cannot be seen, its weight can be felt by the person, and it becomes harder to walk. The Obariyon cannot be easily removed without the use of magic, but it is said if you can remove it and take it home, it will turn into many valuable gold coins.

demons.name: Slime

traits.name: Foul Stench
traits.description:
A noxious, plague-like force infests foes. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -7 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Lunge (2 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: You surge forward, striking clumsily with immense power and weight. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 10 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 1d8 + 3 physical damage. You move to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the target after attacking. This attack may not connect if movement to this space is prevented.

skills.name: Tarunda (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You place a minor hex upon a foe, lessening their impact. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, whenever that creature rolls dice for a damage roll, they roll again, using whichever result is lower.  If the creature is under the effects of Tarukaja, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

skills.name: Evil Touch (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A swirling infusion of dark forces spark fear into a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Fear (see “Conditions”).

demons.background:
A slime, also commonly called ooze, are common types of monsters in many fantasy role-play games. True to their name, they don't usually have any distinct shape and appear as large masses of gelatinous fluid. Slimes and oozes vary between mediums, with some being intelligent and capable of assuming basic shapes with others being nothing more than brainless piles of goo that dissolve whatever matter becomes enveloped by their bodies.
 Like oozes, many slimes dwell underground, and most secrete an acid from their skin that dissolves flesh and other materials rapidly. In D&D, slimes are essentially blind, but more than make up for that with an ability called "blindsight," which allows them to discern nearby objects and creatures without needing to see them visually.

demons.name: Ame-no-Uzume

traits.name: Divine Grace
traits.description: Divine energies flow throughout you, catalyzing all healing forces. Whenever you would regain hit points from a Skill, you regain twice as many.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 1 physical damage.

skills.name: Zio (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A large bolt of electrical power fires from your fingertips to strike a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 bonus, 60 ft). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 3 electric damage. If all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, the target is also Shocked (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Bufula (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Spiked snowflakes snap and burst all around a creature. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 bonus, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 2d8 + 2 ice damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Frozen (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Diarama (9 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Spiraling angelic light envelops an ally to rejuvenate them. Choose a creature within range. That creature regains 3d8 + 4 hit points.

demons.background: Ame no Uzume, also known as Ame-no-Uzume-no-Mikoto, The Great Persuader, and The Heavenly Alarming Female, is the goddess of dawn, mirth, meditation, revelry and the arts in the Shinto religion of Japan, and the wife of Sarutahiko Ōkami. Her name can also be pronounced as Ama-no-Uzume. She is also known as Ōmiyanome-no-Ōkami, an inari kami possibly due to her relationship with her husband.

demons.name: Apsaras

traits.name: Icy Glare
traits.description: Your cold gaze alleviates the pressure of foes from your allies. Whenever you or an ally within 60 feet of you would be afflicted with a Condition, roll 1d4. On a 4, the creature recovers from it.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 1 physical damage.

skills.name: Rebellion (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Golden light of obstinance heightens an ally’s ability to deliver punishment. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, attacks the creature makes score a Critical hit if the result of each d6 is a 5 or higher.

skills.name: Element Wall (10 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You form a draining barrier that protects an ally. When you use this Skill, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, or Nuke. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For the next three rounds, starting to count down at the end of this one, the creature is no longer Weak to the chosen damage type, and receives half as much damage from that type (this effect is independent from and stacks with Resist).

skills.name: Bufu (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A mote of crippling frost envelops a target. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 3 ice damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Frozen (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: Apsaras (Sanskrit: अप्सरा) also known as Vidhya Dhari, according to Hindu and Buddhist mythology, are spirits that appear in the form of young, beautiful women who have mastered the fine art of celestial dance. They are the wives of Indra's servants, Gandharvas, and are known to entertain the gods and fallen heroes, dancing in the divine palaces to music made by their husbands. They are frequently equated with the water-elemental nymphs and naiads of Ancient Greece, and depictions of them can be seen in Cambodian and Balinese culture.

demons.name: Ippon-Datara

traits.name: Striking Weight
traits.description: A fell-handed delivery makes your blows land harder. Add a 1d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills that deal physical damage. At 15th level this bonus is increased by 1d8 (2d8).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -7 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Sledgehammer (6 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: A most cruel and devastating overhead blow sends foes into dizzying fits. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 10 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 3d8 + 3 physical damage. If the result of each d6 in the attack roll is 4 or higher, the target is afflicted with Dizzy (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Tarukaja (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Invigorating force emboldens an ally. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, whenever that creature rolls dice for a damage roll, they roll again, using whichever result is higher. You may target yourself with this Skill. If the creature is under the effects of Tarunda, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

demons.background: The Ippon-Datara (一本踏鞴*)? is a rarely spotted youkai due to its innate shyness driving it away from urban areas. Hermitting itself in the mountains of Japan, it is best known to lurk in the mountains bordering the Wakayama and Nara prefectures, though there have been sightings within their immediate neighboring prefectures. Their method of locomotion is by hopping around and doing somersaults. While normally wanting nothing to do with humans, once a year, on December 20th, if a human and Ippon-Datara meet, they will squash the humans unfortunate enough underfoot, and is considered an unlucky day in those prefectures, and are urged to stay away from the mountains.

demons.name: Jack Frost

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Ice)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage. Add a 2d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills of the chosen element. At 15h level, this bonus is increased by 1d8 (3d8).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Baisudi (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A cleansing aura relieves physical energy. Choose a creature within range (60 feet). That creature recovers from Burn, Freeze, and Shock (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Rakunda (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You expose a foe’s weak points, allowing you to land harder hits. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, whenever a damage roll is made against that creature, the attacker rolls again, using whichever result is higher.  If the creature is under the effects of Rakukaja, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

demons.background: Jack Frost is a spirit originating from England. He is a snow elf who brings in cold weather during the winter and is thought to be responsible for the frost that forms on the windows of homes and buildings.

demons.name: Kodama

traits.name: Skillful Technique
traits.description: You understand the art of striking vitals with all of your strength the moment willing. You may add your character level to the damage roll of any attack against which the target is Weak to.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 1 physical damage.

skills.name: Psi (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You clench your fingers into a fist, and a small coil of psychic energy closes around the target. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 3 psychic damage.

skills.name: Garu (3 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A gust whips and strikes a foe, twisting them about. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 3 wind damage.

skills.name: Rakunda (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You expose a foe’s weak points, allowing you to land harder hits. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, whenever a damage roll is made against that creature, the attacker rolls again, using whichever result is higher.  If the creature is under the effects of Rakukaja, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

demons.background: A Kodama (木魅) is a spirit from Japanese folklore, which is believed to live in certain trees. Cutting down a tree which houses a kodama is thought to bring misfortune, and such trees are often marked with shimenawa rope.

demons.name: Koppa Tengu

traits.name: Raging Temper
traits.description: In the heat of the moment, you are easily angered. This irate tendency is fickle, but bears an easily drawn-upon strength. As an action, you enter a frenzied state. This grants you the effects of the Tarukaja Skill at no cost. Then, make a melee attack against yourself. If the result of all d6s in this attack are a 3 or higher, you are inflicted with Rage (see “Conditions”). You may willingly be inflicted with Rage this way.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 1 physical damage.

skills.name: Garu (3 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A gust whips and strikes a foe, twisting them about. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 2 wind damage.

skills.name: Sukukaja (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A second wind blows past your ally, allowing for them to make a swift response. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, all attacks made by the creature are made with advantage, and all attacks made against the creature are made with disadvantage. You may target yourself with this Skill. If the creature is under the effects of Sukunda, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

skills.name: Taunt (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: The arcane art of irritation is infused within your goading and jeering, evoking frustration from a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Rage (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: Tengu are a species that originate from Japanese mythology. Those who became Tengu and had ignorant or cruel hearts would become ko-tengu (small tengu) and those that were knowledgeable would become dai-tengu (big tengu). The koppa-tengu or "leaf Tengu" are among the smallest of the kotengu family, possessing very little spiritual energy. It is sometimes said wolves that live an exceptionally long life will become koppa-tengu and later will change into a form closer to a Karasu Tengu. The koppa-tengu often act as retainers and messengers to larger tengu, especially the Tengu King: Sojobo, a Kurama Tengu.

demons.name: Kusi Mitama

traits.name: Divine Grace
traits.description: Divine energies flow throughout you, catalyzing all healing forces. Whenever you would regain hit points from a Skill, you regain twice as many.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 1 physical damage.

skills.name: Media (9 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Warm, soft green glow stitches minor wounds on multiple allies. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures regain 1d8 + 7 hit points.

skills.name: Makajama (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A mote of void magic applied to the mind has disastrous results. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Forget.

skills.name: Element Wall (10 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You form a draining barrier that protects an ally. When you use this Skill, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, or Nuke. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For the next three rounds, starting to count down at the end of this one, the creature is no longer Weak to the chosen damage type, and receives half as much damage from that type (this effect is independent from and stacks with Resist).

demons.background: In Japanese belief, Kusi Mitama, romanized as Kushi Mitama, is an aspect of the human soul known as the "wondrous soul," which appears together with Saki Mitama, the providing soul, which is the power behind the harvest. It is believed to have mysterious powers, to cause transformations and to be able to cure illnesses, as according to Shinto belief.

demons.name: Onmoraki

traits.name: Foul Stench
traits.description:
A noxious, plague-like force infests foes. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 1 physical damage.

skills.name: Eiha (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Small tendrils of darkness slither from the earth and sting your target. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 3 curse damage.

skills.name: Agi (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You fling a mote of flames at a target within range. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 3 fire damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Burned (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Pulinpa (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Tendrils of bewildering magic pierce a foe’s mind to unsettle them. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet range). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Confuse (see “Conditions”).

demons.background:
An onmoraki is a bird-demon created from the spirits of freshly-dead corpses that appears in Shinto mythology. They resemble a black crane, and if a person is caught sleeping in a temple's sermon hall, the onmoraki will rebuke them while flapping its wings. Onmoraki are also said to shout the Degeneration Sutra in the household altar of priests who neglect to read their sutras.
 In modern Japanese art, the onmoraki will often take on the comical appearance of a roasted chicken. This is most likely due to the works of a eighteenth century artist, Toriyama Sekien.

demons.name: Orpheus F

traits.name: Circle of Sadness
traits.description: A morbid ring of protection wards you against falling to despair. When you would be reduced to 0 hit points by a hostile attack, you are reduced to 1 hit point instead. Once this ability is used, you cannot use it again until you fully recover from a Short Rest.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -7 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Neo Cadenza (32 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Orpheus plays a magical, enchanting melody to support the party’s rush. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures regain 1d8 + 4 hit points. Each of those creatures gain the effects of Tarukaja and Rakukaja.

skills.name: Agi (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You fling a mote of flames at a target within range. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 2 fire damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Burned (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Tarunda (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You place a minor hex upon a foe, lessening their impact. Choose a creature within range (90 feet range). For 1 minute, whenever that creature rolls dice for a damage roll, they roll again, using whichever result is lower.  If the creature is under the effects of Tarukaja, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

demons.background:
In Greek mythology, Orpheus was the son of Thracian king Oeagrus and the muse Calliope (some versions have Orpheus' father as the god Apollo). Apollo, fond of Orpheus, gave him a small golden lyre, which he quickly mastered. Taught to sing verses by his mother, Orpheus was so skilled at making music that he was called "Master of Strings" and "Father of Songs," capable of such music that even rocks and animals would be compelled to dance.
 This version of Orpheus, although bearing the same concept as the male counterpart, now sports longer brown hair, a golden-colored torso instead of a platinum one the male Orpheus adorns and a giant heart-shaped lyre.

demons.name: Archangel

traits.name: Skillful Technique
traits.description: You understand the art of striking vitals with all of your strength the moment willing. You may add your character level to the damage roll of any attack against which the target is Weak to.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Vajra Blast (4 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You focus your inner strength, and unleash it as a thunderous burst from yourself. Make a melee attack against each creature within a 10-foot sphere centered at a point within range (-5 to hit, 10 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 1d8 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Dazzler (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A sparkling, disorienting light flashes before a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Dizzy (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Hama (6 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Tapestries and minor sigils of holy exorcism attempt to snuff out a foe’s will. Choose a creature within range and make a ranged attack against them (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 4 or higher, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points immediately. You have advantage on attack rolls with this Skill if the creature is Weak to Bless. This Skill provokes a One More if the target is weak to Bless.

demons.background: The archangels are among the eighth sphere, making them second in the third hierarchy in the nine orders of angels in Christian teachings. Archangels are one of the few bodies of angels that contact those on the material plane directly and are the ministers and messengers between God and mankind. There is a dispute on whether famous archangels such as Michael and Gabriel are the same class as the "plain" archangels, who in the Kabbalah and in the Bible are called "Beni Elohim" (meaning "children of God"), or belong to a completely different order known as "Rav-Malakhim" or "Malakhim-Panav," who are the angels that stand before the lord himself.

demons.name: Eligor

traits.name: Thermal Conduct
traits.description:
Conductive energies overheat a vulnerable foe. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you attempt to inflict a Downed creature with Burn (see “Conditions”), flip a coin. If heads, the Condition is inflicted.
 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 physical damage.

skills.description: You fling a mote of flames at a target within range. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 3 fire damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Burned (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Memory Blow (6 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You focus your inner strength, and unleash it as a thunderous burst from yourself. Make a melee attack against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (-5 to hit, 20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 1d8 + 3 physical damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, a creature is inflicted with Forget (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Tarukaja (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Invigorating force emboldens an ally. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, whenever that creature rolls dice for a damage roll, they roll again, using whichever result is higher. You may target yourself with this Skill. If the creature is under the effects of Tarunda, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

demons.background: Eligos, also known as Eligor or Abigor, is the 15th demonic spirit of Ars Goetia and a fallen angel. He governs over 60 legions of spirits. He is a great duke and appears in the form of a goodly knight carrying a lance, pennon (flag) and a scepter (a serpent to Aleister Crowley). Alternatively he is depicted as a ghostly specter, sometimes riding a semi-skeletal (sometimes winged) horse, or the Steed of Abigor. This is a minion of Hell itself, and was a gift from Beelzebub. It was created from the remains of one of the horses of the Garden of Eden.

demons.name: High Pixie

traits.name: Skillful Technique
traits.description: You understand the art of striking vitals with all of your strength the moment willing. You may add your character level to the damage roll of any attack against which the target is Weak to.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Garu (3 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A gust whips and strikes a foe, twisting them about. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 3 wind damage.
