skills.description: Warm, soft green glow stitches minor wounds on multiple allies. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet range). Those creatures regain 1d8 + 7 hit points.

skills.name: Dormina (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Soft ripples froth below foe, attempting to sap their strength into exhaustion. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet range). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Sleep (see “Conditions”).

demons.background:
High Pixies are high ranking pixies that act as leaders or commanders of younger pixies. Generally, a charismatic pixie can obtain this rank from proving its skill and loyalty.
 They watch over the younger pixies as guardians, and ensure they are kept out of danger, although they are every bit as mischievous as their younger counterparts. They are charged with guarding the ruins and caves where other pixies dwell.

demons.name: Inugami

traits.name: Foul Stench
traits.description:
A noxious, plague-like force infests foes. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Pulinpa (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Tendrils of bewildering magic pierce a foe’s mind to unsettle them. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet range). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Confuse (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Tarukaja (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Invigorating force emboldens an ally. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, whenever that creature rolls dice for a damage roll, they roll again, using whichever result is higher. You may target yourself with this Skill. If the creature is under the effects of Tarunda, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

skills.name: Giant Slice (5 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: With a circular and calculated blow, you follow up with a sundering slice. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 10 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 1d10 + Strength physical damage. If this Skill is used with an action granted by a Baton Pass, the damage dealt is doubled.

demons.background: In Japanese mythology, an inugami ("dog god") resembles, and usually originates from, a dog, (although other similar species are interpreted as being. e.g., wolves, raccoons, and weasels.) and most commonly carrying out vengeance or acting as guardians on behalf of their "inugami owner." Inugami are extremely powerful and capable of existing independently, (without master or possession) as well as turning on their "owners" and even possessing humans. Even so, while Inugami can betray their masters, they may also be the loyalest of companions.

demons.name: Kaguya

traits.name: Divine Grace
traits.description: Divine energies flow throughout you, catalyzing all healing forces. Whenever you would regain hit points from a Skill, you regain twice as many.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Shining Arrows (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Streaks of starlight shoot through the air, all honing on the foe. Make four attacks against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). The first time an attack hits, each subsequent hit will use the same attack roll result as that first hit. For each hit, the creature receives 1d8 + 3 Bless damage.

skills.name: Mediarama (18 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Spiraling angelic light envelops numerous allies to rejuvenate them. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures regain 3d8 + 7 hit points.

skills.name: Amrita Shower (12 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You remedy the impurities of all your comrades, cleansing the field of malady. Choose up to six creatures within range (60 feet). Each of those creatures recover from all Conditions.

demons.background: Kaguya Hime is a character from a very famous Japanese folk story called Taketori Monogatari (竹取物語), "The Tale of the Bamboo Cutter." She was found by a Bamboo cutter inside a stalk of Bamboo. The cutter raised her as his own daughter and she became renowned throughout Japan for her beauty. Many men came to ask for her hand in marriage but she refused them all. Eventually the Emperor of Japan also heard of her beauty and desired to marry her. She refused him as well, however, he still continued to love her even though they never married.

demons.name: Makami

traits.name: Skillful Technique
traits.description: You understand the art of striking vitals with all of your strength the moment willing. You may add your character level to the damage roll of any attack against which the target is Weak to.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Frei (4 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: A pulsing mass of energy concentrates at the creature’s space, then bursts with searing force. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 15 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 3 nuke damage.

skills.name: Energy Drop (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A stimulating remedy opens one’s eyes against emotional malady. Choose a creature within range (60 feet). That creature recovers from Confuse, Fear, Despair, Rage, and Brainwash (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Makajama (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A mote of void magic applied to the mind has disastrous results. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Forget.

demons.background:
Makami, also written as Oguchi-no-Magami, is a divine beast in Japanese mythology. People originally feared the Makami, eventually that strong emotion deified the beast. The Makami can see into the hearts of humans, protecting those who are good but punishing those who are evil.
 It is often drawn on prayer boards used to ward evil, especially thefts and fire. But, there it is also feared as a human-eater. It is said that wolves became Makami.

demons.name: Shiisaa

traits.name: Raging Temper
traits.description: In the heat of the moment, you are easily angered. This irate tendency is fickle, but bears an easily drawn-upon strength. As an action, you enter a frenzied state. This grants you the effects of the Tarukaja Skill at no cost. Then, make a melee attack against yourself. If the result of all d6s in this attack are a 3 or higher, you are inflicted with Rage (see “Conditions”). You may willingly be inflicted with Rage this way.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Frei (4 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: A pulsing mass of energy concentrates at the creature’s space, then bursts with searing force. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 15 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 2 nuke damage.

skills.name: Skull Cracker (6 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: A splitting, lunging strike, made with a powerful force to the head sends the foe into a spin. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (-5 to hit, 10 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 2d8 + 2 physical damage. If the result of each d6 in the attack roll is 4 or higher, the target is afflicted with Confuse (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Rampage (8 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You unleash a rush of senseless attacks motivated from fury. Make three melee attacks against each creature within a 10-foot sphere centered at a point within range (-5 to hit, 10 feet). The first time an attack hits, each subsequent hit will use the same attack roll result as that first hit. For each hit, a creature receives 1d8 + 2 physical damage.

demons.background: Shisa is a Japanese protective spirit or guardian deity in Okinawan mythology. People place pairs of shisa on either their rooftops or flanking the gates to their houses, with the left shisa traditionally having a closed mouth and the right one an open mouth. The open mouth shisa wards off evil spirits while the closed mouth shisa keeps good spirits in.

demons.name: Black Ooze

traits.name: Foul Stench
traits.description:
A noxious, plague-like force infests foes. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -6 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Evil Touch (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A swirling infusion of dark forces spark fear into a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-4 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Fear (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Brain Jack (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You’re not asking anymore. You use magic to directly weave into the hearts of foes, seizing control of the field. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (-4 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Brainwash (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Foul Breath (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A wretched stench of numerous unnamed diseases engulfs a foe. Choose a creature within range. For the next 10 minutes, whenever the creature would be potentially inflicted with a Condition, flip a coin. If heads, the Condition is successfully inflicted. This effect is in addition to the original means by which they are inflicted by the Condition.

demons.background:
A slime, also commonly called ooze, are common types of monsters in many fantasy role-play games. True to their name, they don't usually have any distinct shape and appear as large masses of gelatinous fluid. Slimes and oozes vary between mediums, with some being intelligent and capable of assuming basic shapes with others being nothing more than brainless piles of goo that dissolve whatever matter becomes enveloped by their bodies.
 Like oozes, many slimes dwell underground, and most secrete an acid from their skin that dissolves flesh and other materials rapidly. In D&D, slimes are essentially blind, but more than make up for that with an ability called "blindsight," which allows them to discern nearby objects and creatures without needing to see them visually.

demons.name: Leanan Sidhe

traits.name: Skillful Technique
traits.description: You understand the art of striking vitals with all of your strength the moment willing. You may add your character level to the damage roll of any attack against which the target is Weak to.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -2 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 1 physical damage.

skills.name: Psio (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Orbs appear from your fingertips, homing in on a foe and blasting them with concentrated dissonance. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-4 to hit, 90 feet). On a hit, they receive 2d8 + 4 psychic damage.

skills.name: Marin Karin (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A gentle caress of the soul entices a foe into your service. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-4 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Brainwash (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Mudo (6 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Baleful words and rusted nails puncture into the foe. Choose a creature within range and make a ranged attack against them (-4 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 4 or higher, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points immediately. You have advantage on attack rolls with this Skill if the creature is Weak to Curse. This Skill provokes a One More if the target is weak to Curse.

demons.background: In Celtic folklore, the Irish leanan sídhe is a beautiful woman of the Aos Sí (or fairy folk) who takes a human lover. Lovers of the Leanan Sídhe are said to live brief, though highly inspired, lives. The Leanan Sídhe is generally depicted as a beautiful muse, who offers inspiration to an artist in exchange for fame and glory; however, this exchange frequently results in madness for the artist, and often premature death.

demons.name: Matador

traits.name: Fortify Spirit
traits.description: Your will is undeterred by afflictions. Dazzler, Makajama, Dormina, Pulinpa, Evil Touch, Ominous Words, Taunt, and Marin Karin type Skills have disadvantage against you.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Psi (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You clench your fingers into a fist, and a small coil of psychic energy closes around the target. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-4 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 2 psychic damage.

skills.name: Sukukaja (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A second wind blows past your ally, allowing for them to make a swift response. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, all attacks made by the creature are made with advantage, and all attacks made against the creature are made with disadvantage. You may target yourself with this Skill. If the creature is under the effects of Sukunda, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

skills.name: Swift Strike (8 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You deftly strike at each foe with blinding speed within an area. Make two melee attacks against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (-4 to hit, 20 feet). For each hit, a creature receives 1d8 + 3 physical damage.

demons.background: Matador, lit. "Bullfighter" in European Spanish and Portuguese, is derived from the late Latin word mactator, which means to subdue or kill. It is also the name of the toreros (sometimes called "toreadors" in English-speaking territories due to the influence of Carmen) that perform in the bullfighting events famous in Spain. Matador is one of the toreros, and the word literally means "killer," as it's the matador's job to kill the bull.

demons.name: Nekomata

traits.name: Foul Stench
traits.description:
A noxious, plague-like force infests foes. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -2 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Evil Touch (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A swirling infusion of dark forces spark fear into a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-4 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Fear (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Terror Claw (6 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: A wretched, serrated slash of a claw instills fear and bleeding wounds into an enemy. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (-4 to hit, 5 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 2d10 + 4 physical damage. If the result of each d6 in the attack roll is 5 or higher, the target is afflicted with Fear (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Hysterical Slap (6 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: A wild barrage of palm strikes elicits light damage and an irate response. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (-4 to hit, 5 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 2d8 + 4 physical damage. If the result of each d6 in the attack roll is 4 or higher, the target is afflicted with Rage (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: In Japanese folklore, a nekomata, also known as a bakeneko, is a type of yokai that appears as a cat with supernatural abilities akin to those of the fox or raccoon dog. A cat may become a bakeneko in a number of ways: it may reach a certain age, be kept for a certain number of years, grow to a certain size or be allowed to keep a long tail. In the last case, the tail forks in two and the bakeneko is then called a nekomata. This superstition may have some connection to the breeding of the Japanese Bobtail.

demons.name: Orobas

traits.name: Icy Glare
traits.description: Your cold gaze alleviates the pressure of foes from your allies. Whenever you or an ally within 60 feet of you would be afflicted with a Condition, roll 1d4. On a 4, the creature recovers from it

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Agi (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You fling a mote of flames at a target within range. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 3 fire damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Burned (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Marakunda (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You expose the weakest points of a group of foes, allowing for allies to move in. Choose up to six creatures within range. Those creatures gain the effects of Rakunda.

skills.name: Dekaja (12 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You erase all motes of strength for foes. Choose up to six creatures within range. All effects of Tarukaja, Rakukaja, Sukukaja are removed from them.

demons.background: According to the Lesser Key of Solomon, Orobas is the 55th demonic spirit and a powerful great prince of Hell who could give conjurers perfect information about the past, present or future, bestow honors, reconcile them with foes and protect them from being tempted by demons. He would never deceive anyone. He commands 20 legions of spirits (26 according to Harley 6483, considered the least reliable of the manuscripts). He supposedly also gives true answers of divinity and the creation of the world.

demons.name: Shiki-Ouji

traits.name: God Maker
traits.description:
It is in your presence and by your hand that your allies are enabled to forge legends. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever an allied creature, excluding yourself, rolls dice as part of a Trait’s effect (such as Counter, Gaia Pact, Mastery of Magic, etc), you may reroll the dice once. You must use the new result.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Double Shot (6 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: Twin bolts of force or gunfire strike a target. Make two ranged attacks against a creature within range (-4 to hit, 30 feet). For each hit, the creature receives 1d10 + Strength gun damage.

skills.name: Tarukaja (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Invigorating force emboldens an ally. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, whenever that creature rolls dice for a damage roll, they roll again, using whichever result is higher. You may target yourself with this Skill. If the creature is under the effects of Tarunda, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

skills.name: Taunt (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: The arcane art of irritation is infused within your goading and jeering, evoking frustration from a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-4 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Rage (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: The Shiki-Ouji (式王子*)? is an exceptionally powerful type of Shikigami that could only be summoned as a servant by the most elite of those that practiced the mystical arts of Yin and Yang. It could be used to scare away demons that cause sickness and to ward off disasters to its master. The Shikiouji's basic nature is said to be very close to that of an Oni and is thus very ferocious, making it very dangerous for average mystics to attempt to summon it.

demons.name: Sudama

traits.name: Foul Stench
traits.description:
A noxious, plague-like force infests foes. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -2 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 1 physical damage.

skills.name: Psi (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You clench your fingers into a fist, and a small coil of psychic energy closes around the target. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-4 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 4 psychic damage.

skills.name: Lucky Punch (2 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: You take a random swing, letting destiny do the work. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (-4 to hit, 10 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 1d10 + 1 physical damage. This Skill scores a Critical hit if the result of each d6 in its attack roll is 5 or higher.

skills.name: Tarukaja (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Invigorating force emboldens an ally. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, whenever that creature rolls dice for a damage roll, they roll again, using whichever result is higher. You may target yourself with this Skill. If the creature is under the effects of Tarunda, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

demons.background:
Sudama, whose name means "lurking souls", are mischievous one footed spirits that roam the mountains, dwelling in large and ancient trees, rocks and rivers. Sudama are born from the pure essence of the rocks and trees of lush, green mountains where few humans have set foot.
 Sudama never causes trouble, and sometimes takes human shape in order to watch over their mountain homes. Tradition holds that when you are in the mountains and get the feeling you are being watched, it is a Sudama watching you.
 They are sometimes identified with the Kodama.

demons.name: Suzaku

traits.name: Speed Master
traits.description:
You have a unique sense for agile tactics. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you may add a +5 bonus to the roll.
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you gain the effects of the Sukukaja Skill at no cost or action.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -2 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 1 physical damage.

skills.name: Frei (4 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: A pulsing mass of energy concentrates at the creature’s space, then bursts with searing force. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-4 to hit, 15 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 4 nuke damage.

skills.name: Tarunda (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You place a minor hex upon a foe, lessening their impact. Choose a creature within range (90 feet range). For 1 minute, whenever that creature rolls dice for a damage roll, they roll again, using whichever result is lower.  If the creature is under the effects of Tarukaja, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

skills.name: Dekunda (12 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You cleanse impurities of the heart. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). All effects of Tarunda, Rakunda, Sukunda are removed from them.

demons.background: The Zhu Que, also known as Vermilion Bird of the South or simply the Vermilion Bird, is one of the Four Symbols of the Chinese constellations (Si Xiang) along with Bai Hu, Xuan Wu and Qing Long. According to Wu Xing, the Taoist five-elemental system, it represents the fire element, the direction south and the season summer correspondingly. It is also known as Suzaku in Japan and Jujak in Korea. Suzaku is an elegant and noble bird in both appearance and behavior, it is very selective in what it eats and where it perches, with its feathers in many different hues of Vermilion.

demons.name: Flauros

traits.name: Gluttonmouth
traits.description: You rip and tear, devouring flesh and blood to heal yourself. Whenever you damage an enemy creature with a Physical or Gun Skill, you regain 2d4 hit points. You may only benefit from this ability once per turn.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Giant Slice (5 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: With a circular and calculated blow, you follow up with a sundering slice. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (-4 to hit, 10 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 1d10 + 4 physical damage. If this Skill is used with an action granted by a Baton Pass, the damage dealt is doubled.

skills.name: Dormin Rush (8 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A devastating blow to an area of heads knocks many unconscious. Make a melee attack against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (-4 to hit, 20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 4d8 + Strength physical damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, a creature is inflicted with Sleep (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Dekaja (12 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You erase all motes of strength for foes. Choose up to six creatures within range. All effects of Tarukaja, Rakukaja, Sukukaja are removed from them.

demons.background:
Flauros is the 64th demonic spirit of Ars Goetia. He is a great duke and appears at first as a mighty terrible and strong leopard but at the command of his summoner he assumes the shape of a man with fiery eyes and a terrible countenance.
 He can see the past and future, but unless he is commanded into a triangle he will lie in all those things. He will gladly talk of divinity and of the creation of the world, and of his and other spirits' falls from grace. He can control fire and burn all of his and his summoner's adversaries to death and will not suffer them to be tempted by any spirit or otherwise. He governs 36 legions of spirits.

demons.name: Izanagi

traits.name: God Maker
traits.description:
It is in your presence and by your hand that your allies are enabled to forge legends. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever an allied creature, excluding yourself, rolls dice as part of a Trait’s effect (such as Counter, Gaia Pact, Mastery of Magic, etc), you may reroll the dice once. You must use the new result.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Cross Slash (10 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Two devastating slashes across the foe splits them into pieces perpendicularly. Make two melee attacks against a creature within range with advantage (-4 to hit, 10 feet). For each hit, the creature receives 3d8 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Zionga (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Streams of uncontrolled electricity rain upon a small area. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 10-feet radius sphere centered at a point within range (-4 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 2 electric damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Shocked (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Tarukaja (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Invigorating force emboldens an ally. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, whenever that creature rolls dice for a damage roll, they roll again, using whichever result is higher. You may target yourself with this Skill. If the creature is under the effects of Tarunda, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

demons.background:
Izanagi (伊邪那岐, 伊弉諾) is a Japanese creation deity born of the seven divine generations in Japanese mythology. He is also referred to in various chronicles such as the Kojiki and Nihon Shiki as Izanagi-no-Mikoto (伊邪那岐命, 伊弉諾尊), the "male-who-invites."
 In marriage, he and Izanami have created many of the islands (all sans Onogoro Island) and deities of Japan. When Izanami died following the disastrous birth of Hi-no-Kagutsuchi, Izanagi slew the fire god out of grief stricken rage, then tried to retrieve her from the underworld, but failed. He mistakenly looks at her while she's in a rotting, monstrous state in the underworld, which shames her.

demons.name: Jikokuten

traits.name: Defense Master
traits.description:
You have a unique sense for defensive tactics. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you may add a +5 bonus to the roll.
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you gain the effects of the Rakukaja Skill at no cost or action.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Assault Dive (5 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: Momentum and forward force fling you forward through the air, striking atop a foe. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (-4 to hit, 15 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 2d8 + 3 physical damage. You move to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the target after attacking. This attack may not connect if movement to this space is prevented.

skills.name: Kill Rush (6 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You unfurl a flurry of attacks to beat a foe into submission. Make three melee attacks against a creature within range (-4 to hit, 5 feet). The first time an attack hits, each subsequent hit will use the same attack roll result as that first hit. For each hit, the creature receives 1d8 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Matarukaja (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A rallying cry and magic reinforcement strengthens your entire group. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures gain the effects of Tarukaja.

demons.background: Jikokuten (持國天), or Dhṛtarāṣṭra in Sanskrit, is a guardian deity with fierce expression that protects the east of Buddha's realm. He is associated with the color white. In China, he is regarded as being harmonious and compassionate, using his pipa to play music in order to convert others to Buddhism. In Japan, his statues mostly carry a sword. He is also the leader of the Gandharvas, the celestial musicians and messengers. His name means "he who upholds the realm/nation."

demons.name: Nigi Mitama

traits.name: Divine Grace
traits.description: Divine energies flow throughout you, catalyzing all healing forces. Whenever you would regain hit points from a Skill, you regain twice as many.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +6 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Baisudi (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A cleansing aura relieves physical energy. Choose a creature within range (60 feet). That creature recovers from Burn, Freeze, and Shock (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Diarama (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Spiraling angelic light envelops an ally to rejuvenate them. Choose a creature within range. That creature regains 3d8 + 5 hit points.

skills.name: Kouha (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A wisp of light illuminates and strikes a target. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 2 bless damage.

demons.background: In Japanese belief, Nigi Mitama is the calm and functional state of a person's soul, or kami, which is considered to be the opposite of Ara Mitama. The Ara Mitama must first be pacified with rites and worship before the Nigi Mitama will appear.

demons.name: Nue

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Curse)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage. Add a 2d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills of the chosen element. At 15h level, this bonus is increased by 1d8 (3d8).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Eiha (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Small tendrils of darkness slither from the earth and sting your target. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 3d8 + 2 curse damage.

skills.name: Skull Cracker (6 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: A splitting, lunging strike, made with a powerful force to the head sends the foe into a spin. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 10 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 2d8 + 3 physical damage. If the result of each d6 in the attack roll is 4 or higher, the target is afflicted with Confuse (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Mudo (6 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Baleful words and rusted nails puncture into the foe. Choose a creature within range and make a ranged attack against them (+4 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 4 or higher, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points immediately. You have advantage on attack rolls with this Skill if the creature is Weak to Curse. This Skill provokes a One More if the target is weak to Curse.

demons.background:
A legendary monster in Japanese mythology. Nue has the head of a monkey, the arms and legs of a tiger, body of a raccoon dog and a snake for a tail.
 According to The Tale of the Heike, Emperor Konoe, the Emperor of Japan, became sick after having terrible nightmares every night, and a dark cloud appeared at two o'clock in the morning on the roof of the palace in Kyoto during the summer of 1153. The story says that the samurai Minamoto no Yorimasa staked-out the roof one night and fired an arrow into the cloud, out of which fell a dead Nue. Yorimasu then supposedly sank the body in the Sea of Japan.

demons.name: Oni

traits.name: Retaliating Body
traits.description:
Your deft parry and reversal of force eviscerates unwary attackers. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you would be targeted by a Physical or Gun Skill, roll 1d4. On a 4, you Repel that attack (see “Resistances” in the Combat section).
 • Whenever damage would be dealt to attackers by you through an effect that Repels, the damage dealt is doubled.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +1 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Rampage (8 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You unleash a rush of senseless attacks motivated from fury. Make three melee attacks against each creature within a 10-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+3 to hit, 10 feet). The first time an attack hits, each subsequent hit will use the same attack roll result as that first hit. For each hit, a creature receives 1d8 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Snap (3 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: A pinpoint, puncturing strike penetrates the opponent’s defenses. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 15 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 1d10 + 4 gun damage.

demons.background: Oni (鬼) are creatures from Japanese folklore, variously translated as demons, devils, ogres or trolls. They are popular characters in Japanese art, literature and theater. Oni are known for attacking villages and plundering food, riches and women.

demons.name: Orthrus

traits.name: Thermal Conduct
traits.description:
Conductive energies overheat a vulnerable foe. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you attempt to inflict a Downed creature with Burn (see “Conditions”), flip a coin. If heads, the Condition is inflicted.
 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Agilao (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A cacophonous  burst of pyrotechnics razes the target with a high chance of burn. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+5 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 2d8 + 2 fire damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 3 or higher, the target is also Burned (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Matarukaja (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A rallying cry and magic reinforcement strengthens your entire group. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures gain the effects of Tarukaja.

demons.background: Orthrus was a two-headed dog and one of the many monsters sired by Typhon and Echidna from Greek mythology. Among his siblings were Cerberus, Sphinx and Chimera to name but a few. Orthrus was the dog of the Titan Geryon, and along with Eurytion, was the guardian of Geryon's herd of red cattle. Geryon, Eurytion and Orthrus were all slain when Heracles was completing the tenth of his twelve labors.

demons.name: Yaksini

traits.name: Attack Master
traits.description:
You have a unique sense for offensive tactics. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you may add a +5 bonus to the roll.
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you gain the effects of the Tarukaja Skill at no cost or action.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Hysterical Slap (6 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: A wild barrage of palm strikes elicits light damage and an irate response. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 5 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 2d8 + 3 physical damage. If the result of each d6 in the attack roll is 4 or higher, the target is afflicted with Rage (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Wage War (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A magical decree of war creates a tension, a pressure to enter a frenzy  within the battlefield. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (+4 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Rage (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Oni-Kagura (12 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A demonic dance swirls about and punctures foes in vital points. Make a melee attack against up to six creatures within range (+4 to hit, 20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 2d8 + 3 physical damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, a creature is inflicted with Rage (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: A yaksini (Sanskrit: यक्षिणी, yakṣiṇī) is the female counterpart of the male yaksa, and they both attend to Kubera (also called Kuber), the Hindu god of wealth who rules in the mythical Himalayan kingdom of Alaka. Yaksini are often depicted as beautiful and voluptuous, with wide hips, narrow waists, broad shoulders and exaggerated, spherical breasts. In the Uddamareshvara Tantra, thirty-six yaksini are described, including their mantras and ritual prescriptions. A similar list of yaksas and yaksini is given in the Tantraraja Tantra, where it says that these beings are givers of whatever is desired.

demons.name: Anzu

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Wind)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage. Add a 2d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills of the chosen element. At 15h level, this bonus is increased by 1d8 (3d8)

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Garula (6 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A twister lifts up a foe in its clutches, causing them to stutter and lose balance. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 4d8 + 3 wind damage.

skills.name: Masukukaja (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You accelerate each of your allies to rapid speeds. Choose up to six creatures within range. Those creatures gain the effects of Sukukaja.

skills.name: Element Break (15 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You reach out your hand, and crush a foe’s resilience to your attack. When you use this Skill, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, or Nuke and up to six creatures within range (90 feet). For the next three rounds starting to count down at the end of this one, those creatures no longer Resist, Block, Drain, or Repel the chosen damage type. Additionally, this Skill removes all Tetrakarn and Makarakarn effects from affected creatures.

demons.background:
Anzu, also known as Zu, Anzud or Imdugud, was a demonic tempest bird in Mesopotamian mythology.
 In his most famous mythical role, Anzu steals the Tablets of Destinies from Enlil, the lord of the wind. These objects gave the power to control fate to whoever possessed them, which in Mesopotamian mythology amounted to being able to control the universe.

demons.name: Fuu-Ki

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Wind)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage. Add a 2d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills of the chosen element. At 15h level, this bonus is increased by 1d8 (3d8)

Additionally, this Skill removes all Tetrakarn and Makarakarn effects from affected creatures.

skills.name: Tarukaja (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Invigorating force emboldens an ally. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, whenever that creature rolls dice for a damage roll, they roll again, using whichever result is higher. You may target yourself with this Skill. If the creature is under the effects of Tarunda, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

demons.background: Fuu-Ki (風鬼) whose name means "Wind Oni" is one of the four oni that was summoned by Fujiwara-No-Chikata (藤原千方) during the mid-Heian period. Fuu-Ki can harness powerful winds which it uses to blow away enemies.

Make a melee attack against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+4 to hit, 20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 2d8 + 4 physical damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, a creature is inflicted with Despair (see “Conditions'').

skills.description: You coordinate the defense of your allies, covering flanks and shielding them from danger. Choose up to six creatures within range. Those creatures gain the effects of Rakukaja.

skills.name: Power Charge (15 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You begin amassing your strength and stamina, coalescing into an ultimate strike. The next damage roll you make for an attack that deals Physical or Gun damage within the next 10 minutes is doubled.

demons.background: Kin-Ki (金鬼) whose name means "Gold Oni" is one of the four oni controlled by Fujiwara No Chikata (藤原千方) during the mid-Heian period of Japan. Kin-Ki's body is so strong that no physical weapons in existence can pierce it.

demons.name: Naga

traits.name: Striking Weight

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +6 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Zionga (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Streams of uncontrolled electricity rain upon a small area. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 10-feet radius sphere centered at a point within range (+4 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 2 electric damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Shocked (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Power Slash (5 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: A powerful stroke with a trained arm causes immense injury. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 5 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 2d10 + 1d8 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Memory Blow (6 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You focus your inner strength, and unleash it as a thunderous burst from yourself. Make a melee attack against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+4 to hit, 20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 2d8 + 2 physical damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, a creature is inflicted with Forget (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: The naga are divine, semi-divine deities or a semi-divine race of half-human half-serpent beings that reside in the underworld (Patala) and can occasionally take human form. They are principally depicted in three forms: wholly human with snakes on the heads and necks, common serpents or as half-human half-snake beings. A female naga is a "nagi," "nagin" or "nagini," and are said to be both beautiful and clever. Nagaraja is seen as the king of nagas. They are common and hold cultural significance in the mythological traditions of many South Asian and Southeast Asian cultures.

demons.name: Rakshasa

 • Whenever damage would be dealt to attackers by you through an effect that Repels, the damage dealt is doubled

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Giant Slice (5 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: With a circular and calculated blow, you follow up with a sundering slice. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 10 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 1d10 + 4 physical damage. If this Skill is used with an action granted by a Baton Pass, the damage dealt is doubled.

skills.name: Element Wall (10 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You form a draining barrier that protects an ally. When you use this Skill, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, or Nuke. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For the next three rounds, starting to count down at the end of this one, the creature is no longer Weak to the chosen damage type, and receives half as much damage from that type (this effect is independent from and stacks with Resist).

skills.name: Mind Slice (12 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A cruel cleave sunders mind and body. Make a melee attack against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+3 to hit, 20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 2d8 + 4 physical damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, a creature is inflicted with Confuse (see “Conditions'').

demons.background:
A rakshasa is a demon or unrighteous spirit in Hindu and Buddhist mythology. Rakshasas are also called cannibals.
 According to the Ramayana, rakshasas were created from Brahma's foot; other sources claim they are descended from Pulastya, or from Khasa, or from Nirrti and Nirrita. Ravana is said to be the king of rakshasas.

demons.name: Sandman

traits.name: Ghost Nest
traits.description:
Ethereal claws of your will aid in penetrating the defenses of others. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you attempt to inflict a Downed creature with a Condition, roll 1d4. On a 4, the Condition is inflicted.
 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +7 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Dormina (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Soft ripples froth below foe, attempting to sap their strength into exhaustion. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Sleep (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Garula (6 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A twister lifts up a foe in its clutches, causing them to stutter and lose balance. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 2d8 + 3 wind damage.

skills.name: Dormin Rush (12 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A devastating blow to an area of heads knocks many unconscious. Make a melee attack against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+5 to hit, 20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 2d8 + 2 physical damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, a creature is inflicted with Sleep (see “Conditions”).

demons.background:
Originating from Northern European lore (specifically rural Germany), the Sandman is a faerie that is rumored to put people to sleep by sprinkling magical sand onto the eyes of children while they sleep at night. The rheum in one's eyes upon waking is believed to be the result of the Sandman's work the previous evening.
 If a victim resisted, he would sit on their eyelids to force them to sleep. For bad children who still wouldn't sleep, he would scoop their eyes out.

demons.name: Sui-Ki

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Ice)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage. Add a 2d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills of the chosen element. At 15h level, this bonus is increased by 1d8 (3d8)

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Sledgehammer (6 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: A most cruel and devastating overhead blow sends foes into dizzying fits. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 5 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 2d8 + 2 physical damage. If the result of each d6 in the attack roll is 4 or higher, the target is afflicted with Dizzy (see “Conditions”).

Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (+4 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Rage (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: Sui-Ki (水鬼) whose name means "Water Oni" is of the four oni controlled by Fujiwara-no-Chikata (藤原千方) during the mid-Heian period. Sui-ki can freeze anything to the core.

 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 physical damage.

skills.description: A swirling infusion of dark forces spark fear into a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Fear (see “Conditions”).

skills.description: A wretched, serrated slash of a claw instills fear and bleeding wounds into an enemy. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 5 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 2d10 + 2 physical damage. If the result of each d6 in the attack roll is 4 or higher, the target is afflicted with Fear (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Ghastly Wail (16 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Dark energy pours from your mouth, manifesting in a banshee’s cry that severs the souls of the weak-willed. This Skill affects all creatures within range, including yourself and allies. Each creature afflicted by the Fear condition (see “Conditions”) within range is reduced to 0 hit points immediately.

demons.background: According to the writings in The Lesser Key of Solomon, Andras is the sixty-third demonic spirit listed in Ars Goetia. Among the spirits of the Goetia, Andras is one of the most violent and dangerous to summon. The conjurer and any attendants he may have must stay within a magic circle at all times no matter how much Andras tempts them to leave it, or he will surely kill them. He is able to control a person's anger or inflict rage upon any person the conjurer desires and tempt people to kill their servants or masters. If so asked, Andras will gladly kill any person the conjurer desires, and in certain demonology it is suggested that Flauros is his servant.

demons.name: Choronzon

traits.name: Draining Mouth
traits.description: Whenever you damage an enemy creature with a Physical or Gun Skill, you regain 1d4 hit points. Whenever you damage an enemy creature with a Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty Skill, you regain 1d4 spell points

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +1 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Life Drain (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You reach out, savoring life force from a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 7 almighty damage, and you regain 7 hit points.

skills.name: Eiga (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Nameless, formless thoughts of despondency and malice coalesce to harm the foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 2d8 + 3 curse damage.

skills.name: Rampage (8 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You unleash a rush of senseless attacks motivated from fury. Make three melee attacks against each creature within a 10-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+3 to hit, 10 feet). The first time an attack hits, each subsequent hit will use the same attack roll result as that first hit. For each hit, a creature receives 1d8 + 2 physical damage

demons.background: Choronzon, known as the Dweller in the Abyss or the Demon of Dispersion, is a demon known to hold vast amounts of knowledge that was summoned by Aleister Crowley. Crowley was supposedly attempting to gain wisdom from the 11th order of demons. However, the summoned Choronzon inflicted severe suffering on Crowley's disciples. Crowley was later said to either succeed in gaining wisdom, or was possessed instead. It is the last hurdle in conquering the dark side of the ego.

demons.name: Clotho

traits.name: Insta-Heal
traits.description: With refined mental discipline and calming strategies, you are able to dispel maladies before they strike. At the end of your turn while afflicted with a Condition, flip a coin. If heads, you recover from it.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +7 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 1 physical damage.

skills.name: Hamaon (12 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Divine will and an excess of banishing rights and rituals consecrate the creature’s space, purging it of evil and existence. Choose a creature within range and make a ranged attack against them (+5 to hit, 90 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 3 or higher, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points immediately. You have advantage on attack rolls with this Skill if the creature is Weak to Bless. This Skill provokes a One More if the target is weak to Bless.

skills.name: Me Patra (6 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A moment of clarity and focus clears the spirit. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Each of those creatures recover from Dizzy, Forget, and Sleep (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Makajamaon (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A psionic abyss springs forth from your fingertips, draining the memories of a field of foes. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (+5 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Forget (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: Clotho is the youngest of the three Moirae Sisters, and is derived from the Greek personification of fate. Clotho spins the thread of life. Clotho was responsible for spinning the thread of human life. She also made major decisions, such as when a person was born, thus in effect controlling people's lives. This power enabled her not only to choose who was born, but also to decide when gods or mortals were to be saved or put to death.

demons.name: Isis

traits.name: Deathly Illness
traits.description: You wield the secrets of eradication. You have advantage on attacks made for Hama, Hamaon, Samsara, Mudo, Mudoon, and Die for Me!.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +6 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Kouga (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Twin blades of pure light manifest, puncturing the foe on each side. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 2d8 + 4 bless damage.

skills.name: Hamaon (12 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Divine will and an excess of banishing rights and rituals consecrate the creature’s space, purging it of evil and existence. Choose a creature within range and make a ranged attack against them (+4 to hit, 90 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 3 or higher, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points immediately. You have advantage on attack rolls with this Skill if the creature is Weak to Bless. This Skill provokes a One More if the target is weak to Bless.

skills.name: Diarama (9 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Spiraling angelic light envelops an ally to rejuvenate them. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). That creature regains 3d8 + Magic hit points.

demons.background: Isis, also known as Aset or Eset, was a mother goddess in ancient Egyptian religious beliefs, whose worship spread throughout the Greco-Roman world. She was worshiped as the ideal mother and wife, patron of nature and magic; friend of slaves, sinners, artisans and the downtrodden, as well as listening to the prayers of the wealthy, maidens, aristocrats and rulers.

demons.name: Lamia

traits.name: Foul Stench
traits.description:
A noxious, plague-like force infests foes. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Agilao (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A cacophonous  burst of pyrotechnics razes the target with a high chance of burn. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 2d8 + 2 fire damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 3 or higher, the target is also Burned (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Rising Slash (9 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: As a follow-up, you carry momentum through a blade to cleave a foe in two from under it. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 10 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 3d10 + 4 physical damage. If this Skill is used with an action granted by a Baton Pass, the damage dealt is doubled.

skills.name: Ominous Words (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You whisper terrible, forbidden knowledge that plunges a foe closer to madness. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Despair (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: According to Greek mythology, Lamia was a Libyan queen who fell in love with Zeus and bore him children. Hera became enraged and murdered all of Lamia's children (one version of the tale claims that Hera forced Lamia to kill and eat her own children). Lamia went insane with grief and began kidnapping and eating children, eventually turning into a hideous monster as a result. Legend states that Zeus granted Lamia the ability to remove her own eyes at will so she would not see her dead children when she closed her eyes. In some sources, Lamia became a Naga.

demons.name: Orpheus

traits.name: Circle of Sadness
traits.description: A morbid ring of protection wards you against falling to despair. When you would be reduced to 0 hit points by a hostile attack, you are reduced to 1 hit point instead. Once this ability is used, you cannot use it again until you fully recover from a Short Rest

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +1 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Cadenza (32 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Orpheus plays a magical, enchanting melody to support the party’s rush. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures regain 3d8 + 5 hit points. Each of those creatures gain the effects of Sukukaja.

skills.name: Agilao (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A cacophonous  burst of pyrotechnics razes the target with a high chance of burn. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 2d8 + 2 fire damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 3 or higher, the target is also Burned (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Marakukaja (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You coordinate the defense of your allies, covering flanks and shielding them from danger. Choose up to six creatures within range. Those creatures gain the effects of Rakukaja.

demons.background: In Greek mythology, Orpheus was the son of Thracian king Oeagrus and the muse Calliope (some versions have Orpheus' father as the god Apollo). Apollo, fond of Orpheus, gave him a small golden lyre, which he quickly mastered. Taught to sing verses by his mother, Orpheus was so skilled at making music that he was called "Master of Strings" and "Father of Songs," capable of such music that even rocks and animals would be compelled to dance.

demons.name: Pisaca

traits.name: Fortify Spirit
traits.description: Your will is undeterred by afflictions. Dazzler, Makajama, Dormina, Pulinpa, Evil Touch, Ominous Words, Taunt, and Marin Karin type Skills have disadvantage against you.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Mudoon (12 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Darkness and malevolent spirits crush the victim’s will. Choose a creature within range and make a ranged attack against them (+4 to hit, 90 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 3 or higher, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points immediately. You have advantage on attack rolls with this Skill if the creature is Weak to Curse. This Skill provokes a One More if the target is weak to Curse.

skills.name: Stagnant Air (5 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: The air becomes riddled and ripe with foul energy, Disease and wretched magic begins to flow and infest more easily. This Skill affects all creatures within range, including yourself and allies (30 feet). For the next 10 minutes, whenever an affected creature would be potentially inflicted with a Condition, flip a coin. If heads, the Condition is successfully inflicted. This effect is in addition to the original means by which they are inflicted by the Condition.

skills.name: Abysmal Surge (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You blanket the minds and bodies of a battlefield in hopelessness and magic devoid of reason. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (+4 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Despair (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: Pisacas are demonic creatures that feast on human meat, especially corpses. They are mentioned to be on the same level as other abominations, such as Rakshasa, and are considered to be the physical incarnation of ignus fatuus. The origin of their names is believed to have been a result of the demonization of Hindu tribes by Aryan people.

demons.name: Setanta

traits.name: Retaliating Body
traits.description:
Your deft parry and reversal of force eviscerates unwary attackers. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you would be targeted by a Physical or Gun Skill, roll 1d4. On a 4, you Repel that attack (see “Resistances” in the Combat section).
 • Whenever damage would be dealt to attackers by you through an effect that Repels, the damage dealt is doubled

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Rising Slash (9 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: As a follow-up, you carry momentum through a blade to cleave a foe in two from under it. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 10 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 3d10 + 4 physical damage. If this Skill is used with an action granted by a Baton Pass, the damage dealt is doubled.

skills.name: Power Charge (15 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You begin amassing your strength and stamina, coalescing into an ultimate strike. The next damage roll you make for an attack that deals Physical or Gun damage within the next 10 minutes is doubled.

skills.name: Rebellion (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Golden light of obstinance heightens an ally’s ability to deliver punishment. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, attacks the creature makes score a Critical hit if the result of each d6 is a 5 or higher.

demons.background: Setanta is Cu Chulainn's given name. He obtained his more well-known alias when he killed Culann's guard dog in self-defense and volunteered to take its place ("Cu Chulainn" means "Culann's Hound").

demons.name: Take-Minakata

traits.name: Defense Master
traits.description:
You have a unique sense for defensive tactics. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you may add a +5 bonus to the roll.
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you gain the effects of the Rakukaja Skill at no cost or action.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +1 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Zionga (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Streams of uncontrolled electricity rain upon a small area. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 10-feet radius sphere centered at a point within range (+3 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 3 electric damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Shocked (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Assault Dive (5 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: Momentum and forward force fling you forward through the air, striking atop a foe. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 15 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 2d8 + 2 physical damage. You move to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the target after attacking. This attack may not connect if movement to this space is prevented.

skills.name: Swift Strike (8 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You deftly strike at each foe with blinding speed within an area. Make two melee attacks against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+3 to hit, 20 feet). For each hit, a creature receives 1d8 + 2 physical damage.

demons.background: Take-Minakata-no-kami (kanji: 建御名方神), is one of the sons of Okuninushi. When the Amatsu decided to increase their influence on the earth, they sent Take-Mikazuchi to conquer Take-Minakata. They had the first sumo match which Take-Mikazuchi won. Take-Minakata then had his arms cut and fled to Suwa, where he married a Suwa goddess, Yasakatome, and became the guardian god. The local legend believed the cracking phenomenon on the icy Lake Suwa in every winter to be the "Passage of God" (御神渡り, Omiwatari, scientifically the result of pressure ridge). Take-Minakata leaves his temple via the frozen lake to the opposite bank to meet the goddess.

demons.name: Tam Lin

traits.name: Sharp Student
traits.description:
Your skill and cunning allows you to avoid the worst of impacts. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever a creature scores a Critical hit against you from each d6 of it's attack being 6, the Critical hit becomes a normal hit.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Brain Shake (6 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: Piercing blows strike the foe, attempting to interface with their mind. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 5 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 2d10 + 3 physical damage. If the result of each d6 in the attack roll is 4 or higher, the target is afflicted with Brainwash (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Brain Buster (16 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Tendrils of electrical, interfacing magic emerge from your fingertips to eviscerate and seize control of an army. Make a melee attack against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+3 to hit, 20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 4d8 + 3 physical damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, a creature is inflicted with Brainwash (see “Conditions'').

skills.name: Rebellion (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Golden light of obstinance heightens an ally’s ability to deliver punishment. Choose a creature within range. For 1 minute, attacks the creature makes score a Critical hit if the result of each d6 is a 5 or higher.

demons.background: Tam Lin is a famous fairy who was said to haunt Carterhaugh Wood in England. He supposedly lured young women away to ruin them. He was once a human who had been trapped by the Fairy Queen. A young woman named Janet is said to have fallen in love with him at one point, and finally managed to free him.

demons.name: Ara Mitama

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Nuke)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage. Add a 2d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills of the chosen element. At 15h level, this bonus is increased by 1d8 (3d8)

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Freila (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A mass of plasma flings from you like artillery through the skies, and bursts on impact. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 90 feet). On a hit, they receive 4d8 + 3 nuke damage.

skills.name: Marakunda (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You expose the weakest points of a group of foes, allowing for allies to move in. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures gain the effects of Rakunda.

skills.name: Matarukaja (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A rallying cry and magic reinforcement strengthens your entire group. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures gain the effects of Tarukaja.

demons.background: In Japanese belief, Ara Mitama represents aggression and forcefulness and is the source of valor, anger, passion and other heated emotions. It is said to be the more wild and untamed side of the dualistic nature of the spirit. It is usually considered opposite to Nigi Mitama.

demons.name: Ariadne

traits.name: Tag Team
traits.description:
Cooperation can mitigate costs for body and soul. You gain the following benefits:
 • If an ally uses an ability with an action granted by you Baton Passing to them, the ally’s use of that ability is not expended (for example, if an ally uses Down Shot with an action granted by your Baton Pass, their use of Down Shot is not expended).
 • Whenever you perform a Baton Pass to grant an extra action to an ally, you regain 1d8 + half your level Spell Points (min 1).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Beast Weaver (15 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: You raise your hand, as glowing threads of arcane portent coalesce into that of a great beast’s maw, crushing the foe and restricting their movements. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+2 to hit, 20 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 3d10 + 4 physical damage. Additionally, on a hit, for the next 1 minute, damage dealt by the creature is halved.

skills.name: Miracle Punch (4 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: You seize the opportunity that fate has laid before you, making this strike count. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (+2 to hit, 10 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 2d10 + 4 physical damage. This Skill scores a Critical hit if the result of each d6 in its attack roll is 5 or higher.

skills.name: Power Charge (15 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You begin amassing your strength and stamina, coalescing into an ultimate strike. The next damage roll you make for an attack that deals Physical or Gun damage within the next 10 minutes is doubled

demons.background: Ariadne was the daughter of King Minos of Crete, the owner of the Minotaur. When Theseus came to Crete to end Minos's annual demands that Athens send 7 men and 7 women to sacrifice to the Minotaur, Ariadne fell in love with Theseus. She gave him a sword to fight the Minotaur and a ball of string so he would be able to find his way out of the labyrinth

demons.name: Kurama Tengu

traits.name: Skillful Technique
traits.description: You understand the art of striking vitals with all of your strength the moment willing. You may add your character level to the damage roll of any attack against which the target is Weak to.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Masukunda (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You bind and slow a group of enemies, allowing you to act faster than them. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures gain the effects of Sukunda.

skills.name: Bufula (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Spiked snowflakes snap and burst all around a creature. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+5 bonus, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 2d8 + 2 ice damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Frozen (see “Conditions”)

skills.name: Garula (6 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A twister lifts up a foe in its clutches, causing them to stutter and lose balance. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 2d8 + 2 wind damage

demons.background:
Kurama Tengu (鞍馬天狗) are the most powerful and well-known of the Japanese Tengu who were said to live in Mt. Kurama in Kyoto. The Kurama-Tengu are not only said to be exceptional warriors, but also have the ability to fend off disease and bring good luck.
 The king of the tengu, Sōjōbō (僧正坊), is one of the Kurama Tengu, and in the 12th century was said to have taught Ushiwakamaru, the future famous warrior Minamoto No Yoshitsune, the arts of swordsmanship, tactics and magic.

demons.name: Neko Shogun

traits.name: Defense Master
traits.description:
You have a unique sense for defensive tactics. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you may add a +5 bonus to the roll.
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you gain the effects of the Rakukaja Skill at no cost or action

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Psio (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Orbs appear from your fingertips, homing in on a foe and blasting them with concentrated dissonance. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 90 feet). On a hit, they receive 2d8 + 3 psychic damage.

skills.name: Diarama (9 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Spiraling angelic light envelops an ally to rejuvenate them. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). That creature regains 3d8 + 7 hit points.

skills.name: Masukukaja (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You accelerate each of your allies to rapid speeds. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures gain the effects of Sukukaja.

demons.background: Neko Shogun is a divine general in the image of a cat. Originally, he was a Chinese general who conquered Vietnam: Mao Shangshu (毛尚書). The people decided to dedicate a temple to him and worship him as god. However, due to the surname Mao (毛) sounding very similar to the Chinese word for cat (貓), the temple was accidentally misnamed. Thus, the Temple of General Mao became known as Temple of General Cat (貓將軍).

demons.name: Principality

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Bless)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage. Add a 2d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills of the chosen element. At 15h level, this bonus is increased by 1d8 (3d8)

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Kouga (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Twin blades of pure light manifest, puncturing the foe on each side. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 4d8 + 3 bless damage

skills.name: Makajamaon (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A psionic abyss springs forth from your fingertips, draining the memories of a field of foes. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (+4 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Forget (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Tetraja (5 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Divine strength fills your allies, warding them from peril. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). The next time, within the next 10 minutes, they would instantly be reduced to 0 hit points from a Hama or Mudo type Skill, or from Door of Hades, the effect is prevented completely.

demons.background: Principalities, also known as Rulers, are angels of the Third Sphere in Christian angelology with the duty to carry out the orders given to them by the Dominions and bequeath blessings to the material world. The Principalities preside over bands of angels and charge them with fulfilling the divine ministry. Their task is to oversee groups of people. They are usually controlled by the chief angel Erebiel.

demons.name: Zouchouten

traits.name: Sharp Student
traits.description:
Your skill and cunning allows you to avoid the worst of impacts. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever a creature scores a Critical hit against you from each d6 of it's attack being 6, the Critical hit becomes a normal hit

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -1 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Giant Slice (5 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: With a circular and calculated blow, you follow up with a sundering slice. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (+2 to hit, 10 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 1d10 + 3 physical damage. If this Skill is used with an action granted by a Baton Pass, the damage dealt is doubled

skills.name: Zionga (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Streams of uncontrolled electricity rain upon a small area. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 10-feet radius sphere centered at a point within range (+2 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 1d8 + 2 electric damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Shocked (see “Conditions”)

skills.name: Swift Strike (8 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You deftly strike at each foe with blinding speed within an area. Make two melee attacks against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+2 to hit, 20 feet). For each hit, a creature receives 1d8 + 3 physical damage.

demons.background: Zouchouten (増長天), also known by the Sanskrit name Virūḍhaka, is the guardian deity that guards the South of Buddha's realm. His name means "lengthening good deeds among mortals." He has green skin and leads the troop of Kumbhandas and Pretas. His statues usually carry either a sword or polearm.
