demons.name: Anubis

traits.name: Deathly Illness
traits.description: You wield the secrets of eradication. You have advantage on attacks made for Hama, Hamaon, Samsara, Mudo, Mudoon, and Die for Me!.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Mudoon (12 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Darkness and malevolent spirits crush the victim’s will. Choose a creature within range and make a ranged attack against them (+4 to hit, 90 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 3 or higher, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points immediately. You have advantage on attack rolls with this Skill if the creature is Weak to Curse. This Skill provokes a One More if the target is weak to Curse.

skills.name: Hamaon (12 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Divine will and an excess of banishing rights and rituals consecrate the creature’s space, purging it of evil and existence. Choose a creature within range and make a ranged attack against them (+4 to hit, 90 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 3 or higher, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points immediately. You have advantage on attack rolls with this Skill if the creature is Weak to Bless. This Skill provokes a One More if the target is weak to Bless.

skills.name: Dekunda (12 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You cleanse impurities of the heart. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). All effects of Tarunda, Rakunda, Sukunda are removed from them.

demons.background: Anubis is widely known as the Egyptian deity of mummification. In this role, he oversees the mummification process of the dead, and is usually seen in hieroglyphic tomb-carvings as overseeing the burial ritual for the pharaohs and those of royal lineage; this is due to the priest involved wearing the masks of Anubis to symbolize him as the overseer of the ritual.

demons.name: Decarabia

traits.name: Thermal Conduct
traits.description:
Conductive energies overheat a vulnerable foe. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you attempt to inflict a Downed creature with Burn (see “Conditions”), flip a coin. If heads, the Condition is inflicted.
 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +6 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Agidyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A pillar-shaped conflagration erupts, spiraling about and enveloping a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 4d8 + 3 fire damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Burned (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Tetrakarn (20 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You form a physical shield that blocks all kinetic force from penetrating. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). That creature Repels the next attack they receive within the next 10 minutes that deals Physical or Gun damage (see “Damage”).

skills.name: Megidola (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Glowing, star-like spheres manifest above the field, then fire beams of destructive force by the dozens into foes. Make a ranged attack against up to six creatures within range (60 feet). On a hit, they receive 2d8 + 3 almighty damage.

demons.background:
Decarabia, also known as Carabia, is the sixty-ninth demonic spirit listed in Ars Goetia, according to the writings in the Lesser Key of Solomon. Although he has no title in the Pseudomonarchia Daemonum, he does in the Lesser Key of Solomon where he is a Great Marquis of Hell and has thirty legions of demons under his command.
 When summoned, Decarabia appears as a pentagram star, although he will take the form of a man if the conjurer requests it. He knows the properties and values of all herbs and precious stones, and can transform into any type of bird to sing and fly for his conjurer, sometimes acting as his animal familiar.

demons.name: Lachesis

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Ice)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage. Add a 2d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills of the chosen element. At 15h level, this bonus is increased by 1d8 (3d8)

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +6 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 1 physical damage.

skills.name: Bufula (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Spiked snowflakes snap and burst all around a creature. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+4 bonus, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 4d8 + 3 ice damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Frozen (see “Conditions”)

skills.name: Mabaisudi (6 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Physiological aid relieves the flesh of injury. Choose up to six creatures within range (60 feet). Each of those creatures recover from Burn, Freeze, and Shock (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Marakukaja (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You coordinate the defense of your allies, covering flanks and shielding them from danger. Choose up to six creatures within range. Those creatures gain the effects of Rakukaja.

demons.background: In Greek mythology, Lachesis, also known as Lakhesis ("disperser of lots"), was the second of the Moirae Sisters, or Moirae. She was the apportioner, deciding how much time for life was to be allowed for each person or being. She measured the thread of life with her rod. She is also said to choose a person's destiny after a thread was measured.

demons.name: Lilim

traits.name: Cold-Blooded
traits.description:
With reptilian cruelty, you freeze a foe. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you attempt to inflict a Downed creature with Freeze (see “Conditions”), flip a coin. If heads, the Condition is inflicted.
 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +7 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 1 physical damage.

skills.name: Bufula (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Spiked snowflakes snap and burst all around a creature. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+5 bonus, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 2d8 + 4 ice damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Frozen (see “Conditions”)

skills.name: Lullaby (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Exhaustive magic siphons the energy from the room, casting a battlefield to dreamlands. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (+5 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Sleep (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Spirit Drain (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You sate your aural thirst with the magical powers and thoughts of your foe, absorbing their essence. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+5 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, the creature loses and you regain 8 Spell Points.

demons.background:
The Lilim, or Lilin, are dangerous demons similar to succubi that reside in Hell. The Lilim were conceived through Lilith alone, though some of them came from the union of herself and Samael, the angel of death.
 Men feared the Lilim for this reason and women also feared the Lilim because it is believed that they kidnap children like their mother Lilith. They are amazingly beautiful and strongly resemble their mother. The Lilim are said to bring harm to human children, and to seduce men who are caught in their gaze. Like their mother, they drain men of their essence.

demons.name: Mitra

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Bless)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage. Add a 2d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills of the chosen element. At 15h level, this bonus is increased by 1d8 (3d8)

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +6 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 1 physical damage.

skills.name: Kouga (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Twin blades of pure light manifest, puncturing the foe on each side. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 4d8 + 4 bless damage

skills.name: Diarama (9 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Spiraling angelic light envelops an ally to rejuvenate them. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). That creature regains 3d8 + 8 hit points.

skills.name: Thermopylae (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: The intense heat of battle allows you to turn the tide. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures gain the effects of Tarukaja, Rakukaja, and Sukukaja. This Skill may only affect creatures with only half of their hit points remaining or less.

demons.background: In Zoroastrian mythology, Mithra was a deity of contracts who was the protector of truth and the enemy of error. He was created by the supreme deity Ahura Mazda as the greatest of all Yazatas and an important aid in the destruction of the demonic forces led by Angra Mainyu (also known as Ahriman) in later Persian sources. He was one of the three Yazatas alongside Rashnu and Sraosha who judged the souls of the dead.

demons.name: Mothman

traits.name: Static Electricity
traits.description:
An overabundance of electrical power primes a foe for paralysis. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you attempt to inflict a Downed creature with Shock (see “Conditions”), flip a coin. If heads, the Condition is inflicted.
 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +7 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Ziodyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Pulverizing, erratic lightning buffets a foe with a high chance of Shock. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+5 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 3d8 + 2 electric damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 3 or higher, the target is also Shocked (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Life Leech (10 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You voraciously devour a foe’s life force. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+5 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, the creature receives almighty damage, and you regain hit points equal to 2d8 + 2.

skills.name: Tentarafoo (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Many tendrils swirl about, poised, then burrow into the minds of a battlefield to unsettle all. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (+5 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Confuse (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: Mothman is a cryptid of American origin. In the mid-1960s, there were some sightings of a great winged creature with massive reddish eyes. It is thought (outside of cryptozoology) that these might actually be misconstrued sandhill cranes or barn owls.

demons.name: Thunderbird

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Electric)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage. Add a 2d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills of the chosen element. At 15h level, this bonus is increased by 1d8 (3d8)

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Ziodyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Pulverizing, erratic lightning buffets a foe with a high chance of Shock. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+5 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 5d8 + 2 electric damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 3 or higher, the target is also Shocked (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Tarukaja (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Invigorating force emboldens an ally. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, whenever that creature rolls dice for a damage roll, they roll again, using whichever result is higher. You may target yourself with this Skill. If the creature is under the effects of Tarunda, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

skills.name: Rebellion (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Golden light of obstinance heightens an ally’s ability to deliver punishment. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, attacks the creature makes score a Critical hit if the result of each d6 is a 5 or higher.

demons.background: The thunderbird is a legendary creature found in Native American folklore. It's considered a "supernatural" bird of power and strength. It is especially important, and richly depicted, in the art, songs and oral histories of many Pacific Northwest Coast cultures, and is found in various forms among the peoples of the American Southwest and Great Plains. Thunderbirds were major components of the Southeastern Ceremonial Complex of American prehistory. The Thunderbird's name comes from the common belief that the beating of its enormous wings causes thunder and stirs the wind.

demons.name: Arahabaki

traits.name: Fortify Spirit
traits.description: Your will is undeterred by afflictions. Dazzler, Makajama, Dormina, Pulinpa, Evil Touch, Ominous Words, Taunt, and Marin Karin type Skills have disadvantage against you.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Makarakarn (20 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You form a shimmering barrier that mirrors arcane assaults. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). That creature Repels the next attack they receive within the next 10 minutes that deals Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, or Curse damage (see “Damage”).

skills.name: Abysmal Surge (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You blanket the minds and bodies of a battlefield in hopelessness and magic devoid of reason. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (+3 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Despair (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Spirit Drain (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You sate your aural thirst with the magical powers and thoughts of your foe, absorbing their essence. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, the creature loses and you regain 8 Spell Points.

demons.background: Arahabaki is a Japanese god of uncertain origin. His portrayal in the Megami Tensei franchise is influenced by Tsugaru Soto-Sangunshi, a forgery compiled in the 1970s. The contents of the document and even the circumstances in which it was purportedly found prove that it was not genuine[1], but due to coverage in occult magazines between the 1970s and early 2000s it's relatively often referenced in pop culture. Inaccuracies include descriptions of natural disasters which never happened, scientific discoveries stated to occur in incorrect time periods, and references to XXth century urban legends in purported XVIIIth century chronicles. Arahabaki is also stated to be a god exclusively associated with the Tohoku region in it - however, most place names related to this deity aren't even located in the north[2].

demons.name: Belphegor

traits.name: Unshaken Will
traits.description: A stiff upper lip aids you to overcome even the most destitute of your thoughts. You are immune to the Confuse, Fear, Despair, Rage, and Brainwash Conditions (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +1 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Bufudyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A gale of pure, arctic wind surrounds and freezes a foe solid. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 3d8 + 4 ice damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 3 or higher, the target is also Frozen (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Element Break (15 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You reach out your hand, and crush a foe’s resilience to your attack. When you use this Skill, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, or Nuke and up to six creatures within range (90 feet). For the next three rounds starting to count down at the end of this one, those creatures no longer Resist, Block, Drain, or Repel the chosen damage type. Additionally, this Skill removes all Tetrakarn and Makarakarn effects from affected creatures.

skills.name: Concentrate (15 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You gather and focus your mind's eye, delivering an absolute force of will. The next damage roll you make for an attack that deals Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage within the next 10 minutes is doubled.

demons.background: Belphegor is the demon lord of Sloth, one of the 7 Deadly Sins and a member of the Seven Princes of Hell. Belphegor gives people ideas for inventions that will make them rich and thus greedy and selfish. He was known as a phallic deity, associated with sex, orgies, and all forms of debauchery in general.

demons.name: Hell Biker

traits.name: Speed Master
traits.description:
You have a unique sense for agile tactics. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you may add a +5 bonus to the roll.
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you gain the effects of the Sukukaja Skill at no cost or action.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Agilao (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A cacophonous  burst of pyrotechnics razes the target with a high chance of burn. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+5 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 2d8 + 3 fire damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 3 or higher, the target is also Burned (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Mudoon (12 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Darkness and malevolent spirits crush the victim’s will. Choose a creature within range and make a ranged attack against them (+5 to hit, 90 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 3 or higher, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points immediately. You have advantage on attack rolls with this Skill if the creature is Weak to Curse. This Skill provokes a One More if the target is weak to Curse.

skills.name: Tentarafoo (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Many tendrils swirl about, poised, then burrow into the minds of a battlefield to unsettle all. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (+5 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Confuse (see “Conditions”).

demons.background:
Hell Biker's name in Japanese versions refers to Hells Angels, an American biker gang formed in 1948.
 Hell Biker is a human motorcyclist whose violent nature and hatred of himself and the world had turned him into a demon. He claims to come from hell, clothed all in black, a red scarf streaming, he rides full of rage calling himself the "Angel of Hell". His anger with himself and the world causes him to lash out, that everyone else would suffer as well.

demons.name: Kaiwan

traits.name: Speed Master
traits.description:
You have a unique sense for agile tactics. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you may add a +5 bonus to the roll.
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you gain the effects of the Sukukaja Skill at no cost or action.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Psiodyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Webs and swirling vortexes of psionic energy siphon strength from the target. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 120 feet). On a hit, they receive 3d8 + 4 psychic damage.

skills.name: Makajamaon (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A psionic abyss springs forth from your fingertips, draining the memories of a field of foes. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (+3 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Forget (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Marakunda (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You expose the weakest points of a group of foes, allowing for allies to move in. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures gain the effects of Rakunda.

demons.background: Kaiwan (or Kiyyun) was a deity worshiped by some of the Israelites according to the Book of Amos. Amos 5:26 refers to "the star of your god." His name appears to be derived from the Babylonian name of the planet Saturn. Others suggest that the name comes from a Hebrew root word that refers to something on a pedestal or image stand, and might refer to an idol of another deity rather than a separate god.

demons.name: Thoth

traits.name: Skillful Technique
traits.description: You understand the art of striking vitals with all of your strength the moment willing. You may add your character level to the damage roll of any attack against which the target is Weak to.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Megido (12 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Projectiles of portent emerge from unknown spaces, and home in on your foes. Make a ranged attack against up to six creatures within range. On a hit, a creature receives 1d8 + Magic almighty damage.

skills.name: Freila (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A mass of plasma flings from you like artillery through the skies, and bursts on impact. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+ to hit, 90 feet). On a hit, they receive 2d8 + Magic nuke damage.

skills.name: Concentrate (15 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You gather and focus your mind's eye, delivering an absolute force of will. The next damage roll you make for an attack that deals Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage within the next 10 minutes is doubled.

demons.background: Thoth, also known as Djehuti, is one of the most important gods in Egyptian mythology, commonly depicted as a man with either the head of an ibis or a baboon. He was said to be self-created or born of the seed of Horus from the forehead of Set. According to one story, Thoth was born "from the lips of Ra" at the beginning of creation and was known as the "god without a mother." In another tale, Thoth is self-created at the beginning of time and, as an ibis, lays the cosmic egg which holds all of creation.

demons.name: Atropos

traits.name: Flow
traits.description:
Momentum lifts you up and carries you forward. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you roll Initiative, roll 1d4. On a 4, you gain the benefits of Power Charge and Concentrate at no cost.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Ziodyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Pulverizing, erratic lightning buffets a foe with a high chance of Shock. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+5 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 3d8 + 4 electric damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 3 or higher, the target is also Shocked (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Mediarama (18 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Spiraling angelic light envelops numerous allies to rejuvenate them. Choose up to six creatures within range. Those creatures regain 3d8 + 9 hit points.

skills.name: Element Break (15 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You reach out your hand, and crush a foe’s resilience to your attack. When you use this Skill, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, or Nuke and up to six creatures within range (90 feet). For the next three rounds starting to count down at the end of this one, those creatures no longer Resist, Block, Drain, or Repel the chosen damage type. Additionally, this Skill removes all Tetrakarn and Makarakarn effects from affected creatures.

demons.background: Atropos is the eldest of the three Moirae Sisters, and was known as "the Inflexible One". She is the one who cuts the thread of fate, signifying the end of one's life. They controlled the destiny of every living mortal and it was thought that even Zeus was subject to their will, unable to change it; in a few myths, however, Zeus was named "Moiragetes", i.e. controller of the Fates.

demons.name: Daisoujou

traits.name: Mouth of Savoring
traits.description: Each spell siphons more essence and mind from the foe, draining it for yourself. Whenever you damage an enemy creature with a Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty Skill, you regain 2d4 spell points. You may only benefit from this ability once per turn.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Spirit Drain (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You sate your aural thirst with the magical powers and thoughts of your foe, absorbing their essence. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, the creature loses and you regain 9 Spell Points.

skills.name: Samsara (18 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A cleansing light purges the battlefield, excising all life and sin from the fleeting evil of existence. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (+3 to hit, 20 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 3 or higher, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points immediately. You have advantage on attack rolls with this Skill if the creature is Weak to Bless. This Skill provokes a One More if the target is weak to Bless.

skills.name: Diarahan (18 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A cascade of verdant light basks an ally in a healing glow, healing their most grievous injury. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). That creature regains 6d8 + 9 hit points.

demons.background: Soujou (僧正) in historical East Asian regions is any high ranking Buddhist monk appointed by the government in power, in order to manage all the Buddhist temples and monks within the sovereignty's domain. In Japan, Daisoujou (大僧正) is the top official to hold this position, and there might be two to three more Soujous under Daisoujou depending on the time period, they are Kendaisoujou (権大僧正), (simply) Soujou, and Kensoujou (権僧正).

demons.name: Hariti

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Electric)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage. Add a 2d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills of the chosen element. At 15h level, this bonus is increased by 1d8 (3d8).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +6 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Energy Shower (6 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Magical medicine rains, honing the mind against uncontrolled emotions. Choose up to six creatures within range (60 feet). Each of those creatures recover from Confuse, Fear, Despair, Rage, and Brainwash (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Mabaisudi (6 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Physiological aid relieves the flesh of injury. Choose up to six creatures within range. Each of those creatures recover from Burn, Freeze, and Shock (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Zionga (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Streams of uncontrolled electricity rain upon a small area. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 10-feet radius sphere centered at a point within range (+3 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 3d8 + 4 electric damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Shocked (see “Conditions”)

demons.background: Hariti is a demoness originating from what is now called Pakistan. She was originally an ogress who slew human children in her desperation to feed her hundreds of children. After the arrival of Buddhism, which came to Pakistan as a missionary religion, the legend of Hariti was given a new twist by Buddhist missionaries; being that, in order to put a stop to this way of feeding on the blood of children, Gautama Buddha hid away Priyankara, one of Hariti's sons, under a rice bowl and then pointed out to her that the suffering she was experiencing from losing one out of her hundreds of children could not be compared to that of the human mothers whose few children became her victims. Remorseful for her deeds, Hariti pledged to become the protector of childbirth and children and converted to Buddhism.

demons.name: Kikuri-Hime

traits.name: Relief Bloodline
traits.description: A most resplendent and glorious blessing comes from your hands. The Spell Point cost of Support type Skills used by you are halved, rounded down (min 1).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +7 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Marakukaja (12 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You coordinate the defense of your allies, covering flanks and shielding them from danger. Choose up to six creatures within range. Those creatures gain the effects of Rakukaja.

skills.name: Tetraja (2 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Divine strength fills your allies, warding them from peril. Choose up to six creatures within range. The next time, within the next 10 minutes, they would instantly be reduced to 0 hit points from a Hama or Mudo type Skill, or from Door of Hades, the effect is prevented completely.

skills.name: Energy Drop (4 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A stimulating remedy opens one’s eyes against emotional malady. Choose a creature within range (60 feet). That creature recovers from Confuse, Fear, Despair, Rage, and Brainwash (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: Kikuri-Hime-no-mikoto (菊理姫 or 菊理媛命) means "Priestess Chrysanthemum." Chrysanthemum is her symbolic flower and associated with lamentation at death in East Asian cultures. Kikuri-Hime is briefly mentioned in Nihon Shoki after Izanagi was driven out of Yomotsu Hirasaka (Shinto Netherworld) in his failed attempt to retrieve his late consort, Izanami. Kikuri-Hime mediated on behalf of Izanami so that the husband and wife could engage in a debate in their confrontation in Yomi. The exact content of this debate is not recorded, although there has been much conjecture. It is the actions of Kikuri-Hime that established the duty of Miko (Japanese priestess) of communicating with the netherworld on behalf of the living one. She has also been known as a goddess of matchmaking since ancient times.

demons.name: Legion

traits.name: Draining Mouth
traits.description: With each blow, you sink your teeth into a foe, absorbing it's essence. Whenever you damage an enemy creature with a Physical or Gun Skill, you regain 1d4 hit points. Whenever you damage an enemy creature with a Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty Skill, you regain 1d4 spell points. You may only benefit from this ability once per turn.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Life Leech (10 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You voraciously devour a foe’s life force. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range. On a hit, the creature receives 2d8 + 3 almighty damage, and you regain hit points equal to 2d8 + 3.

skills.name: Bloodbath (16 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Ribbons of dark blades lash out, hacking a field into terrifying ribbons. Make a melee attack against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+3 to hit, 20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 4d8 + 3 physical damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, a creature is inflicted with Fear (see “Conditions'').

skills.name: Eigaon (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A portal to despair yawns below a foe’s feet, only to flood them in a wave of pure hatred. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 4d8 + 4 curse damage.

demons.background: Legion is a collection of demons which was referred in Christian literature. While the types of demons that make up Legion is unknown, they are purportedly said to be the same kind of demon that would inhabit a host and would have a single hive mind. The general form is a floating sphere composed of numerous featureless faces that acts as a shell concealing a center core of varying identity.

demons.name: Mithras

traits.name: Skillful Technique
traits.description: You understand the art of striking vitals with all of your strength the moment willing. You may add your character level to the damage roll of any attack against which the target is Weak to.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Freidyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A plasma blast incinerates and irradiates a perfect sphere of foes, immolating them in the spot. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 10-feet radius sphere centered at a point within range (+ to hit, 20 feet). On a hit, they receive 3d8 + 3 nuke damage.

skills.name: Element Break (15 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You reach out your hand, and crush a foe’s resilience to your attack. When you use this Skill, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, or Nuke and up to six creatures within range (90 feet). For the next three rounds starting to count down at the end of this one, those creatures no longer Resist, Block, Drain, or Repel the chosen damage type. Additionally, this Skill removes all Tetrakarn and Makarakarn effects from affected creatures.

skills.name: Tentarafoo (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Many tendrils swirl about, poised, then burrow into the minds of a battlefield to unsettle all. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (+3 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Confuse (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: Mithras is a sun deity who was worshiped in the Roman empire from the 1st to the 4th century AD and is the patron of Mithraism. He was said to be reborn after death, and a festival was held on the winter solstice for him. It is believed that Mithraism was popular in the Roman military and did not accept female disciples. Whether Mithras was directly inspired by the much older Mithra from Persia or Mitra from ancient India remains debatable. It is today considered a mystery religion due to lack of textual records of the cult, but many Mithraic temples and artifacts survive.

demons.name: White Rider

traits.name: Ghost Nest
traits.description:
Ethereal claws of your will aid in penetrating the defenses of others. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you attempt to inflict a Downed creature with a Condition, roll 1d4. On a 4, the Condition is inflicted.
 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Triple Down (9 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A trifecta of cunning blows knock a foe asunder. Make three melee attacks against each creature within a 10-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+4 to hit, 10 feet). For each hit, the creature receives 2d10 + 4 gun damage.

skills.name: Evil Touch (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A swirling infusion of dark forces spark fear into a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Fear (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Oni-Kagura (12 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A demonic dance swirls about and punctures foes in vital points. Make a melee attack against up to six creatures within range (+4 to hit, 20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 2d8 + 4 physical damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, a creature is inflicted with Rage (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: The White Rider, or White Horseman, is the first of the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse to appear before John the Apostle, according to Christian scripture. It traditionally represents conquest, bearing a bow of conquest, with the "pestilence" association first appearing in the 20th century. This Horseman is one of confusion amongst theologians as some believe he is representative of divine conquest (and thus a force of good) while others think of him as a representative of unlawful conquest (and thus a force of evil).

demons.name: Unicorn

traits.name: Savior Bloodline
traits.description: You give off blessings by the dozen. The Spell Point cost of Healing type Skills used by you is halved (min 1).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Samarecarm (14 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A wellspring of youth and vigor comes forth, nurturing an ally with new health. Choose a creature that is knocked out within range (90 feet). That creature regains all of their missing hit points.

skills.name: Swift Strike (8 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You deftly strike at each foe with blinding speed within an area. Make two melee attacks against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+4 to hit, 20 feet). For each hit, a creature receives 1d8 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Kougaon (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You invoke holy will, and a cascading pillar of light and holy magic erupts from the foe’s space. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 4d8 + 4 bless damage.

demons.background: An unicorn is a legendary holy creature. Though the modern popular image of the unicorn is sometimes that of a horse differing only in the horn on its forehead, the traditional unicorn also has a billy-goat beard, a lion's tail and cloven hooves; these distinguish it from a horse. It's said to be able to release lightning from its horn. It has a violent temper and all who approach will be swiftly struck down. However, it does not attack virginal humans and will even allow them to ride it. Some say that its horn can neutralize any poison.

demons.name: Girimehkala

traits.name: Striking Weight
traits.description: A fell-handed delivery makes your blows land harder. Add a 1d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills that deal Physical damage. At 15th level this bonus is increased by 1d8 (2d8).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +2 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Deathbound (12 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Hands of fallen warriors emerge from the soil to grasp and strike at foes. Make two melee attacks against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+4 to hit, 20 feet). For each hit, a creature receives 3d8 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Agidyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A pillar-shaped conflagration erupts, spiraling about and enveloping a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 4d8 + 2 fire damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Burned (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Mudoon (12 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Darkness and malevolent spirits crush the victim’s will. Choose a creature within range and make a ranged attack against them (+4 to hit, 90 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 3 or higher, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points immediately. You have advantage on attack rolls with this Skill if the creature is Weak to Curse. This Skill provokes a One More if the target is weak to Curse.

demons.background: Girimekhala is a large demonic elephant from Sri Lankan mythology. It is said to be the mount of the demonic celestial king Mara, who tried to tempt Buddha so that he could not achieve enlightenment. The Girimekhala's most prominent feature is its one huge eye, which is said to carry a powerful curse. Anyone that looks into its eye will fall ill and cannot be cured.

demons.name: Hecatoncheires

traits.name: Gluttonmouth
traits.description: You rip and tear, devouring flesh and blood to heal yourself. Whenever you damage an enemy creature with a Physical or Gun Skill, you regain 2d4 hit points. You may only benefit from this ability once per turn.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +2 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Gatling Blows (12 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You unleash a true barrage faster than the eye may blink. Make four melee attacks against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 5 feet). The first time an attack hits, each subsequent hit will use the same attack roll result as that first hit. For each hit, the creature receives 2d8 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Tarukaja (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Invigorating force emboldens an ally. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, whenever that creature rolls dice for a damage roll, they roll again, using whichever result is higher. You may target yourself with this Skill. If the creature is under the effects of Tarunda, instead that effect and the effect of this Skill are removed.

skills.name: Rebellion (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Golden light of obstinance heightens an ally’s ability to deliver punishment. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, attacks the creature makes score a Critical hit if the result of each d6 is a 5 or higher.

demons.background: Known as Hekatonkheires or Hecatonchires, they were giant beings from Greek myth. Having one hundred hands and fifty heads, their father Ouranos found them disgusting and threw them into Tartarus. Eventually, Zeus would free them and they would aid the gods against the Titans.

demons.name: Kumbhanda

traits.name: Fortify Spirit
traits.description: Your will is undeterred by afflictions. Dazzler, Makajama, Dormina, Pulinpa, Evil Touch, Ominous Words, Taunt, and Marin Karin type Skills have disadvantage against you.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Life Leech (10 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You voraciously devour a foe’s life force. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 2d8 + 3 almighty damage, and you regain hit points equal to 2d8 + 3.

skills.name: Bloodbath (16 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Ribbons of dark blades lash out, hacking a field into terrifying ribbons. Make a melee attack against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+4 to hit, 20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 4d8 + 4 physical damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, a creature is inflicted with Fear (see “Conditions'').

skills.name: Revolution (5 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You spark and heighten the effects of the very air itself, causing mayhem. This Skill affects all creatures within range (hostile or not), including yourself (90 feet). All creatures within range gain the effects of Rebellion.

demons.background: Kumbhanda is one of a group of dwarfish, misshapen spirits among the lesser deities of Buddhist mythology. They are known to suck the life out of humans and are servants of the southern member of the Four Heavenly Kings, Zouchouten.

demons.name: Kushinada

traits.name: Savior Bloodline
traits.description: You give off blessings by the dozen. The Spell Point cost of Healing type Skills used by you is halved (min 1).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +2 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Mediarama (9 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Spiraling angelic light envelops numerous allies to rejuvenate them. Choose up to six creatures within range. Those creatures regain 3d8 + 9 hit points.

skills.name: Element Wall (10 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You form a draining barrier that protects an ally. When you use this Skill, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, or Nuke. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For the next three rounds, starting to count down at the end of this one, the creature is no longer Weak to the chosen damage type, and receives half as much damage from that type (this effect is independent from and stacks with Resist).

skills.name: Amrita Shower (6 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You remedy the impurities of all your comrades, cleansing the field of malady. Choose up to six creatures within range (60 feet). Each of those creatures recover from all Conditions.

demons.background:
In Japanese mythology, Kushinada-Hime (櫛名田比売 in Kojiki or 奇稲田姫 in Nihonshoki), or simply Kushinada, was the daughter of two lesser gods of the Kunitsu, Ashinazuchi and Tenazuchi. She would later become the wife of the god of storms, Susano-o.
 According to the Shinto legend, after Susano-o was expelled from Heaven, he encountered two weeping earthly deities near a river in the Izumo Province. After asking why they wept, they explained that they had to give the Orochi one of their daughters every year to prevent his violent rampage, and now they must sacrifice their eighth and final daughter, Kushinada.

demons.name: Ose

traits.name: Retaliating Body
traits.description:
Your deft parry and reversal of force eviscerates unwary attackers. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you would be targeted by a Physical or Gun Skill, roll 1d4. On a 4, you Repel that attack (see “Resistances” in the Combat section).
 • Whenever damage would be dealt to attackers by you through an effect that Repels, the damage dealt is doubled.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +2 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Oni-Kagura (12 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A demonic dance swirls about and punctures foes in vital points. Make a melee attack against up to six creatures within range (+5 to hit, 20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 2d8 + 4 physical damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, a creature is inflicted with Rage (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Taunting Aura (10 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You aggravate all to draw attention to yourself. For the next 1 minute, whenever an ally within 60 feet would be targeted by an enemy attack that could have targeted you instead, the attack is redirected to you. This Skill does not affect attacks against multiple targets at once.

skills.name: Matarukaja (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A rallying cry and magic reinforcement strengthens your entire group. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures gain the effects of Tarukaja.

demons.background: Ose, also known as Osé, Oze, Oso or Voso, is the 57th demonic spirit of Ars Goetia and a great president of Hell. He first appears as a leopard, but after some time will take the form of a man. He gives skill in all liberal sciences and true answers concerning divine and secret things. He can change any man into any shape the exorcist may desire, and the one that is changed will not know it.

demons.name: Power

traits.name: Unparalleled Eyes
traits.description: Your vision is unmatched, and comes in clutch to save an endangered ally. Attacks made against you or allies within 30 feet of you that deal Physical damage have disadvantage.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Hamaon (12 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Divine will and an excess of banishing rights and rituals consecrate the creature’s space, purging it of evil and existence. Choose a creature within range and make a ranged attack against them (+3 to hit, 90 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 3 or higher, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points immediately. You have advantage on attack rolls with this Skill if the creature is Weak to Bless. This Skill provokes a One More if the target is weak to Bless.

skills.name: Brain Shake (6 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: Piercing blows strike the foe, attempting to interface with their mind. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 5 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 2d10 + 4 physical damage. If the result of each d6 in the attack roll is 4 or higher, the target is afflicted with Brainwash (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Masukukaja (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You accelerate each of your allies to rapid speeds. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures gain the effects of Sukukaja.

demons.background: Powers, also known as Authorities, are the sixth of the nine orders of angels. It is said that they were the first order to be created. The Powers are the bearers of conscience and the keepers of history. Their duty is to oversee the distribution of power among humankind, hence their name. They are academically driven and are concerned with ideology, philosophy, theology, religion and documents pertaining to those studies. Powers are the brain trusts; a group of experts who serve as advisers and policy planners. They are also the warrior angels created to be completely loyal to God. Some believe that no Power has ever fallen from grace, but another theory states that Satan was the Chief of the Powers before he fell. Their duty is to oversee the distribution of power among humankind, hence their name.

demons.name: Queen Mab

traits.name: Static Electricity
traits.description:
An overabundance of electrical power primes a foe for paralysis. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you attempt to inflict a Downed creature with Shock (see “Conditions”), flip a coin. If heads, the Condition is inflicted.
 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +7 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Ziodyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Pulverizing, erratic lightning buffets a foe with a high chance of Shock. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+5 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 3d8 + 4 electric damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 3 or higher, the target is also Shocked (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Agidyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A pillar-shaped conflagration erupts, spiraling about and enveloping a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+5 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 4d8 + 4 fire damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Burned (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Concentrate (15 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You gather and focus your mind's eye, delivering an absolute force of will. The next damage roll you make for an attack that deals Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage within the next 10 minutes is doubled.

demons.background: Mab, also known as Medb or Meive, is the queen of Connacht. Famous for her capricious nature and her many lovers, she wages many wars for the sake of her continued glory. The Cattle Raid of Cooley makes her cross paths with her archenemy Cu Chulainn, who shamed her numerous times by slaying her pets, warriors and handmaidens. She is the enemy (and former wife) of Conchobar mac Nessa, king of Ulster, and is best known for starting the Táin Bó Cúailnge ("The Cattle Raid of Cooley") to steal Ulster's prize stud bull Donn Cúailnge.

demons.name: Red Rider

traits.name: Hollow Jester
traits.description:
You seek out the weak-willed and the ailing pack. You gain the following benefits:
 • You may add half your character level (min 1) to the damage roll of any attack against which the target is Weak to.
 • You may add half your character level (min 1) to the damage roll of any attack against a target afflicted with a Condition. You may add this bonus multiple times, once for each Condition the target is inflicted with.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Psiodyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Webs and swirling vortexes of psionic energy siphon strength from the target. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 120 feet). On a hit, they receive 3d8 + 4 psychic damage.

skills.name: Element Break (15 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You reach out your hand, and crush a foe’s resilience to your attack. When you use this Skill, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, or Nuke and up to six creatures within range (90 feet). For the next three rounds starting to count down at the end of this one, those creatures no longer Resist, Block, Drain, or Repel the chosen damage type. Additionally, this Skill removes all Tetrakarn and Makarakarn effects from affected creatures.

skills.name: Negative Pile (6 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: Abyssal energes infused with your attack blast the foe from above. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 5 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 2d10 + 3 physical damage. If the result of each d6 in the attack roll is 4 or higher, the target is afflicted with Despair (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: The Red Rider, or Red Horseman, is the second of the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse, also named War. He represents war, and his horse is colored "fiery" red and bearing a sword of war. Unlike Conquest, the Red Horseman of War specializes in waging war between nations and people rather than internal strife.

demons.name: Yurlungur

traits.name: Majestic Presence
traits.description:
When you have the initiative, you can unleash a storm of gunfire on foes, in addition to your cheap shots. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever a creature would regain hit points from a Skill within 60 feet, you may add a 2d8 bonus to the amount regained. This bonus is increased by 2d8 at 15th level (4d8).
 • Whenever a creature within 60 feet of you uses a Healing Skill, you may roll 1d4. On a 4, the spell point cost of that Skill is halved for that use, to a minimum of 1.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Revolution (5 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You spark and heighten the effects of the very air itself, causing mayhem. This Skill affects all creatures within range (hostile or not), including yourself (90 feet). All creatures within range gain the effects of Rebellion.

skills.name: Element Break (15 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You reach out your hand, and crush a foe’s resilience to your attack. When you use this Skill, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, or Nuke and up to six creatures within range (90 feet). For the next three rounds starting to count down at the end of this one, those creatures no longer Resist, Block, Drain, or Repel the chosen damage type. Additionally, this Skill removes all Tetrakarn and Makarakarn effects from affected creatures.

skills.name: Brain Jack (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You’re not asking anymore. You use magic to directly weave into the hearts of foes, seizing control of the field. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (+4 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Brainwash (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: In aboriginal Australian mythology, the Yurlungur is a great copper snake that is said to bring the rains and thus incite the renewal of life. It is commonly known as the Rainbow Serpent or the Rainbow Snake, because the water where it lives shines like a rainbow. It was believed that if colored light was seen inside a well (likely caused by light reflection) then the Yurlungur was within.

demons.name: Ananta

traits.name: Elemental Bloodline (Nuke)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, or Curse. The Spell Point cost of Skills that are of the chosen type is halved, to a minimum of 1.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +1 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Freidyne (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A plasma blast incinerates and irradiates a perfect sphere of foes, immolating them in the spot. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 10-feet radius sphere centered at a point within range (+3 to hit, 20 feet). On a hit, they receive 3d8 + 4 nuke damage.

skills.name: Abysmal Surge (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You blanket the minds and bodies of a battlefield in hopelessness and magic devoid of reason. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (+3 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Despair (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Marakukaja (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You coordinate the defense of your allies, covering flanks and shielding them from danger. Choose up to six creatures within range. Those creatures gain the effects of Rakukaja.

demons.background: Shesha, also known as Ananta, is the king of all nagas according to Hindu mythology and one of the primal beings of creation. He is sometimes called Ananta Shesha which means "Endless Shesha" as he is said to hold all the planets in the universe on his hoods. He is usually depicted as a massive coiled serpent with as many as five to one thousand heads, sometimes wearing an ornate crown on each head. The heads are not only venomous but spew fire as well. He was born from the mouth of the sleeping Balarama (sun god's brother) where he devoured all but Balarama's head.

demons.name: Athena

traits.name: Grace of the Olive
traits.description:
The opportunity will not be lost by your hand, as you execute with splendid grace and efficacy. You gain the following benefits:
 • The Hit Point and Spell Point cost of Skills used by actions granted by a One More! are reduced to 0.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Akashic Arts (17 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Profound battle wisdom aids your blows to make two cunning strikes nigh unavoidable. Make two melee attacks against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 10 feet). For each hit, the creature receives 2d8 + 4 physical damage. An attack made with this Skill scores a Critical hit if all d6s in the attack roll are the same result (this turns Critical Misses in Critical success).

skills.name: Rising Slash (9 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: As a follow-up, you carry momentum through a blade to cleave a foe in two from under it. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 10 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 3d10 + 4 physical damage. If this Skill is used with an action granted by a Baton Pass, the damage dealt is doubled.

skills.name: Diarahan (18 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A cascade of verdant light basks an ally in a healing glow, healing their most grievous injury. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). That creature regains 6d8 + 6 hit points.

demons.background: Athena is the Greek goddess of wisdom, courage, inspiration, civilization, philosophy, justice, law, mathematics, strength, arts, crafts, weaving, skill and reason who sprung from Zeus' forehead fully armored after he swallowed her mother, Metis. She represents just decisions and strategic warfare and is the only goddess allowed to carry Zeus' thunderbolts. She led battles as the disciplined, strategic side of war, in contrast to her brother Ares, the patron of violence, bloodlust and slaughter.

demons.name: Byakko

traits.name: Retaliating Body
traits.description:
Your deft parry and reversal of force eviscerates unwary attackers. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you would be targeted by a Physical or Gun Skill, roll 1d4. On a 4, you Repel that attack (see “Resistances” in the Combat section).
 • Whenever damage would be dealt to attackers by you through an effect that Repels, the damage dealt is doubled.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Bufudyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A gale of pure, arctic wind surrounds and freezes a foe solid. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 3d8 + 3 ice damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 3 or higher, the target is also Frozen (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Element Break (15 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You reach out your hand, and crush a foe’s resilience to your attack. When you use this Skill, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, or Nuke and up to six creatures within range (90 feet). For the next three rounds starting to count down at the end of this one, those creatures no longer Resist, Block, Drain, or Repel the chosen damage type. Additionally, this Skill removes all Tetrakarn and Makarakarn effects from affected creatures.

skills.name: Swift Strike (8 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You deftly strike at each foe with blinding speed within an area. Make two melee attacks against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+4 to hit, 20 feet). For each hit, a creature receives 1d8 + 4 physical damage

demons.background: The Bai Hu (白虎), literally the White Tiger, is one of the Four Symbols of the Chinese Constellation (Si Xiang) along with Qing Long, Zhu Que and Xuan Wu. It represents the western part of the 28 star mansions, the autumn season and the element of "metal" ("wind" in the Japanese system). It is known as Byakko in Japan and Baekho in Korea.

demons.name: Fortuna

traits.name: Elemental Bloodline (Wind)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, or Curse. The Spell Point cost of Skills that are of the chosen type is halved, to a minimum of 1.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +1 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Garudyne (7 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A maelstrom wraps around a target, buffeting them into oblivion. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 90 feet). On a hit, they receive 3d8 + 4 wind damage.

skills.name: Masukukaja (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You accelerate each of your allies to rapid speeds. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures gain the effects of Sukukaja.

skills.name: Tetraja (5 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Divine strength fills your allies, warding them from peril. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). The next time, within the next 10 minutes, they would instantly be reduced to 0 hit points from a Hama or Mudo type Skill, or from Door of Hades, the effect is prevented completely.

demons.background: Fortuna, also known as Lady Fortune, is the goddess of fortune, chance, and luck in Roman mythology, daughter of Jupiter and Venus. She can be represented as veiled or blind. She is believed to have originally been a goddess of blessing and fertility, mainly being worshiped by mothers. She was also treated as the personification of Luck. She is the Roman counterpart of the Greek minor goddess Tyche.

demons.name: Magatsu-Izanagi

traits.name: Hollow Jester
traits.description:
You seek out the weak-willed and the ailing pack. You gain the following benefits:
 • You may add half your character level (min 1) to the damage roll of any attack against which the target is Weak to.
 • You may add half your character level (min 1) to the damage roll of any attack against a target afflicted with a Condition. You may add this bonus multiple times, once for each Condition the target is inflicted with.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Magatsu Mandala (32 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You inflict a curse of chaos and catastrophe, invoking apocalyptic futures upon the foe with aid of an enormous magical strike. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 4d8 + 4 curse damage. If the first d6 in the attack roll is 5 or higher, the creature is inflicted with Confuse. If the second d6 in the attack roll is 5 or higher, the creature is inflicted with Fear. If the third d6 in the attack roll is 5 or higher, the creature is inflicted with Despair.

skills.name: Bloodbath (16 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Ribbons of dark blades lash out, hacking a field into terrifying ribbons. Make a melee attack against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+4 to hit, 20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 4d8 + 4 physical damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, a creature is inflicted with Fear (see “Conditions'').

skills.name: Ghastly Wail (16 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Dark energy pours from your mouth, manifesting in a banshee’s cry that severs the souls of the weak-willed. This Skill affects all creatures within range, including yourself and allies (30 feet). Each creature afflicted by the Fear condition (see “Conditions”) within range is reduced to 0 hit points immediately.

demons.background:
Magatsu-Izanagi (禍津伊弉諾) means "Calamity Izanagi." This refers to Izanagi's state before he washed away the filth from Yomotsu Hirasaka in a failed mission to retrieve his late consort, Izanami.
 Magatsu-Izanagi also represents "Emptiness."

demons.name: Pazuzu

traits.name: Elemental Bloodline (Curse)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, or Curse. The Spell Point cost of Skills that are of the chosen type is halved, to a minimum of 1.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Eigaon (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A portal to despair yawns below a foe’s feet, only to flood them in a wave of pure hatred. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 4d8 + 4 curse damage.

skills.name: Stagnant Air (5 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: The air becomes riddled and ripe with foul energy, Disease and wretched magic begins to flow and infest more easily. This Skill affects all creatures within range, including yourself and allies (30 feet). For the next 10 minutes, whenever an affected creature would be potentially inflicted with a Condition, flip a coin. If heads, the Condition is successfully inflicted. This effect is in addition to the original means by which they are inflicted by the Condition.

skills.name: Evil Smile (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Your wickedness is magically enhanced, sending waves of chills through all who witness. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (+4 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Fear (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: Pazuzu is an apotropaic being from Mesopotamian mythology, first attested in the late Bronze Age and described as a king of demons, as well as a personification of the west wind. His origin is uncertain, but various connections with personifications of winds serving gods as messengers, Humbaba and pessu (a creature derived from Egyptian god Bes) have been proposed by researchers.

demons.name: Valkyrie

traits.name: Attack Master
traits.description:
You have a unique sense for offensive tactics. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you may add a +5 bonus to the roll.
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you gain the effects of the Tarukaja Skill at no cost or action.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Rising Slash (9 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: As a follow-up, you carry momentum through a blade to cleave a foe in two from under it. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 10 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 3d10 + 4 physical damage. If this Skill is used with an action granted by a Baton Pass, the damage dealt is doubled.

skills.name: Deathbound (12 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Hands of fallen warriors emerge from the soil to grasp and strike at foes. Make two melee attacks against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+3 to hit, 20 feet). For each hit, a creature receives 2d8 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Matarukaja (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A rallying cry and magic reinforcement strengthens your entire group. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures gain the effects of Tarukaja.

demons.background: A Valkyrie (from Old Norse valkyrja "chooser of the slain") is one of a host of female figures that appear to the dead in Norse Mythology and decide who will die in battle. The valkyries bring their chosen to the afterlife hall of the slain, Valhalla, ruled over by the god Odin, where the deceased warriors become einherjar. There, when the einherjar are not preparing for the events of Ragnarök, the valkyries bear them mead. Valkyries also appear as lovers of heroes and other mortals, where they are sometimes described as the daughters of royalty, sometimes accompanied by ravens, and sometimes connected to swans.

demons.name: Bugs

traits.name: Fast Heal
traits.description: You are able to recover from afflictions with ease. At the end of your turn, when afflicted with a Condition, roll 1d4. On a 4, you recover from it.

traits.name: Attack Master
traits.description:
You have a unique sense for offensive tactics. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you may add a +5 bonus to the roll.
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you gain the effects of the Tarukaja Skill at no cost or action .

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +6 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Psiodyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Webs and swirling vortexes of psionic energy siphon strength from the target. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 120 feet). On a hit, they receive 3d8 + 4 psychic damage.

skills.name: Triple Down (9 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A trifecta of cunning blows knock a foe asunder. Make three melee attacks against each creature within a 10-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+4 to hit, 10 feet). For each hit, the creature receives 2d10 + 4 gun damage.

skills.name: Masukunda (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You bind and slow a group of enemies, allowing you to act faster than them. Choose up to six creatures within range. Those creatures gain the effects of Sukunda.

demons.background:
Bugbear, or simply Bugs, is a type of Hobgoblin that is comparable to the Boogeyman (Bugaboo) in folklore. In lore, the Bugbear was depicted as a creepy bear that lurked in the woods to scare children. Bugbear was used to frighten children into behaving or obeying their parents.
 Its name is derived from the Celtic word bug which means "evil spirit" or "goblin."

demons.name: Dakini

traits.name: Skillful Technique
traits.description: You understand the art of striking vitals with all of your strength the moment willing. You may add your character level to the damage roll of any attack against which the target is Weak to.

traits.name: Counter
traits.description: A swift parry allows you to turn the tables. Whenever you would be targeted by a Physical or Gun Skill, roll 1d4. On a 4, you Repel that attack (see “Resistances” in the Combat section) .

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Bad Beat (12 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Dark forces and sadistic glee encompass your blows to continuously beat down your foe into despair. Make a melee attack against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+3 to hit, 20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 2d8 + 4 physical damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, a creature is inflicted with Despair (see “Conditions'').

skills.name: Revolution (5 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You spark and heighten the effects of the very air itself, causing mayhem. This Skill affects all creatures within range (hostile or not), including yourself (90 feet). All creatures within range gain the effects of Rebellion.

skills.name: Power Charge (15 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You begin amassing your strength and stamina, coalescing into an ultimate strike. The next damage roll you make for an attack that deals Physical or Gun damage within the next 10 minutes is doubled.

demons.background:
A dakini is a tantric deity described as an embodiment of enlightened energy that resembles a female. In each of her various guises, she serves as each of the Three Roots. She may be a human guru, a yidam or she may be a protector.
 In Japanese Buddhism, dakini are recognized as fox spirits and are also recognized as a goddess called Dakiniten, who is associated with Inari and Daikoku-ten.

demons.name: Horus

traits.name: Deathly Illness
traits.description: You wield the secrets of eradication. You have advantage on attacks made for Hama, Hamaon, Samsara, Mudo, Mudoon,  Die for Me!, and Door of Hades.

traits.name: Unparalleled Eyes
traits.description: Your vision is unmatched, and comes in clutch to save an endangered ally. Attacks made against you or allies within 30 feet of you that deal Physical damage have disadvantage.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Hamaon (12 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Divine will and an excess of banishing rights and rituals consecrate the creature’s space, purging it of evil and existence. Choose a creature within range and make a ranged attack against them (+3 to hit, 90 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 3 or higher, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points immediately. You have advantage on attack rolls with this Skill if the creature is Weak to Bless. This Skill provokes a One More if the target is weak to Bless.

skills.name: Flash Bomb (12 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A shocking blast of explosive force blinds foes. Make a melee attack against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+3 to hit, 20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 2d8 + 4 physical damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, a creature is inflicted with Dizzy (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Megidola (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Glowing, star-like spheres manifest above the field, then fire beams of destructive force by the dozens into foes. Make a ranged attack against up to six creatures within range (+3 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 2d8 + 4 almighty damage.

demons.background: Often identified with the sun, Horus (also known as Her, Heru, Hor or Har) was known as one of the most powerful gods of the Egyptian pantheon. He is the falcon-headed sun god and the prince of Egypt. Horus was occasionally shown in art as a naked boy with a finger in his mouth sitting on a lotus with his mother. In the form of a youth, Horus was referred to as Neferhor, Nephoros or Nopheros (literally known as Good Horus). He is the son of the god Osiris and Isis, seeks revenge for his father's death at the hands of the god Set.

demons.name: Koumokuten

traits.name: Unparalleled Eyes
traits.description: Your vision is unmatched, and comes in clutch to save an endangered ally. Attacks made against you or allies within 30 feet of you that deal Physical damage have disadvantage.

traits.name: Enduring Soul
traits.description: You bounce back fully when push comes to shove. When you would be reduced to 0 hit points by a hostile attack, you are reduced to a value equal to half of your maximum hit points. This ability may increase your current hit points through healing. Once this ability is used, you cannot use it again until you fully recover in Reality.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Rising Slash (13 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: A horizontal slash with blinding speed strikes the opponent with godly precision and severing force. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 10 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 6d10 + 4 physical damage. If this Skill is used with an action granted by a Baton Pass, the damage dealt is doubled.

skills.name: Revolution (5 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You spark and heighten the effects of the very air itself, causing mayhem. This Skill affects all creatures within range (hostile or not), including yourself (90 feet). All creatures within range gain the effects of Rebellion

skills.name: Matarukaja (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A rallying cry and magic reinforcement strengthens your entire group. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures gain the effects of Tarukaja.

demons.background: Koumokuten (広目天), also known as Virūpākṣa in Sanskrit, is the guardian deity that protects the west of Buddha's realm. His name means "vast/all-seeing eyes." He has red skin and leads the troop of Nagas, the lesser snake-man gods. Some statues have him carry a Pasha which works similar to a lasso for capturing running target. Many of his attributes are very similar to Varuna, who happens to be the guardian of the west in Lokapala.

demons.name: Narcissus

traits.name: Foul Stench
traits.description:
A noxious, plague-like force infests foes. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage.

traits.name: Majestic Presence
traits.description:
