When you have the initiative, you can unleash a storm of gunfire on foes, in addition to your cheap shots. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever a creature would regain hit points from a Skill within 60 feet, you may add a 2d8 bonus to the amount regained. This bonus is increased by 2d8 at 15th level (4d8).
 • Whenever a creature within 60 feet of you uses a Healing Skill, you may roll 1d4. On a 4, the spell point cost of that Skill is halved for that use, to a minimum of 1 .

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +7 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Dazzler (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A sparkling, disorienting light flashes before a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Dizzy (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Mediarama (18 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Spiraling angelic light envelops numerous allies to rejuvenate them. Choose up to six creatures within range. Those creatures regain 5d8 + 9 hit points.

skills.name: Energy Drop (6 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A stimulating remedy opens one’s eyes against emotional malady. Choose a creature within range (60 feet). That creature recovers from Confuse, Fear, Despair, Rage, and Brainwash (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: Narcissus (Greek: Νάρκισσος) was a strong and beautiful boy of Greek mythology. He is also known for his cruel disposition; he rejected the love of the youths, boy and girl, who adored him. His final act of rejection led to him being cursed by the deity of retribution, Nemesis. He fell in love with his own reflection in the water, which inadvertently led to his death. Accounts vary on the circumstances that brought Narcissus to his watery death, and even the cause of his death differs; he either drowned himself trying to embrace the image, starved to death or killed himself for being unable to accept this love. Either way, a flower grew from the spot he died, which was named the "narcissus."

demons.name: Rangda

traits.name: Elemental Bloodline (Curse)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, or Curse. The Spell Point cost of Skills that are of the chosen type is halved, to a minimum of 1.

traits.description:
Your deft parry and reversal of force eviscerates unwary attackers. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you would be targeted by a Physical or Gun Skill, roll 1d4. On a 4, you Repel that attack (see “Resistances” in the Combat section).
 • Whenever damage would be dealt to attackers by you through an effect that Repels, the damage dealt is doubled .

Make a melee attack against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+4 to hit, 20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 4d8 + 3 physical damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, a creature is inflicted with Fear (see “Conditions'').

skills.name: Matarunda (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You unleash a diminishing wave that inhibits foes. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures gain the effects of Tarunda.

demons.background: Rangda is the demon queen of the leyaks in Bali, according to traditional Balinese mythology. Terrifying to behold, the child-eating Rangda leads an army of evil witches against the leader of the forces of good, Barong.

demons.name: Barong

traits.name: Elemental Bloodline (Bless)

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Ziodyne (16 SP, 1 action)

On a hit, they receive 6d8 + 4 electric damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 3 or higher, the target is also Shocked (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Kougaon (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You invoke holy will, and a cascading pillar of light and holy magic erupts from the foe’s space. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 4d8 + 4 bless damage.

skills.name: Wage War (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A magical decree of war creates a tension, a pressure to enter a frenzy  within the battlefield. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (+5 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Rage (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: Barong is the protector of mankind that represents the forces of good in Indonesian lore. It uses its charms and magic to defend villagers against the deathly black magic of the witch Rangda. He is a guardian spirit that is most commonly seen in the form of a lion, although each region within Bali has its own version of Barong, the others being a dragon, boar or a tiger. Barong is animated by the brother spirit Banas Pati Rajah to do battle with Rangda in order to restore the balance between good and evil. However, after Rangda is killed, she is eventually resurrected, and Barong must do battle once again. This eternal battle is depicted in rituals seen in Bali, and in recent times have become an attraction for tourists.

demons.name: Garuda

traits.name: Elemental Bloodline (Wind)

skills.description: A maelstrom wraps around a target, buffeting them into oblivion. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 90 feet). On a hit, they receive 6d8 + 4 wind damage

skills.name: Mind Slice (12 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A cruel cleave sunders mind and body. Make a melee attack against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+5 to hit, 20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 2d8 + 2 physical damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, a creature is inflicted with Confuse (see “Conditions'').

skills.name: Masukukaja (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You accelerate each of your allies to rapid speeds. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures gain the effects of Sukukaja.

demons.background: In Hindu mythology, Garuda is a lesser Hindu divinity, usually the mount of Vishnu. Garuda is depicted as having a golden body, white face, red wings and an eagle's beak, but with a strong man's body. He wears a crown on his head. He is an ancient powerful creature in the epics, whose wing flapping can stop the spinning of heaven, earth and underworld, as well as large enough to block out the sun. The Satapatha Brahmana mentions Garuda as the personification of courage. In the Mahabharata, Garutman is stated to be the same as Garuda, then described as the one who is fast, who can shapeshift into any form and enter anywhere.

demons.name: Jatayu

traits.name: Speed Master
traits.description:
You have a unique sense for agile tactics. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you may add a +5 bonus to the roll.
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you gain the effects of the Sukukaja Skill at no cost or action

skills.name: Nocturnal Flash (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Wondrous starlight flashes like a meteor shower of the night, disorienting an enemy field’s vision. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (+4 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Dizzy (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Masukukaja (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You accelerate each of your allies to rapid speeds. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures gain the effects of Sukukaja.

demons.background: Jatayu is a valiant bird in the legends that depicted it. In the Hindu epic Ramayana, Jatayu is an old friend of Rama. It attempted to rescue Rama's wife Sita after she was kidnapped by Ravana, the devil-king. A fierce battle ensued, but Ravana managed to defeat Jatayu by slashing its wings. In a Malay literature, Hikayat Merong Mahawangsa, Jatayu is the nephew of the giant bird Garuda. It was summoned by King Merong Mahawangsa, a friend of the prince of Rome, to rescue the prince's betrothed, a Chinese princess who was kidnapped by Garuda. Despite its determination, Garuda managed to overpower Jatayu.

demons.name: Mishaguji

traits.name: Endure
traits.description: You can hold on by the skin of your teeth. When you would be reduced to 0 hit points by a hostile attack, you are reduced to 1 hit point instead. Once this ability is used, you cannot use it again until you fully recover in Reality.

traits.name: Hollow Jester
traits.description:
You seek out the weak-willed and the ailing pack. You gain the following benefits:
 • You may add half your character level (min 1) to the damage roll of any attack against which the target is Weak to.
 • You may add half your character level (min 1) to the damage roll of any attack against a target afflicted with a Condition. You may add this bonus multiple times, once for each Condition the target is inflicted with.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Brain Jack (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You’re not asking anymore. You use magic to directly weave into the hearts of foes, seizing control of the field. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (+3 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Brainwash (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: One-Shot Kill (9 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: A drill of piercing force strikes a target, rupturing them with spiralling force. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 4d10 + 3 gun damage. This Skill scores a Critical hit if the result of each d6 in its attack roll is 5 or higher.

skills.name: Psiodyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Webs and swirling vortexes of psionic energy siphon strength from the target. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 120 feet). On a hit, they receive 3d8 + 3 psychic damage

demons.background: Mishaguji was a native god worshiped in the ancient Shinto region of Japan before the Yamato took control, at which point the worship of it became a taboo. Mishaguji was the god of sexual intercourse and if he was left an offering, then sex would become better. It is said that Mishaguji's incarnation on Earth had a very phallic shape, possibly similar to an earthworm, and he would take shelter under rocks or stones. Once Yamato took control, however, Mishaguji became seen as a god that only the undesirable and unfaithful would worship.

demons.name: Norn

traits.name: Survival Trick
traits.description:
With deceit and trickery, as well as resilience, you are able to avoid disaster. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you would be reduced to 0 hit points by a Hama or Mudo type Skill, or Door of Hades, you are reduced to 1 hit points instead.
 • When you would be reduced to 0 hit points by a hostile attack that is not a Hama or Mudo type Skill, or Door of Hades , you are reduced to 1 hit point instead. Once this ability is used, you cannot use it again until you fully recover in Reality.

traits.name: Fast Heal
traits.description: You are able to recover from afflictions with ease. At the end of your turn, when afflicted with a Condition, roll 1d4. On a 4, you recover from it.

skills.name: Ziodyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Pulverizing, erratic lightning buffets a foe with a high chance of Shock. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 3d8 + 4 electric damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 3 or higher, the target is also Shocked (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Samarecarm (28 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A wellspring of youth and vigor comes forth, nurturing an ally with new health. Choose a creature that is knocked out within range (90 feet). That creature regains all of their missing hit points.

demons.background:
Norn, also known as Nornir, are the numerous female goddesses who rule the fates of the various races that exist in Norse Mythology. The three most important of the Norns are Urd, Verdandi and Skuld. These three are said to live near a lake under the roots of Yggdrasil, the world tree.
 They come out from a hall standing at the Well of Urðr (Fate). They draw water from the well and take sand that lies around it, which they pour over the Yggdrasil tree so that its branches will not rot. These three main Norns are described as powerful maiden giantesses (Jotuns) whose arrival from Jötunheimr ended the golden age of the gods.

demons.name: Sarasvati

traits.name: Relief Bloodline
traits.description: A most resplendent and glorious blessing comes from your hands. The Spell Point cost of Support type Skills used by you are halved, rounded down (min 1)

traits.name: Majestic Presence
traits.description:
When you have the initiative, you can unleash a storm of gunfire on foes, in addition to your cheap shots. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever a creature would regain hit points from a Skill within 60 feet, you may add a 2d8 bonus to the amount regained. This bonus is increased by 2d8 at 15th level (4d8).
 • Whenever a creature within 60 feet of you uses a Healing Skill, you may roll 1d4. On a 4, the spell point cost of that Skill is halved for that use, to a minimum of 1.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +6 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Element Wall (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You form a draining barrier that protects an ally. When you use this Skill, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, or Nuke. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For the next three rounds, starting to count down at the end of this one, the creature is no longer Weak to the chosen damage type, and receives half as much damage from that type (this effect is independent from and stacks with Resist).

skills.name: Diarahan (18 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A cascade of verdant light basks an ally in a healing glow, healing their most grievous injury. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). That creature regains 10d8 + 8 hit points.

skills.name: Tentarafoo (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Many tendrils swirl about, poised, then burrow into the minds of a battlefield to unsettle all. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (+4 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Confuse (see “Conditions”).

demons.background:
Sarasvati, also known as Saraswati, is the goddess of knowledge, music and the arts in Hindu mythology. She has been identified with the Vedic Sarasvati River. She is considered as consort of Brahma, the Hindu god of creation. Thus, with the goddesses Lakshmi and Parvati, she forms the Tridevi, who are consorts of the male trinity, the Trimurti, consisting of Brahma, Vishnu and Shiva, respectively. Sarasvati's children are the Vedas, which are the oldest sacred texts of Hinduism.
 She is known in East Asia as Benzaiten or Biancaitian (弁財天, Benzaiten)?, one of the Seven Lucky Gods in Japanese regional belief.

demons.name: Seth

traits.name: Fortify Spirit
traits.description: Your will is undeterred by afflictions. Dazzler, Makajama, Dormina, Pulinpa, Evil Touch, Ominous Words, Taunt, and Marin Karin type Skills have disadvantage against you.

traits.name: Down Shot
traits.description:
A combination of skill and flamboyant carelessness lets you perform a special maneuver of covering fire. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you roll 3d6 to make a Gun attack, if each d6 is the same result, the attack is a Critical hit.
 • As 1 action, you unleash a barrage of covering fire at a target within range of your firearm. This deals no damage, however the target is Downed. Once you use this ability, you cannot do so again until you fully recover in Reality.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +2 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: One-Shot Kill (9 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: A drill of piercing force strikes a target, rupturing them with spiralling force. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 4d10 + 3 gun damage. This Skill scores a Critical hit if the result of each d6 in its attack roll is 5 or higher.

skills.name: Agidyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A pillar-shaped conflagration erupts, spiraling about and enveloping a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 4d8 + 3 fire damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Burned (see “Conditions”)

skills.name: Masukukaja (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You accelerate each of your allies to rapid speeds. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures gain the effects of Sukukaja.

demons.background: Set, also spelled Seth, Sutekh or Sūtaḫ, is a deity from Egyptian mythology. Set is the deity of deserts, storms and chaos and served as one of the greatest deities in Egyptian myth. Set was married to the goddess Nephthys, who was also his sister. He killed and dismembered his brother Osiris out of jealousy. Isis, Osiris' wife and sister, reassembled him and Osiris became the ruler of the dead. Isis gave birth to Osiris's child, Horus, who became an enemy of Set. In earlier myths, Set fought Apep each night as Ra journeyed through the underworld.

demons.name: Tsukiyomi

traits.name: Bolstering Force
traits.description:
The first was terror. Your second strike is a nightmare. You gain the following benefits:
 • You may add half your character level (min 1) to the damage roll of any attack made using an action granted by a One More!
 • You may add half your character level (min 1) to the damage roll of any attack against a target afflicted with a Condition.

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Curse)

skills.description: Melee attack: +4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 4 physical damage.

Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-feet radius sphere within range (+4 to hit, 20 feet). On a hit, a creature receives 8d8 + 4 curse damage.

On a hit, the creature loses and you regain Spell Points equal to 8. This counts as damage for triggering Draining Mouth type Traits.

demons.background: Tsukuyomi is the lunar god in Shintoism. He was born of Izanagi's right eye as he bathed after his descent to the underworld, thus making him the brother of Amaterasu and Susano-o.

demons.name: Cerberus

traits.name: Elemental Bloodline (Fire)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, or Curse. The Spell Point cost of Skills that are of the chosen type is halved (min 1).

traits.name: Enduring Soul
traits.description: You bounce back fully when push comes to shove. When you would be reduced to 0 hit points by a hostile attack, you are reduced to a value equal to half of your maximum hit points. This ability may increase your current hit points through healing. Once this ability is used, you cannot use it again until you fully recover in Reality.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 5 physical damage.

skills.name: Agidyne (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A pillar-shaped conflagration erupts, spiraling about and enveloping a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+5 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 4d8 + 3 fire damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Burned (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Megaton Raid (8 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: Absolute force of impact crushes a foe at your feet. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (+5 to hit, 5 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 4d8 + 5 physical damage.

skills.name: Rebellion (5 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Golden light of obstinance heightens an ally’s ability to deliver punishment. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, attacks the creature makes score a Critical hit if the result of each d6 is a 5 or higher.

demons.background:
In Greek mythology, Cerberus, also known as Kerberos, is a monster and pet under Hades that guards the gates of the Greek underworld, the realm of Hades. It is generally depicted as a vicious, gargantuan dog with three heads, although accounts may vary. Cerberus is in fact the Latin transliteration of the Greek name Kerberos.
 Cerberus was one of the monsters born from the union of Echidna and Typhon, both as monstrous and hideous as their offspring. Echidna was half-woman, half-serpent, while Typhon was the most fierce of all creatures. Among his brothers, the most famous are the Lernaean Hydra, Chimera, and Orthrus.

demons.name: Ganesha

traits.name: Gluttonmouth
traits.description: You rip and tear, devouring flesh and blood to heal yourself. Whenever you damage an enemy creature with a Physical or Gun Skill, you regain 2d4 hit points. You may only benefit from this ability once per turn.

traits.name: Flow
traits.description:
Momentum lifts you up and carries you forward. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you roll Initiative, roll 1d4. On a 4, you gain the benefits of Power Charge and Concentrate at no cost.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 5 physical damage.

The next time, within the next 10 minutes, they would instantly be reduced to 0 hit points from a Hama or Mudo type Skill, or from Door of Hades, the effect is prevented completely.

skills.name: Power Charge (15 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You begin amassing your strength and stamina, coalescing into an ultimate strike. The next damage roll you make for an attack that deals Physical or Gun damage within the next 10 minutes is doubled.

skills.name: Miracle Punch (4 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: You seize the opportunity that fate has laid before you, making this strike count. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (+2 to hit, 10 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 2d10 + 5 physical damage. This Skill scores a Critical hit if the result of each d6 in its attack roll is 5 or higher.

demons.background: Ganesha (also called Ganesh or Ganesa) is one of the most worshiped deities in the Hindu pantheon and is known as the Lord of Obstacles, Lord of Beginnings, god of wisdom and intelligence and patron of arts and science. He is the son of Shiva and Parvati and depicted as having the head of an elephant (often with one broken tusk), a pot-belly and anywhere from two to six arms.

demons.name: Okuninushi

demons.background: Element Break (15 SP, 2 actions). You reach out your hand, and crush a foe’s resilience to your attack. When you use this Skill, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, or Nuke and up to six creatures within range (90 feet). For the next three rounds starting to count down at the end of this one, those creatures no longer Resist, Block, Drain, or Repel the chosen damage type. Additionally, this Skill removes all Tetrakarn and Makarakarn effects from affected creatures.

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Curse)

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack

Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (+3 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Despair (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Megidola (24 SP, 2 actions)

demons.background: The Pale Rider, or Pale Horseman, is the fourth and final Horseman of the Apocalypse, according to Christian scripture. The rider traditionally represents death and bears a scythe of death. Despite typically being portrayed carrying a scythe as his weapon (much like the Grim Reaper), in the Book of Revelation, he is described as bringing Hades (Hell) wherever he rides as his symbol. His color being pale, as opposed to an actual color, could be reflecting the sickly appearance of a corpse (though old translations could be interpreted as the rider being pale green and yellowish green.)

demons.background: Naga Raja are the many kings of nagas with many stories involving them in Hindu mythology. Raja Naga also appear in Buddhist mythology, and their duties consist of leading the nagas and protecting and worshipping the Buddha, along with protecting other enlightened beings.

demons.name: Skadi

On a hit, the creature receives 6d10 + 3 physical damage. If this Skill is used with an action granted by a Baton Pass, the damage dealt is doubled.

skills.name: Evil Smile (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Your wickedness is magically enhanced, sending waves of chills through all who witness. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (+3 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Fear (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Ghastly Wail (16 SP, 2 actions)

This Skill affects all creatures within range, including yourself and allies (30 feet). Each creature afflicted by the Fear condition (see “Conditions”) within range is reduced to 0 hit points immediately.

demons.background:
Skadi (Norse: Skaði), alternatively referred to as Öndurguð or Öndurdís (lit: Snowshoe goddess), is a jötunn, a giantess in Norse mythology. Associated with skiing, hunting and winter, she is the daughter of Thjazi, one-time wife of the god Njörður, and stepmother of Freyr and Freya.
 In The Woman's Encyclopedia of Myths and Secrets authored by Barbara G. Walker in 1983, Skadi was said to be a Celtic goddess who carries the meaning of darkness and shadow, and thus an equivalent to the Irish Scathach. Today, many unique interpretations of mythological figures including Skadi and Mem Aleph by Walker are largely dismissed as unreliable, but her influence has already been spread to modern popular culture including the Megami Tensei series. Not only Skadi's design by Kazuma Kaneko which is completely black from head to toe, in the Japanese version of all games of the series, Skadi's background commentary recycles the same prose which cites Walker's theory without mentioning Skadi's origin as a Norse snowshoe goddess.

demons.name: Asterius

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Fire)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage. Add a 2d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills of the chosen element. At 15h level, this bonus is increased by 1d8 (3d8).

traits.name: Boosted Rage
traits.description:
Your berserk fury knows little to no bounds. You gain the following benefits:
 • While inflicted with Rage (see “Conditions”), damage dealt by basic melee weapon attacks by you is doubled.
 • As 1 action, you enter a frenzied state. This grants you the effects of the Tarukaja Skill at no cost. Then, make a melee attack against yourself. If the result of all d6s in this attack are a 3 or higher, you are inflicted with Rage
 (see “Conditions”). You may willingly be inflicted with Rage this way.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +1 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 5 physical damage.

skills.name: Titanomachia (32 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A swathe of cursed blazes erupts from the earth to envelop foes in pure, manifested rage. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-feet sphere centered at a point within range (+3 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 7d8 + 5 fire damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 3 or higher, the target is also inflicted with Fear (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Tetrakarn (20 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You form a physical shield that blocks all kinetic force from penetrating. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). That creature Repels the next attack they receive within the next 10 minutes that deals Physical or Gun damage (see “Damage”).

skills.name: Gigantomachia (16 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A tectonic force crumbles and fissures the earth, unleashing pure destruction on your foes. Make a melee attack against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+3 to hit, 20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 6d8 + 5 physical damage.

demons.background:
The first Asterion was a sacred king of Crete whose wife Europa was seduced by Zeus when he assumed the form of the Cretan bull, producing Minos. He is the son of Tectamus and an unnamed daughter of Cretheus. His father sailed to Crete and became the ruler of the island. Asterion inherited the throne from his father and he was the king of Crete at the time and married Europa, who was abducted by Zeus, becoming the stepfather of her sons by Zeus. Asterion brought up his stepsons, one of them being Minos and when he died childless, Minos took the throne and "banished" his brothers.
 The second Asterion was in fact the Minotaur, star at the center of the labyrinth on Cretan coins, the son of Minos's wife fathered by the Cretan Bull as punishment for Minos not sacrificing it in Poseidon's honor. "Minotaur" is simply a name of Hellenic coining to describe his Cretan symbolism, since "Minotaur" is a portmanteau of Minos and taûros, the Greek word for bull.

demons.name: Baphomet

traits.name: Ghost Nest
traits.description:
Ethereal claws of your will aid in penetrating the defenses of others. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you attempt to inflict a Downed creature with a Condition, roll 1d4. On a 4, the Condition is inflicted.
 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage.

traits.name: Gaia Blessing
traits.description:
With your blessing, you ride into battle and crush enemies underneath, heightening the elemental powers around you. Additionally, your Persona/Demonic abilities manifest in a vehicular way:
 • Whenever you or a creature within 30 feet of you attempts to inflict a target with Burn, Shock, or Freeze, you may roll 1d4. On a 4, the Condition is successfully inflicted.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Agidyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A pillar-shaped conflagration erupts, spiraling about and enveloping a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 4d8 + 5 fire damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Burned (see “Conditions”)

skills.name: Bufudyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A gale of pure, arctic wind surrounds and freezes a foe solid. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 3d8 + 5 ice damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 3 or higher, the target is also Frozen (see “Conditions”)

skills.name: Ziodyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Pulverizing, erratic lightning buffets a foe with a high chance of Shock. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 3d8 + 5 electric damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 3 or higher, the target is also Shocked (see “Conditions”).

demons.background:
Baphomet is a king of demons, known as the "Sabbatic Goat." He is identified with Satanachia, a senior demon general described in the Grand Grimoire. His name is believed to be a corruption of Muhammad, the founder of Islam. He is usually depicted with the head of a goat, with a pentagram carved between his horns, and the body of a human woman or hermaphrodite. He has the power to control all human women, and is said to give witches their power, thus, famously known as a demon worshipped by witches.
 The Knights Templar, heroes of the Crusades, were accused of worshipping Baphomet by a church inquisition and branded as heretics. To keep them silent, the head of the Templars and another senior leader were sentenced to be burned alive. However, it was later revealed that this was orchestrated by King Philip IV of France, who coveted the Templars' wealth.

demons.name: Chernobog

traits.name: Crisis Control
traits.description:
You not only exploit weakness effectively, but know how to guard your own. You gain the following benefits:
 • You may add half your character level (min 1) to the damage roll of any attack against which the target is Weak to.
 • You receive half as much damage from attacks against which you are Weak.

traits.name: Striking Weight
traits.description: A fell-handed delivery makes your blows land harder. Add a 1d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills that deal Physical damage. At 15th level this bonus is increased by 1d8 (2d8).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Bloodbath (16 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Ribbons of dark blades lash out, hacking a field into terrifying ribbons. Make a melee attack against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+3 to hit, 20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 6d8 + 4 physical damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, a creature is inflicted with Fear (see “Conditions'').

skills.name: Foul Breath (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A wretched stench of numerous unnamed diseases engulfs a foe. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For the next 10 minutes, whenever the creature would be potentially inflicted with a Condition, flip a coin. If heads, the Condition is successfully inflicted. This effect is in addition to the original means by which they are inflicted by the Condition.

skills.name: Mudoon (12 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Darkness and malevolent spirits crush the victim’s will. Choose a creature within range and make a ranged attack against them (+3 to hit, 90 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 3 or higher, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points immediately. You have advantage on attack rolls with this Skill if the creature is Weak to Curse. This Skill provokes a One More if the target is weak to Curse.

demons.background: Chernobog, whose name means Black God, is an alleged Slavic deity of darkness and bad faith. Chernobog is not often mentioned in Slavic pagan sources, but is mentioned by the Western Slavs. He is associated with destruction, darkness and the winter. Due to this, he wasn't worshiped but instead avoided, just like Baba Yaga. This conflicts with the Slavic pagan customs of pleasing gods/goddesses and spirits in order to gain their blessing and protection. He is also synonymous with evil and later became synonymous with the devil.

demons.name: Melchizedek

traits.name: Deathly Illness
traits.description: You wield the secrets of eradication. You have advantage on attacks made for Hama, Hamaon, Samsara, Mudo, Mudoon,  Die for Me!, and Door of Hades.

traits.name: Striking Weight
traits.description: A fell-handed delivery makes your blows land harder. Add a 1d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills that deal Physical damage. At 15th level this bonus is increased by 1d8 (2d8).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +1 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 5 physical damage.

skills.name: Hamaon (12 SP, 1 action)

Choose a creature within range and make a ranged attack against them (+3 to hit, 90 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 3 or higher, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points immediately. You have advantage on attack rolls with this Skill if the creature is Weak to Bless. This Skill provokes a One More if the target is weak to Bless.

skills.name: Rebellion (5 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Golden light of obstinance heightens an ally’s ability to deliver punishment. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, attacks the creature makes score a Critical hit if the result of each d6 is a 5 or higher.

skills.name: God Hand (12 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: You unleash a large, concentrated wave of raw power and force. It shoots forward from your own, crushing those underneath it with obliterating impact. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 20 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 7d8 + 3 physical damage. You may move to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the target after attacking. This attack may not connect if movement to this space is prevented.

demons.background: Melchizedek, also known as Melchisedech, Melkisetek or Malki Tzedek, is a biblical figure known for his wisdom. He was the king of Salem and priest of El Elyon mentioned in the 14th chapter of the Book of Genesis. He brings out bread and wine and then blesses Abram and El Elyon, in the time of Abraham.

demons.name: Parvati

traits.name: Skillful Technique
traits.description: You understand the art of striking vitals with all of your strength the moment willing. You may add your character level to the damage roll of any attack against which the target is Weak to.

traits.name: Majestic Presence
traits.description:
When you have the initiative, you can unleash a storm of gunfire on foes, in addition to your cheap shots. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever a creature would regain hit points from a Skill within 60 feet, you may add a 2d8 bonus to the amount regained. This bonus is increased by 2d8 at 15th level (4d8).
 • Whenever a creature within 60 feet of you uses a Healing Skill, you may roll 1d4. On a 4, the spell point cost of that Skill is halved for that use, to a minimum of 1.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +1 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 5 physical damage.

skills.name: Psiodyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Webs and swirling vortexes of psionic energy siphon strength from the target. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 120 feet). On a hit, they receive 3d8 + 4 psychic damage.

skills.name: Energy Shower (6 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Magical medicine rains, honing the mind against uncontrolled emotions. Choose up to six creatures within range (60 feet). Each of those creatures recover from Confuse, Fear, Despair, Rage, and Brainwash (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: Parvati is the Hindu goddess of fertility, love, beauty, harmony, marriage, children and devotion; as well as of divine strength and power. This beautiful goddess is also the second consort of Shiva in the Hindu mythology. A mountain princess, she is the reincarnation of the goddess Sati (Shiva's first consort), and won Shiva's love in her previous life despite his asceticism, but immolated herself after her father's disapproval. Reborn as Parvati, daughter of the snow mountain god Himalayas, she sought Shiva out. Because the gods required Shiva's offspring to defeat their fierce adversaries, they sacrificed Kama in order to stoke Shiva's suppressed desire for a female partner. The two reunited eventually and together gave birth to Kartikeya and later on, Ganesha. They have the ability to merge into the half-male, half-female Ardha.﻿

demons.name: Titiana

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Nuke)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage. Add a 2d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills of the chosen element. At 15h level, this bonus is increased by 1d8 (3d8).

traits.name: Gaia Blessing
traits.description:
With your blessing, you ride into battle and crush enemies underneath, heightening the elemental powers around you. Additionally, your Persona/Demonic abilities manifest in a vehicular way:
 • Whenever you or a creature within 30 feet of you attempts to inflict a target with Burn, Shock, or Freeze, you may roll 1d4. On a 4, the Condition is successfully inflicted.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Freidyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A plasma blast incinerates and irradiates a perfect sphere of foes, immolating them in the spot. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 10-feet radius sphere centered at a point within range (+5 to hit, 20 feet). On a hit, they receive 6d8 + 5 nuke damage.

skills.name: Ziodyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Pulverizing, erratic lightning buffets a foe with a high chance of Shock. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+3 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 3d8 + 5 electric damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 3 or higher, the target is also Shocked (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Mediarahan (36 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A cascade of verdant light basks many allies in a healing glow, healing their most grievous injury. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures regain 6d8 + 10 hit points.

demons.background: Titania is the high queen of the fae and the wife of the high fae king Oberon. With her faithful flower pixies by her side, she gathers magic from moonlight. Titania resides in the Kingdom of Fairyland, where she rules over the moonlit Fairy Forest. While considered stunningly beautiful and delicate, she is also portrayed as a very proud fairy, with powers that easily match those of her husband.

demons.name: Yatagarasu

traits.name: Unparalleled Eyes
traits.description: Your vision is unmatched, and comes in clutch to save an endangered ally. Attacks made against you or allies within 30 feet of you that deal Physical damage have disadvantage.

traits.name: Tactical Spirit
traits.description: Your quick-witted analysis allows you to reduce the strain of cooperation. Whenever you or a creature within 60 feet of you uses a Support, you may roll 1d6. On a 6, the Spell Point cost of the Skill is halved, rounded down, to a minimum of 1.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +7 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Dekunda (12 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You cleanse impurities of the heart. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). All effects of Tarunda, Rakunda, Sukunda are removed from them.

skills.name: Agidyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A pillar-shaped conflagration erupts, spiraling about and enveloping a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+5 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 4d8 + 5 fire damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Burned (see “Conditions”)

skills.name: Mediarahan (36 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A cascade of verdant light basks many allies in a healing glow, healing their most grievous injury. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures regain 6d8 + 10 hit points.

demons.background:
Yatagarasu is a great divine bird that represents the will of heaven or divine intervention in human affairs in Japanese mythology. Although Yatagarasu is mentioned in a number of places in the Shinto canon, there is very little explanation, and much of the material is contradictory
 This great crow was sent from heaven as a guide for Emperor Jimmu on his initial journey from the region which would become Kumano to what would become Yamato. It is generally accepted that Yatagarasu is an incarnation of Taketsunimi, but none of the early surviving documentary records are quite so specific.
 None of the sources mention it having three legs either, and it may have been influenced by the Chinese sun bird Huoniao.

demons.name: Black Rider

traits.name: Omen
traits.description:
You are a living embodiment of purgation. You gain the following benefits:
 • You have advantage on attacks made for Hama, Hamaon, Samsara, Mudo, Mudoon,  Die for Me!, and Door of Hades.
 • Whenever you make an attack roll for Hama, Hamaon, Samsara, Mudo, Mudoon,  Die for Me!, or Door of Hades, you may reroll any of the dice once. You must use the new result.

traits.name: Draining Mouth
traits.description: With each blow, you sink your teeth into a foe, absorbing it's essence. Whenever you damage an enemy creature with a Physical or Gun Skill, you regain 1d4 hit points. Whenever you damage an enemy creature with a Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty Skill, you regain 1d4 spell points. You may only benefit from this ability once per turn.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Megidola (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Glowing, star-like spheres manifest above the field, then fire beams of destructive force by the dozens into foes. Make a ranged attack against up to six creatures within range (+5 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 2d8 + 5 almighty damage.

skills.name: Mudoon (12 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Darkness and malevolent spirits crush the victim’s will. Choose a creature within range and make a ranged attack against them (+5 to hit, 90 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 3 or higher, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points immediately. You have advantage on attack rolls with this Skill if the creature is Weak to Curse. This Skill provokes a One More if the target is weak to Curse.

skills.name: Flash Bomb (12 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A shocking blast of explosive force blinds foes. Make a melee attack against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+5 to hit, 20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 2d8 + 5 physical damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, a creature is inflicted with Dizzy (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: The Black Rider, or Black Horsemen, is the third of the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse, riding a black horse, popularly called Famine. The black color of the third horse symbolized death and famine, bearing a scale of famine. The rider rides onward, denying the world life-sustaining food and bringing starvation, but being ordered by divine law to not harm oil or wine. The rider is shown holding a scale, which represents scarcity of food, higher prices and famine, likely as a result of the wars caused by the red horseman. Food will be scarce, but luxuries such as wine and oil will still be readily available.

demons.name: King Frost

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Ice)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage. Add a 2d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills of the chosen element. At 15h level, this bonus is increased by 1d8 (3d8).

traits.name: Elemental Bloodline (Ice)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, or Curse. The Spell Point cost of Skills that are of the chosen type is halved (min 1).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 5 physical damage.

skills.name: Bufudyne (8 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A gale of pure, arctic wind surrounds and freezes a foe solid. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+1 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 6d8 + 5 ice damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 3 or higher, the target is also Frozen (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Megaton Raid (8 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: Absolute force of impact crushes a foe at your feet. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (+1 to hit, 5 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 4d8 + 5 physical damage.

skills.name: Concentrate (15 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You gather and focus your mind's eye, delivering an absolute force of will. The next damage roll you make for an attack that deals Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage within the next 10 minutes is doubled.

demons.background:
King Frost likely comes from "The Frost Fairies," a short story written by Margaret T. Canby about King (Jack) Frost, a kind fairy king from the cold North.
 It is also just as likely that it's a pun about the fact that Jack and King are both playing card ranks.

demons.name: Lilith

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Nuke)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage. Add a 2d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills of the chosen element. At 15h level, this bonus is increased by 1d8 (3d8).

traits.name: Icy Glare
traits.description: Your cold gaze alleviates the pressure of foes from your allies. Whenever you or an ally within 60 feet of you would be afflicted with a Condition, roll 1d4. On a 4, the creature recovers from it.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +5 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Freidyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A plasma blast incinerates and irradiates a perfect sphere of foes, immolating them in the spot. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 10-feet radius sphere centered at a point within range (+5 to hit, 20 feet). On a hit, they receive 6d8 + 5 nuke damage.

skills.name: Dekaja (12 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You erase all motes of strength for foes. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). All effects of Tarukaja, Rakukaja, Sukukaja are removed from them.

skills.name: Spirit Drain (5 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You sate your aural thirst with the magical powers and thoughts of your foe, absorbing their essence. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+5 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, the creature loses and you regain Spell Points equal to 10. This counts as damage that is not Physical or Gun for triggering Draining Mouth type Traits.

demons.background:
Lilith was originally a storm demon known as "Lilitu" in ancient Mesopotamian myth around 3000 BC and she was thought to have been the cause of disease, illness, and death. She later appears as a nocturnal demon in Jewish lore.
 In Judaism, Lilith was the first wife of Adam, however she was cast out of the garden of Eden for her sinful ways or because she desired to be his equal and refused to obey him. In one tale, she was the first to eat the fruit of knowledge and wanted to be either equal to or greater than Adam. After she left the garden of Eden, she attempted to create her own garden and became the consort of many different demons, including the fallen angel Samael, and bore many demons including the succubi known as the Lilim.

demons.name: Moloch

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Nuke)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage. Add a 2d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills of the chosen element. At 15h level, this bonus is increased by 1d8 (3d8).

traits.name: Unshaken Will
traits.description: A stiff upper lip aids you to overcome even the most destitute of your thoughts. You are immune to the Confuse, Fear, Despair, Rage, and Brainwash Conditions (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Agidyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A pillar-shaped conflagration erupts, spiraling about and enveloping a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+5 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 7d8 + 5 fire damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Burned (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Stagnant Air (5 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: The air becomes riddled and ripe with foul energy, Disease and wretched magic begins to flow and infest more easily. This Skill affects all creatures within range, including yourself and allies (30 feet). For the next 10 minutes, whenever an affected creature would be potentially inflicted with a Condition, flip a coin. If heads, the Condition is successfully inflicted. This effect is in addition to the original means by which they are inflicted by the Condition.

skills.name: Evil Smile (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Your wickedness is magically enhanced, sending waves of chills through all who witness. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (+5 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Fear (see “Conditions”).

demons.background: Moloch, or Molech, refers to a particular kind of sacrifice or possibly a god associated with fire, known first and foremost from the Bible. According to Leviticus, children were burned as an offering to Moloch. While Christian and Jewish tradition present Moloch as a demonic idol, an influential theory first formed in the the 1930s interprets the name as a term for a form of sacrifice analogous to the Punic mlk.[1] According to the Romans, child offerings were one of the main forms of worship of the "african Saturn" (Baal Hammon), the tutelary god of Carthage, leading to the assumption that mlk known from inscriptions from Punic sites is the rite of child sacrifice.

demons.name: Seiryu

traits.name: God Maker
traits.description:
It is in your presence and by your hand that your allies are enabled to forge legends. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever an allied creature within 120 feet, excluding yourself, rolls dice as part of a Trait’s effect (such as Counter, Gaia Pact, Mastery of Magic, etc), you may reroll the dice once. You must use the new result.

traits.name: Relentless
traits.description: Mercy is a luxury you can’t afford . You may add half your character level (min 1) to the damage roll of any attack against which the target is Weak to.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Bufudyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A gale of pure, arctic wind surrounds and freezes a foe solid. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-2 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 3d8 + 5 ice damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 3 or higher, the target is also Frozen (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Marakukaja (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You coordinate the defense of your allies, covering flanks and shielding them from danger. Choose up to six creatures within range. Those creatures gain the effects of Rakukaja.

skills.name: Makarakarn (20 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You form a shimmering barrier that mirrors arcane assaults. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). That creature Repels the next attack they receive within the next 10 minutes that deals Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, or Curse damage (see “Damage”).

demons.background:
The Qing Long, also known as Azure Dragon of the East or simply the Azure Dragon is one of the Four Symbols of the Chinese Constellation (Si Xiang) along with Xuan Wu, Zhu Que and Bai Hu. He is also one of the dragon gods who represent the mount or chthonic forces of the Five Forms of the Highest Deity in Chinese cosmology.
 It represents the East, spring, the color azure (green/blue) and the wood element. It is sometimes called the Azure Dragon of the East and is also known as Seiryu in Japanese, Cheong Yong in Korean and Thanh Long in Vietnamese. He has also been known as Blue-green Dragon, Green Dragon or the Blue Dragon.

demons.name: Trumpeter

traits.name: Fortify Spirit
traits.description: Your will is undeterred by afflictions. Dazzler, Makajama, Dormina, Pulinpa, Evil Touch, Ominous Words, Taunt, and Marin Karin type Skills have disadvantage against you

traits.name: Relentless
traits.description: Mercy is a luxury you can’t afford . You may add half your character level (min 1) to the damage roll of any attack against which the target is Weak to.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -2 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 2 physical damage.

skills.name: Debilitate (18 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You forcibly impose baleful curses upon a foe, decreasing its overall combat performance. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). This creature gains the effects of Tarunda, Rakunda, and Sukunda.

skills.name: Abysmal Surge (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You blanket the minds and bodies of a battlefield in hopelessness and magic devoid of reason. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (-2 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Despair (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Freidyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A plasma blast incinerates and irradiates a perfect sphere of foes, immolating them in the spot. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 10-feet radius sphere centered at a point within range (-2 to hit, 20 feet). On a hit, they receive 3d8 + 5 nuke damage.

demons.background: The Trumpeter is based on one of the angels mentioned in the Book of Revelation of the New Testament. It is said that seven trumpets will be sounded by seven angels, and each trumpet signifies a different event or plague on Earth before the final moments leading to the Apocalypse.

demons.name: Forneus

traits.name: Survival Trick
traits.description:
With deceit and trickery, as well as resilience, you are able to avoid disaster. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you would be reduced to 0 hit points by a Hama or Mudo type Skill, or Door of Hades, you are reduced to 1 hit points instead.
 • When you would be reduced to 0 hit points by a hostile attack that is not a Hama or Mudo type Skill, or Door of Hades , you are reduced to 1 hit point instead. Once this ability is used, you cannot use it again until you fully recover in Reality.

traits.name: Relentless
traits.description: Mercy is a luxury you can’t afford . You may add half your character level (min 1) to the damage roll of any attack against which the target is Weak to.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +6 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Psiodyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Webs and swirling vortexes of psionic energy siphon strength from the target. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (+4 to hit, 120 feet). On a hit, they receive 3d8 + 3 psychic damage.

skills.name: Brain Jack (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You’re not asking anymore. You use magic to directly weave into the hearts of foes, seizing control of the field. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (+4 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Brainwash (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Masukunda (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You bind and slow a group of enemies, allowing you to act faster than them. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures gain the effects of Sukunda.

demons.background:
According to the writings in The Lesser Key of Solomon, Forneus is the thirtieth demonic spirit listed in Ars Goetia. He is a Great Marquis of Hell with twenty-nine legions under his command, partly of the order of angels and thrones, and appears as a sea monster. When summoned, he can make men well-versed in rhetoric, give them a good name, teach them foreign tongues, and make them trusted by friend and foe alike.
 His name seems to come from "fornus" (oven). He can take many different forms but mainly prefers his human form.

demons.name: Hanuman

traits.name: Attack Master
traits.description:
You have a unique sense for offensive tactics. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you may add a +5 bonus to the roll.
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you gain the effects of the Tarukaja Skill at no cost or action.

traits.name: Endure
traits.description: You can hold on by the skin of your teeth. When you would be reduced to 0 hit points by a hostile attack, you are reduced to 1 hit point instead. Once this ability is used, you cannot use it again until you fully recover in Reality.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Deathbound (12 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Hands of fallen warriors emerge from the soil to grasp and strike at foes. Make two melee attacks against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (+4 to hit, 20 feet). For each hit, a creature receives 2d8 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Matarunda (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You unleash a diminishing wave that inhibits foes. Choose up to six creatures within range. Those creatures gain the effects of Tarunda.

skills.name: Rebellion (5 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Golden light of obstinance heightens an ally’s ability to deliver punishment. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). For 1 minute, attacks the creature makes score a Critical hit if the result of each d6 is a 5 or higher.

demons.background:
Hanuman, also known as Anjaneya (son of Anjana, an Apsara), is son of the wind god Vayu. He is as tall as a mountain, his face shines scarlet, and he has a long tail. He is the hero of the monkey army. His roar is like thunder, he is able to transform into anything, fly, and has great strength.
 He is one of the most important characters in the epic Ramayana where he performs many heroic feats. He is most famously known for aiding prince Rama (one of the avatars of Vishnu) in defeating the demon king Ravana by leading an army of monkeys.

demons.name: Kali

traits.name: Counter
traits.description: A swift parry allows you to turn the tables. Whenever you would be targeted by a Physical or Gun Skill, roll 1d4. On a 4, you Repel that attack (see “Resistances” in the Combat section).

traits.name: Relentless
traits.description: Mercy is a luxury you can’t afford . You may add half your character level (min 1) to the damage roll of any attack against which the target is Weak to.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -2 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 5 physical damage.

skills.name: Brave Blade (10 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: Heroic strength and dexterity combine to make a righteous slash attack. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (-2 to hit, 5 feet). On a hit, a creature receives 4d10 + 5 physical damage. You may roll and add 2d10 to the damage roll of this attack if it is affected by the Power Charge Skill, before the damage is doubled.

skills.name: Power Charge (15 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You begin amassing your strength and stamina, coalescing into an ultimate strike. The next damage roll you make for an attack that deals Physical or Gun damage within the next 10 minutes is doubled.

skills.name: Bloodbath (16 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Ribbons of dark blades lash out, hacking a field into terrifying ribbons. Make a melee attack against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (-2 to hit, 20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 4d8 + 5 physical damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, a creature is inflicted with Fear (see “Conditions'').

demons.background: Kali is a Hindu goddess associated with death, time and destruction. The name Kali means "black," but has by folk etymology come to mean "force of time (kala)." The name "Kali" means "black one" and is derived from the word "kala" (black), but has also come to mean "goddess of time". Despite her negative connotations, she is today considered the goddess of time and change. Although sometimes presented as dark and violent, her earliest incarnation as a figure of annihilation still has some influence. More complex Tantric beliefs sometimes extend her role so far as to be the "ultimate reality" or Brahman. She is also revered as Bhavatarini (literally "redeemer of the universe"). Comparatively recent devotional movements largely conceive Kali as a benevolent mother goddess.

demons.name: Loki

traits.name: Ingenious Spirit
traits.description:
Your tactical supremacy is without question, navigating the optimal path for you and your allies. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you or a creature within 60 feet of you uses a Support, you may roll 1d4. On a 4, the Spell Point cost of the Skill is halved, rounded down, to a minimum of 1.
 • The first Analysis action you perform during a turn does not cost an action.

traits.name: Fortify Spirit
traits.description: Your will is undeterred by afflictions. Dazzler, Makajama, Dormina, Pulinpa, Evil Touch, Ominous Words, Taunt, and Marin Karin type Skills have disadvantage against you.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -2 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 5 physical damage.

skills.name: Laevateinn (10 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: Loki lunges forth, slashing with an arcane blade of immense power forged with his two hands. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (-2 to hit, 10 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 5d10 + 5 physical damage.

skills.name: Debilitate (18 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You forcibly impose baleful curses upon a foe, decreasing its overall combat performance. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). This creature gains the effects of Tarunda, Rakunda, and Sukunda.

skills.name: Riot Gun (12 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A shower of piercing shots rain from the heavens above, turning foes into ribbons. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-feet sphere, centered at a point within range (-2 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 5d10 + 5 gun damage.

demons.background: Loki was the trickster god who was also known to be a god of mischief, magic and fire in Norse Mythology. His mischievous nature was such that he even managed to slither his way into becoming one of the Norse deities. He is son of Fárbauti, a jötunn, and Laufey, a lesser known goddess and is the blood-brother of Odin, with his two biological brothers being Helblindi and Býleistr. With the onset of Ragnarök, Loki is foretold to encounter the god Heimdallr and kill him, dying in the process.

demons.name: Thor

traits.name: Heat Up
traits.description:
You are hot to trot when the need arises. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you may add a +5 bonus to the roll.

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Electric)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage. Add a 2d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills of the chosen element. At 15h level, this bonus is increased by 1d8 (3d8).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -2 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 5 physical damage.

skills.name: Wild Thunder (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You unfurl a pure, ungrounded storm of lightning that vaporizes most upon a field of foes with a high chance of Shock. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-feet sphere centered at a point within range (-2 to hit, 20 feet). On a hit, they receive 7d8 + 4 electric damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 3 or higher, the target is also Shocked (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Megaton Raid (8 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: Absolute force of impact crushes a foe at your feet. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (-2 to hit, 5 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 4d8 + 5 physical damage.

skills.name: Super Charge (25 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You heighten your resolve and unleash brutality with extraordinary support. You gain the effects of Concentrate and Power Charge.

demons.background: Thor (Old Norse: Þórr), also known as Thor Odinson, is the red-haired son of Odin and Jord, and is the god of lightning, thunder, storms, sacred groves and trees in Norse mythology and Germanic paganism. Thor is one of the most powerful gods and uses his superior power to protect Asgard and Midgard. Due to his lust for battle and incredible prowess, Thor is also portrayed as a war god and also an agricultural god due to his status as a weather deity that aids in the growth of crops. His belt Mejingjard doubles his strength and lightning flashes every time he throws his trusty hammer, Mjölnir.

demons.name: Yamata-no-Orochi

traits.name: Cold-Blooded
traits.description:
With reptilian cruelty, you freeze a foe. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you attempt to inflict a Downed creature with Freeze (see “Conditions”), flip a coin. If heads, the Condition is inflicted.
 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage.

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Ice)

A creature hit by this attack receives 2d8 + 5 physical damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, a creature is inflicted with Rage (see “Conditions”).

demons.background:
Yamata no Orochi is an eight-headed and eight-tailed serpent dragon with an enormous body that reaches across eight valleys and eight hills that appears in Japanese lore.
 When Susano-o is in exile from the heavens, he finds a couple and their daughter crying by the river. They explain their sadness to him, that every year, the Orochi comes to devour one of their daughters. This year, they must give up their eighth and final daughter, Kushinada-Hime.

demons.name: Atavaka

traits.name: Attack Master
traits.description:
You have a unique sense for offensive tactics. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you may add a +5 bonus to the roll.
 • Whenever you roll for initiative, you gain the effects of the Tarukaja Skill at no cost or action.

traits.name: Savior Bloodline
traits.description: You give off blessings by the dozen. The Spell Point cost of Healing type Skills used by you is halved (min 1).

skills.description: A wellspring of youth and vigor comes forth, nurturing an ally with new health. Choose a creature that is knocked out within range (90 feet). That creature regains all of their missing hit points.

On a hit, the creature receives 6d10 + 5 physical damage. If this Skill is used with an action granted by a Baton Pass, the damage dealt is doubled.

demons.background: Also known as Tamonten and Vaishravana in Buddhist lore, he is the strongest of the Heavenly Kings. He protects the North and is the god of war.

demons.name: Mot

traits.name: Mastery of Magic

Whenever you or a creature within 60 feet of you uses a Skill that deals Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage, you may roll 1d6. On a 6, the Spell Point cost of the Skill is halved, rounded down, to a minimum of 1.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 3 physical damage.

skills.name: Megidolaon (36 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A flash of light. A singularity instantly expands, as a reality-busting sphere of destructive energy emerges from the ground, blinding and erasing all. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered at a point within range (-2 to hit, 20 feet). On a hit, a creature receives 7d8 + 5 almighty damage.

skills.name: Concentrate (15 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You gather and focus your mind's eye, delivering an absolute force of will. The next damage roll you make for an attack that deals Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage within the next 10 minutes is doubled.

skills.name: Eigaon (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A portal to despair yawns below a foe’s feet, only to flood them in a wave of pure hatred. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-2 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 4d8 + 5 curse damage.

demons.background:
Mot, also known as Mavet, is the Canaanite personification of death, also associated with infertility, drought and the Underworld. He "lives in the throne city which goes by the name Hemry, a pit is his throne, and Filth is the land of his heritage." According to another text, he holds "the scepter of widowhood" and "the scepter of bereavement." He is prominently featured in the mythology of Ugarit, but some mentions survive in later Phoenician texts as well.
 A few references in the Bible also appear to be a memory of Mot, such as vague mentions of seemingly personified death in the books of Hosea, Habakkuk and Jeremiah. Evidence from Ugarit indicates Mot was not worshiped, and he isn't attested in theophoric names; he was a demonic personification of an abstract concept rather than a god.[1] This makes him distinct from other Semitic figures associated with the afterlife, such as Nergal.

demons.name: Nyarlathotep

traits.name: Call of Chaos
traits.description:
You can induce yourself and others with twisted power borne from madness. You gain the following benefits:
 • As 1 action, you induce extreme stress and psychosis upon yourself. If you do, for the next 1 minute, all damage dice roll for attacks made by you and against you are treated as their maximum result.
 • As 2 actions, you induce extreme stress and psychosis upon others. If you do, choose up to six creatures within 60 feet of you. For the next 1 minute, all damage dice roll for attacks made by those creatures and against those creatures are treated as their maximum result.

traits.name: Unshaken Will
traits.description: A stiff upper lip aids you to overcome even the most destitute of your thoughts. You are immune to the Confuse, Fear, Despair, Rage, and Brainwash Conditions (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -2 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 5 physical damage.

skills.name: Crawling Chaos (32 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Eldritch tendrils and forces emerge from all sides, plunging those unlucky to be caught in the rift into amnesiatic agony. Make a melee attack against each creature within range (-2 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, a creature receives 3d8 + Magic almighty damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 3 or higher, a creature is inflicted with Forget (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Mudoon (12 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Darkness and malevolent spirits crush the victim’s will. Choose a creature within range and make a ranged attack against them (-2 to hit, 90 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 3 or higher, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points immediately. You have advantage on attack rolls with this Skill if the creature is Weak to Curse. This Skill provokes a One More if the target is weak to Curse.

skills.name: Tetrakarn (20 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You form a physical shield that blocks all kinetic force from penetrating. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). That creature Repels the next attack they receive within the next 10 minutes that deals Physical or Gun damage (see “Damage”).

demons.background:
Nyarlathotep was known to many as The Crawling Chaos, The God of a Thousand Forms, The Dweller in Darkness, The Faceless God, The Floating Horror, The Haunter of the Dark or many others, is an Outer God in the Cthulhu Mythos. He is the spawn of Azathoth. Like many of the well known Old Ones, he was created by H. P. Lovecraft.
 Nyarlathotep differs from the other deities in the Mythos in a number of ways. Most of the Outer Gods are exiled to the stars, like Yog-Sothoth and Azathoth, and most of the Great Old Ones are sleeping and dreaming like Cthulhu; Nyarlathotep, however, is active and frequently walks the Earth, actively seeking to agitate the universe into madness, woe, and discord. He has been known as a manipulative, charismatic and cruel entity who enjoys bringing chaos to the many worlds he walks. He has "a thousand" other forms and manifestations, most reputed to be quite horrific and sanity-blasting.

demons.name: Oberon

traits.name: Static Electricity
traits.description:
An overabundance of electrical power primes a foe for paralysis. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you attempt to inflict a Downed creature with Shock (see “Conditions”), flip a coin. If heads, the Condition is inflicted.
 • When you make an attack with an Ailment type Skill, the attack is made with advantage.

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Electric)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage. Add a 2d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills of the chosen element. At 15h level, this bonus is increased by 1d8 (3d8).

skills.description: Melee attack: range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 4 physical damage.

On a hit, they receive 6d8 + 4 electric damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 3 or higher, the target is also Shocked (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Nocturnal Flash (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Wondrous starlight flashes like a meteor shower of the night, disorienting an enemy field’s vision. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (-2 to hit, 20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Dizzy (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Samarecarm (28 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A wellspring of youth and vigor comes forth, nurturing an ally with new health. Choose a creature that is knocked out within range (90 feet). That creature regains all of their missing hit points.

demons.background: Oberon is the high king of the Fae and the husband of Titania (or Mab), the high queen of the Fae. He rules over the moonlight, dreams and all fairy rites. Some depictions say he is in charge of only the Seelie Court, but other depictions make him the leader of the entire fairyland. Although he has the face of a handsome young man, a curse has made him no taller than a young child that he received shortly after birth. However, the curse gives him eternal beauty.

demons.name: Quetzacoatl

Make a melee attack against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (-2 to hit, 20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 1d8 + 4 physical damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 4 or higher, a creature is inflicted with Forget (see “Conditions”).
