traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage. Add a 2d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills of the chosen element. At 15h level, this bonus is increased by 1d8 (3d8).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +1 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 5 physical damage.

skills.name: Vacuum Wave (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A natural disaster traps a field in a typhoon of destruction and howling gales. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-feet sphere centered at a point within range (-1 to hit, 20 feet). On a hit, they receive 8d8 + 5 wind damage.

skills.name: Megidolaon (36 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A flash of light. A singularity instantly expands, as a reality-busting sphere of destructive energy emerges from the ground, blinding and erasing all. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered at a point within range (-1 to hit, 20 feet). On a hit, a creature receives 4d8 + 5 almighty damage.

skills.name: Riot Gun (12 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A shower of piercing shots rain from the heavens above, turning foes into ribbons. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-feet sphere, centered at a point within range (-1 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 5d10 + 5 gun damage.

demons.background: Vishnu, rarely known as Adideva, is one of the primary deities in the Hindu pantheon. He is called The Preserver and is known for a kindly demeanor and genuine interest in the welfare of humanity. In the Hindu religion, Vishnu the Preserver is one of the three principal deities of the Trimurti (Hindu male Triad) along with Brahma, the Creator, and Shiva, the Destroyer. He was first seen in early Vedic mythology as the god that assisted Indra in defeating Vritra and is now the supreme deity within Vaishnavism, a branch of Hinduism that focuses on the worship of Vishnu. As the preserver, Vishnu maintains balance within the world, and at the end of our current era he will appear as his final avatar Kalki and judge whether mortals have been good or evil. After this, the universe will end and creation will start anew. He is depicted with up to four arms, blue skin, holding a chakra wheel, a lotus flower, a mace and a conch, and rides on the back of Garuda. He also sleeps on the back of a great Naga named Ananta Shesha.

demons.name: Chi You

traits.name: Elemental Bloodline (Psychic)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, or Curse. The Spell Point cost of Skills that are of the chosen type is halved (min 1).

traits.name: Fortify Spirit
traits.description: Your will is undeterred by afflictions. Dazzler, Makajama, Dormina, Pulinpa, Evil Touch, Ominous Words, Taunt, and Marin Karin type Skills have disadvantage against you.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 5 physical damage.

skills.name: Psycho Blast (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: An absolute wall of psionic force blasts your foes back, overwhelming them with a mind-blanking assault. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-feet sphere centered at a point within range (-1 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 4d8 + 5 psychic damage.

skills.name: Gigantomachia (16 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A tectonic force crumbles and fissures the earth, unleashing pure destruction on your foes. Make a melee attack against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (-1 to hit, 20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 6d8 + 5 physical damage.

skills.name: Concentrate (15 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You gather and focus your mind's eye, delivering an absolute force of will. The next damage roll you make for an attack that deals Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage within the next 10 minutes is doubled.

demons.background:
Chiyou (蚩尤) is a deity in Chinese mythology that descended from Shennong (神農), emperor of fire and agriculture. This half-man, half-bull war deity helped and led the Hmong and Li Tribes fight against Huang Di: the king who is said to be the ancestor of all Han Chinese. Huang Di lost many of his initial battles with Chiyou but won the final battle with the invention of the south pointing chariot (a mechanical compass without magnet) that allowed him to navigate through the thick fog summoned by Chiyou's forces. Chiyou was then beheaded by Yinglong (應龍), one of the Yellow Emperor's top generals.
 He is worshiped in China as the god of war and weapons and, along with Huang Di, as one of the progenitors of the Chinese people. Qin Shi Huang (秦始皇), the First Emperor of China, worshiped Chiyou and attributed him to his success in conquering his rival states. Liu Bang (劉邦), the founder of the Han dynasty, was also noted to have worshiped at Chiyou's shrine before his decisive battle with Xiang Yu (項羽).

demons.name: Futsunushi

traits.name: Will of the Sword
traits.description:
A properly harnessed will and strength is unopposed. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you roll Initiative, flip a coin. If heads, you gain the benefits of Power Charge and Concentrate at no cost.
 • You may add 2d8 to the damage roll of an attack benefiting from Power Charge or Concentrate.

traits.name: Firm Stance
traits.description:
Resilience and durability allow you to stand firm against all threats. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever a creature scores a Critical hit against you from each d6 of it's attack being 6, the Critical hit becomes a normal hit.
 • When you are subjected to an attack, you may choose to use this ability. If you do, you cannot evade the attack, and you receive half as much damage from it.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -1 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 5 physical damage.

skills.name: Brave Blade (10 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: Heroic strength and dexterity combine to make a righteous slash attack. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (-1 to hit, 5 feet). On a hit, a creature receives 4d10 + 5 physical damage. You may roll and add 2d10 to the damage roll of this attack if it is affected by the Power Charge Skill, before the damage is doubled.

skills.name: Matarukaja (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A rallying cry and magic reinforcement strengthens your entire group. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures gain the effects of Tarukaja.

skills.name: Power Charge (15 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You begin amassing your strength and stamina, coalescing into an ultimate strike. The next damage roll you make for an attack that deals Physical or Gun damage within the next 10 minutes is doubled.

demons.background: Futsunushi-no-kami (経津主神) is a Shinto deity of swords. He is regarded as the personification of the sword Futsu-no-mitama.

demons.name: Michael

traits.name: Veil of Sunrise
traits.description: A resplendent aura and second wind lifts the spirits of your team against all odds. Whenever you or an ally within 30 feet of you would be Downed, roll 1d4. On a 4, the Condition is prevented. If this effect is successful, it prevents the attacker from getting a One More.

traits.name: Apt Pupil
traits.description:
Your skill and cunning allows you to avoid the worst of impacts. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever a creature scores a Critical hit against you from each d6 of it's attack being 6, the Critical hit becomes a normal hit.
 • You score a critical hit for attacks where all d6s in the attack roll are a 2 or less.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -1 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 5 physical damage.

skills.name: Divine Judgement (24 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You call upon the decree of the heavens, which manifest as a gavel that descends and casts judgement upon a foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-1 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive bless damage equal to half of their remaining hit points. This Skill is unaffected by Concentrate.

skills.name: Sword Dance (15 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: Conjured blades coil, swirl and dance in a perfect harmony, before slamming and skewering the target into smithereens. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (-1 to hit, 20 feet). On a hit, a creature receives 5d10 + 5 physical damage. This Skill scores a Critical hit if the result of each d6 in its attack roll is 5 or higher.

skills.name: Debilitate (24 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You forcibly impose baleful curses upon a foe, decreasing its overall combat performance. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). This creature gains the effects of Tarunda, Rakunda, and Sukunda.

demons.background:
Michael, also known as Mikail in Islam, is an Archangel, one of the principal 50 angels in Christian lore, and one of the four main archangels of Abrahamic tradition.
 In Christianity, he is viewed as the field commander of the Army of God and led it in the war against the Devil and the fallen angels. He is also a saint and thus carries the title "St. Michael The Archangel." He is mentioned by name in the Book of Daniel and the Book of Revelations. In the book of Daniel, Michael appears as "one of the chief princes" who in Daniel's vision comes to the angel Gabriel's aid in their contest with the angel of Persia, and is also described there as the advocate of Israel and "great prince who stands up for the children of your people." Michael's status in the army of Heaven is seen as a Viceroy or an Archistrage as well, but he's mostly seen as the commander of Heaven's army.

demons.name: Ongyo-Ki

traits.name: Veil of Midnight
traits.description: A shimmering mist shrouds you in illusion and strength, lifting up your spirits. Whenever you would be Downed, roll 1d4. On a 4, the Condition is prevented. If this effect is successful, it prevents the attacker from getting a One More.

traits.name: Firm Stance
traits.description:
Resilience and durability allow you to stand firm against all threats. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever a creature scores a Critical hit against you from each d6 of it's attack being 6, the Critical hit becomes a normal hit.
 • When you are subjected to an attack, you may choose to use this ability. If you do, you cannot evade the attack, and you receive half as much damage from it.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack

skills.name: Concealment (10 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You surround yourself in an aura of deceitful illusions. For the next 1 minute, if you would be targeted by an enemy attack that could have targeted an ally within 60 feet, you may redirect the attack to a willing ally within 60 feet instead. This Skill does not affect attacks against multiple targets at once.

skills.name: Agneyastra (17 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Divinely empowered meteors descend from above to cause rampant destruction on the field. Make three melee attacks against each creature within a 30-foot sphere centered at a point within range (-1 to hit, 60 feet). The first time an attack hits, each subsequent attack will use the same attack roll result as that first hit. For each hit, a creature receives 2d8 + 5 physical damage.

skills.name: Eigaon (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A portal to despair yawns below a foe’s feet, only to flood them in a wave of pure hatred. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-1 to hit, 60 feet). On a hit, they receive 4d8 + 5 curse damage.

demons.background: Ongyo Ki (隠形鬼) whose name means "Invisible Oni" was controlled by Fujiwara no Chikata (藤原千方) from the mid-Heian period. He suppressed its aura to prevent enemies from sensing him, allowing him to surprise enemies when he attacked. It has been allegedly said that this is the origin of ninjitsu.

demons.name: Yoshitsune

traits.name: Fast Heal
traits.description: You are able to recover from afflictions with ease. At the end of your turn, when afflicted with a Condition, roll 1d4. On a 4, you recover from it.

traits.name: Retaliating Body
traits.description:
Your deft parry and reversal of force eviscerates unwary attackers. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you would be targeted by a Physical or Gun Skill, roll 1d4. On a 4, you Repel that attack (see “Resistances” in the Combat section).
 • Whenever damage would be dealt to attackers by you through an effect that Repels, the damage dealt is doubled.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -1 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 5 physical damage.

skills.name: Hassou Tobi (30 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: An eightfold flurry descends from Yoshitsune, each with the intent to kill. Make eight melee attacks against a creature within range. The first time an attack hits, each subsequent hit will use the same attack roll result as that first hit. For each hit, the creature receives 1d10 + 5 physical damage. If the user is affected by Power Charge, the doubling effect is applied to each attack made with this Skill, instead of the first.

skills.name: Ziodyne (16 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Pulverizing, erratic lightning buffets a foe with a high chance of Shock. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (-1 to hit, 30 feet). On a hit, they receive 3d8 + 5 electric damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 3 or higher, the target is also Shocked (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Power Charge (15 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You begin amassing your strength and stamina, coalescing into an ultimate strike. The next damage roll you make for an attack that deals Physical or Gun damage within the next 10 minutes is doubled.

demons.background: Minamoto no Yoshitsune (源 義経), born Ushiwakamaru (牛若丸), was a general of the Minamoto clan during the late Heian and early Kamakura period. Yoshitsune was born in 1159 during the Heiji Rebellion (平治の乱), a civil war against the rivaling Taira clan led by Kiyomori (平 清盛). This rebellion claimed the lives of his father Yoshitomo (源 義朝) and brothers. He was put under the care of Kurama Temple. Legend says that he was trained by the mythical Kurama Tengu during this stay.

demons.name: Beelzebub

traits.name: Elemental Bloodline (Curse)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, or Curse. The Spell Point cost of Skills that are of the chosen type is halved (min 1).

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Curse)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage. Add a 2d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills of the chosen element. At 15h level, this bonus is increased by 1d8 (3d8).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -2 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 5 physical damage.

skills.name: Death Flies (18 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A pestilence of malignant curses blasts outward from you, diminishing the life of foes with plagues abound. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-feet radius sphere centered at a point within range (20 feet). On a hit, a creature receives 6d8 + 5 curse damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 5 or higher, the creature is instantly reduced to 0 hit points instead.

skills.name: Demonic Decree (12 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: By right of your wretched will, a scythe of malice manifests from the earth, only to slice and sunder the will of an unsuspecting foe. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (30 feet). On a hit, they receive curse damage equal to half of their remaining hit points + 3d8. This Skill is unaffected by Concentrate.

skills.name: Evil Smile (10 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Your wickedness is magically enhanced, sending waves of chills through all who witness. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered on a point within range (20 feet). If the result of each d6 is 2 or higher, the target is inflicted with Fear (see “Conditions”).

demons.background:
The lord of the flies, Beelzebub was originally a Canaanite deity named Baal and was later explained to be one of the seven princes of Hell in Christian sources. He is also considered to be synonymous with Satan. In Judaism, he was a mockery of the religions surrounding them that worshipped Baal, and in Rabbinical texts the name Ba'al Zebub was a mockery of the religion of Baal. Some scholars believe the name Ba'al Zevuv ("Lord of the Flies") was a way of referring to Baal as a pile of dung and his followers as flies, as well as a pun on Ba'al Zebul ("Lord of the High Place").
 In Catholic demonology, he is sometimes considered to be one of the first three angels to fall from heaven, along with Lucifer and Leviathan. He is said to be one of the seven demon princes, and is often associated with pride, gluttony and the worship of false gods.

demons.name: Lucifer

traits.name: Pinnacle of Magic
traits.description:
You are the apex of arcana, the master of magic. You effortlessly evoke the most miraculous forces with but a gesture. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever you or a creature within 60 feet of you uses a Skill that deals Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage, you may roll 1d4. On a 4, the Spell Point cost of the Skill is halved, rounded down, to a minimum of 1.

traits.name: Insta-Heal
traits.description: With refined mental discipline and calming strategies, you are able to dispel maladies before they strike. At the end of your turn while afflicted with a Condition, flip a coin. If heads, you recover from it.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -2 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 5 almighty damage.

skills.name: Morning Star (36 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A stream of destructive force descends from the heavens, obliterating everything in a glorious spectacle. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered at a point within range (60 feet). On a hit, a creature receives 4d8 + 5 almighty damage.

skills.name: Gigantomachia (16 HP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A tectonic force crumbles and fissures the earth, unleashing pure destruction on your foes. Make a melee attack against each creature within a 20-foot sphere centered at a point within range (20 feet). A creature hit by this attack receives 6d8 + 5 physical damage.

skills.name: Heat Riser (24 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: The aid of magic releases an ally’s limiters, allowing them to fight at full potential. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). This creature gains the effects of Tarukaja, Rakukaja, and Sukukaja.

demons.background:
Lucifer (Hebrew: הילל, "Helel"), also known as Lucifel, is a prominent figure in Abrahamic religions, with his most infamous act being rebelling against God and subsequently falling from grace. The name Lucifer is derived from earlier Latin prose and poetry; lux, lucis, "light," and fero, ferre, "to bear, bring," symbolizing his role as the "Morning Star" and the strongest seraph or archangel, the highest ranked angel serving God prior his fall from grace. Lucifer is also the demon who represents the sin of Pride.
 While in modern literature, Lucifer and Satan are treated as the same entity, the name Lucifer was never identified with Satan until the Latin translation of the Book Isaiah. A specific passage in the book refers to a King of Babylon, who is described to have fallen from heaven and is called Helel ("shining one"), a name which refers to the Morning Star or Day Star (the planet Venus), which subsequently became translated as Lucifer.

demons.name: Mada

traits.name: Enduring Soul
traits.description: You bounce back fully when push comes to shove. When you would be reduced to 0 hit points by a hostile attack, you are reduced to a value equal to half of your maximum hit points. This ability may increase your current hit points through healing. Once this ability is used, you cannot use it again until you fully recover in Reality.

traits.name: Unshaken Will
traits.description: A stiff upper lip aids you to overcome even the most destitute of your thoughts. You are immune to the Confuse, Fear, Despair, Rage, and Brainwash Conditions (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 5 physical damage.

skills.name: Drunken Passion (15 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You intoxicate and inebriate all creatures beyond reason, plunging them into madness and debauchery. Make a ranged attack against each creature within range (60 feet). This Skill affects all allies, enemies, and yourself. On a hit, if the first d6 in the attack roll is 3 or higher, the creature is inflicted with Forget. If the second d6 in the attack roll is 3 or higher, the creature is inflicted with Confuse. If the third d6 in the attack roll is 3 or higher, the creature is inflicted with Rage (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Inferno (24 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: A beam of disintegrating thermal blaze vaporizes those in your path. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (60 feet). On a hit, they receive 5d8 + 4 fire damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Burned (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Amrita Shower (12 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You remedy the impurities of all your comrades, cleansing the field of malady. Choose up to six creatures within range (60 feet). Each of those creatures recover from all Conditions.

demons.background: In Hinduism, Mada is the monstrous deity of drunkenness. According to the Mahabhrata, it was summoned by the sage Chyavana to subdue the deity Indra. The story goes that the twin deities Asvin restored Chyavana's youthfulness when the sage rued his aged complexion and compared it to his young wife Sukanya. Feeling grateful, Chyavana told them of a feast hosted by Indra, where the gods would drink the life elixir soma to retain their immortality. Apparently Indra did not allow the twin deities to enter as they had dabbled with mortals for too long. Saddened, they reported this to the sage, who decided to offer sacrifices to the twin deities to signify their godhood. This infuriated Indra, who attacked the sage with thunderbolts and mountains. Chyavana countered by summoning Mada, who was so enormous that its two sets of jaws could swallow the earth and heavens at the same time. Indra, worried that the gods are still in the heavens, surrendered and allowed the Asvin twins to join the feast.

demons.name: Maria

traits.name: Savior Bloodline
traits.description: You give off blessings by the dozen. The Spell Point cost of Healing type Skills used by you is halved (min 1).

traits.name: Relief Bloodline
traits.description: A most resplendent and glorious blessing comes from your hands. The Spell Point cost of Support type Skills used by you are halved, rounded down (min 1).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d6 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Salvation (30 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Divine will invigorates you and your allies. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures regain 8d8 + 12 hit points. Each of those creatures recover from all Conditions.

skills.name: Holy Benevolence (30 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Divine forces resurrect the fallen to their full glory, allowing them to rise once more against disaster. Choose up to six creatures that are knocked out within range (90 feet). Those creatures are revived, and regain all of their missing hit points.

skills.name: Heat Riser (12 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: The aid of magic releases an ally’s limiters, allowing them to fight at full potential. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). This creature gains the effects of Tarukaja, Rakukaja, and Sukukaja.

demons.background:
Maria, known as the Virgin Mary, the Madonna, Myrhiàm or Maryam, is the central female figure in Christianity and many other Abrahamic faiths, she was a first-century Jewish woman living in the province of Galilee, wife to Joseph and mother of Jesus Christ, the messiah for Christians and a great prophet for Muslims.
 She is said in the Gospel and the Quran to have followed her son Jesus in his preachings, being an example of goodness and piety.
 In both Christianity and Islam, Maria is said to have conceived Jesus with the miraculous intervention of God, through the holy spirit (only for Christians, as Muslims do not believe in the holy trinity) after being visited by the archangel Gabriel, while maintaining her virginity. Because of this she is honored as the mother of God (theotokos in Greek) by Christians and as the greatest of all women in Islam.

demons.name: Metatron

traits.name: Elemental Bloodline (Bless)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, or Curse. The Spell Point cost of Skills that are of the chosen type is halved (min 1).

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Bless)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage. Add a 2d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills of the chosen element. At 15h level, this bonus is increased by 1d8 (3d8).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -2 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 4 physical damage.

skills.name: Fire of Sinai (18 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Purging, holy flames erupt below foes to banish them from existence. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-feet radius sphere centered at a point within range (20 feet). On a hit, a creature receives 6d8 + 6 bless damage. If the result of all d6s in the attack roll are a 5 or higher, the creature is instantly reduced to 0 hit points instead.

skills.name: Sword Dance (15 HP, 1 action)
skills.description: Conjured blades coil, swirl and dance in a perfect harmony, before slamming and skewering the target into smithereens. Make a melee attack against a creature within range (20 feet). On a hit, a creature receives 5d10 + 4 physical damage. This Skill scores a Critical hit if the result of each d6 in its attack roll is 5 or higher.

skills.name: Megidolaon (36 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A flash of light. A singularity instantly expands, as a reality-busting sphere of destructive energy emerges from the ground, blinding and erasing all. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-foot radius sphere centered at a point within range (20 feet). On a hit, a creature receives 4d8 + 6 almighty damage.

demons.background:
Metatron (who is sometimes theorized to originally be Enoch, father of Methuselah and great-grandfather of Noah) is the voice of God. Whenever a human believes God has directly spoken to them, in reality it is Metatron acting as his vessel. One million eyes and mouths cover his body, and every mouth speaks a different language. He is the being who is the nearest in hierarchy to that of God. He is said to have the largest body among all of the angels, having 36 wings, 3 representing the triumvirate of the father (God), the son (Jesus Christ) and the holy ghost, multiplied by the 12 tribes of Israel (God's chosen people). In ancient Judaism, his status is even higher than that of the Archangel Michael.
 He received various titles such as "Face of God," "Angel of Contracts" synonymous with the Iranian God Mithra, "King of Angels" and others of the like. His name literally means "He who sits behind the throne of Heaven." Metatron is also said to be the twin brother of the archangel Sandalphon.

demons.name: Satan

traits.name: Elemental Bloodline (Ice)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, or Curse. The Spell Point cost of Skills that are of the chosen type is halved (min 1).

traits.name: Fortify Spirit
traits.description: Your will is undeterred by afflictions. Dazzler, Makajama, Dormina, Pulinpa, Evil Touch, Ominous Words, Taunt, and Marin Karin type Skills have disadvantage against you.

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: -2 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 + 6 physical damage.

skills.name: Black Viper (36 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You conjure the maw of a primordial serpent that arises to crush a foe into oblivion, threatening to swallow them whole. Make a ranged attack against a creature within range (90 feet). On a hit, the creature receives 6d8 + 5 almighty damage.

skills.name: Ice Age (12 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: A bitter, primal frost descends from the sky to freeze a region solid. Make a ranged attack against each creature within a 20-feet radius sphere, centered at a point within range (20 feet). On a hit, they receive 4d8 + 5 ice damage. If each d6 in the attack roll is a 4 or higher, the target is also Frozen (see “Conditions”).

skills.name: Concentrate (15 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You gather and focus your mind's eye, delivering an absolute force of will. The next damage roll you make for an attack that deals Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage within the next 10 minutes is doubled.

demons.background:
Satan, sometimes known as Ha-Satan, is a prominent figure in the Abrahamic religions, playing various roles in their literature. The Old Testament and Judaism describes Satan as an accuser who tempts mankind to commit sin to show God how mankind can easily be led astray from him. In the Book of Job and the Kabbalah in particular, Satan is even able to take control of the life of a person in the stead of God, though only to the extent which God allows.
 In contrast, the New Testament depicts Satan as a rebel and an opposer to the will of God. In the Gospels, he is shown trying to tempt Christ away from the role of messiah, and Jesus denounced Satan as the father of lies. The Book of Revelation later names Satan as the devil leading an army of angels into a war with Michael and the rest of heaven.

demons.name: Izanagi-no-Okami

traits.name: Immunity
traits.description: The Reaper is immune to all Conditions, and cannot be instantly reduced to 0 hit points by Door of Hades, or Hama and Mudo type Skills.

traits.name: Country Maker
traits.description:
Your bonds are your legacy, and your true strength. You gain the following benefits:
 • As 1 action, you draw strength from your bonds. This gives you the effects of Tarukaja and Rakukaja at no cost. You may only use this ability while at least three allied creatures are within 30 feet of you. Once you use this ability, you cannot do so again until you recover from a Short Rest.
 • Whenever an allied creature within 120 feet, excluding yourself, rolls dice as part of a Trait’s effect (such as Counter, Gaia Pact, Mastery of Magic, etc), you may reroll the dice once. You must use the new result.

traits.name: Victory Cry
traits.description:
Your tactical prowess grants you immense support abilities:
 • The range of Healing and Support Skills used by you is increased by 30 feet. This does not affect Skills with a range of “Self”.
 • Whenever Initiative ends, all allies that acted within that Initiative regain lost Hit Points and Spell Points equal to 2d8 + your Magic. This does not affect yourself.

traits.name: Elemental Amp (Almighty)
traits.description: When you gain this Trait, choose Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage. Add a 2d8 bonus to any damage roll made with Skills of the chosen element. At 15h level, this bonus is increased by 1d8 (3d8).

skills.name: Basic Melee Attack
skills.description: Melee attack: +1 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3d6 + 6 physical damage.

skills.name: Myriad Truths (60 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Three throngs of cosmic portent emanate from your fingertips. Truth is absolute, and manifests as absolute power. Make three ranged attacks against each creature within a 20-feet radius sphere, centered at a point within range (20 feet). The first time an attack hits, each subsequent attack will use the same attack roll result as that first hit. For each hit, a creature receives 6d8 + 6 almighty damage. If the user is affected by Concentrate, the doubling effect is applied to each attack made with this Skill, instead of the first.

skills.name: Concentrate (15 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: You gather and focus your mind's eye, delivering an absolute force of will. The next damage roll you make for an attack that deals Fire, Ice, Electric, Wind, Psychic, Nuke, Bless, Curse, or Almighty damage within the next 10 minutes is doubled.

skills.name: Heat Riser (24 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: The aid of magic releases an ally’s limiters, allowing them to fight at full potential. Choose a creature within range (90 feet). This creature gains the effects of Tarukaja, Rakukaja, and Sukukaja.

skills.name: Salvation (30 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: Divine will invigorates you and your allies. Choose up to six creatures within range (90 feet). Those creatures regain 8d8 + 13 hit points. Each of those creatures recover from all Conditions.

demons.background: Izanagi-no-Ookami, named "Ookami," meaning "Great Deity," symbolizes Izanagi's true identity as the deity born of the seven divine generations in Japanese mythology.

With deceit and trickery, as well as resilience, you are able to avoid disaster. You gain the following benefits:
 • When you would be reduced to 0 hit points by a Hama or Mudo type Skill, or Door of Hades, you are reduced to 1 hit points instead.
 • When you would be reduced to 0 hit points by a hostile attack that is not a Hama or Mudo type Skill, or Door of Hades , you are reduced to 1 hit point instead. Once this ability is used, you cannot use it again until you fully recover in Reality.

traits.name: Realized Potential
traits.description:
A new side of you manifests in and out of Reality due to your hard work in training your unexpected talents. You gain the following benefits:
 • Choose from Knowledge, Guts, Empathy, Proficiency, or Charm. The chosen Social Stat is increased by 1, up to a maximum of 5.
 • Choose from Strength, Magic, Endurance, Agility, or Luck. You gain a +2 bonus to the chosen Combat Stat.

demons.background:
Satanael, also known as Sataniel or Satanail, is an archangel mentioned in the second Book of Enoch that lead the fallen angels that rebelled against God, by refusing to bow to the human Enoch, leading to his imprisonment. Due to his name and role, he is considered an interpretation of Lucifer.
 In some Gnostic traditions, Satanael is said to be an angel that once served Yaldabaoth. He rebelled when he realized that Yaldabaoth was not the true God and granted humanity the knowledge to liberate themselves from Yaldabaoth. In other traditions, he is said to have created the material universe as a second heaven to rule over and became the "God" of the Old Testament, making him an interpretation of the Yaldabaoth.
 According to the beliefs of the Cathars, a notorious medieval heretical creed, Satanael (or Satanel) was the angelic name of Satan before Michael the archangel removed the -el suffix (signifying the loss of his angelic nature) and sealed him in Hell. In this interpretation, Satanael is the radical opposite of God and the ruler of the material world.

demons.name: The Reaper

traits.name: Immunity
traits.description: The Reaper is immune to all Conditions, and cannot be instantly reduced to 0 hit points by Door of Hades, or Hama and Mudo type Skills.

traits.name: Omen
traits.description:
You are a living embodiment of purgation. You gain the following benefits:
 • You have advantage on attacks made for Hama, Hamaon, Samsara, Mudo, Mudoon,  Die for Me!, and Door of Hades.
 • Whenever you make an attack roll for Hama, Hamaon, Samsara, Mudo, Mudoon,  Die for Me!, or Door of Hades, you may reroll any of the dice once. You must use the new result.

traits.name: Hollow Jester
traits.description:
You seek out the weak-willed and the ailing pack. You gain the following benefits:
 • You may add half your character level (min 1) to the damage roll of any attack against which the target is Weak to.
 • You may add half your character level (min 1) to the damage roll of any attack against a target afflicted with a Condition. You may add this bonus multiple times, once for each Condition the target is inflicted with.

traits.name: Apt Pupil
traits.description:
Your skill and cunning allows you to avoid the worst of impacts. You gain the following benefits:
 • Whenever a creature scores a Critical hit against you from each d6 of it's attack being 6, the Critical hit becomes a normal hit.
 • You score a critical hit for attacks where all d6s in the attack roll are a 2 or less.

On a hit, the creature receives 4d10 + 6 gun damage. This Skill scores a Critical hit if the result of each d6 in its attack roll is 5 or higher.

skills.name: Mudoon (12 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Darkness and malevolent spirits crush the victim’s will. Choose a creature within range and make a ranged attack against them (+1 to hit, 90 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 3 or higher, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points immediately. You have advantage on attack rolls with this Skill if the creature is Weak to Curse. This Skill provokes a One More if the target is weak to Curse.

skills.name: Hamaon (12 SP, 1 action)
skills.description: Divine will and an excess of banishing rights and rituals consecrate the creature’s space, purging it of evil and existence. Choose a creature within range and make a ranged attack against them (+1 to hit, 90 feet). On a hit, if the result of each d6 is 3 or higher, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points immediately. You have advantage on attack rolls with this Skill if the creature is Weak to Bless. This Skill provokes a One More if the target is weak to Bless.

skills.name: Grim Barrage (36 SP, 2 actions)
skills.description: You draw upon chaotic forces to unleash upon foes. You use three of the following Skills, chosen at random: Agidyne, Bufudyne, Ziodyne, Garudyne, Psiodyne, Freidyne, or Megidola. Roll 3d8 to choose, rerolling on an 8. After the Skills are randomly chosen, you may then select targets for the Skills.

demons.background:
The Reaper of the Persona series has several features that distinguish it from other "grim reapers" in popular culture. The Reaper, instead of carrying a gigantic scythe, wields two long-barrel revolvers. Its face is shrouded in a blood-stained cloth sack, with only one white eye exposed to see its surroundings. It wears two long chains across its left and right shoulders, forming a cross.
 The Reaper acts as a security system for areas where Shadows infest, such as Tartarus and Mementos. It either actively pursues threats as they linger in an area for too long or ambushes them inside treasure chests or other objects that might otherwise contain valuable items, such as Power Spots. In Persona Q, however, it does not act any differently than other F.O.Es. In all of its appearances, it is incredibly powerful. Boasting an extensive array of skills that ranges from Physical skills, Elemental and Almighty magic, and status and buffs, it is highly unpredictable and difficult to beat via normal means. Despite its low HP compared to most end-game bosses, its other stats are abnormally high, making it incredibly fast, durable and hard-hitting.
 Unlike most other on-field Shadows where it is encountered, the Reaper uses its own model upon spawning on the map.
 The Reaper's origins are largely unknown. However, in Persona Q alone, they are said to be deployed by Chronos to wipe out any threats against divine providence.
